description: Key features: -convert to mp4 or h.264 or mpg from most commonly seen video formats (video to video converter) -reduce video file size to send out through SMS etc. (Reduce size profile) -convert video while keep original video quality (Keep quality profile) -manual mode to specify video bitrate, arbitrary resolution, audio bitrate, codec etc. (Manual profile) -extract audio from videos, convert mp4 to mp3 or other video formats to mp3 or aac. (audio only profile) -rotate audio in arbitrary angle (rotation profile) ***If Video Converter Android always fails to convert videos, please press menu=>help=>feedback=>conversion to send out a detailed log. We’ve been making the app work on more and more devices.*** Video Converter Android (VidCon) is the best (and free!) video converters on Android for Android. With the background ffmpeg library support, Video converter for Android can convert almost any video formats to mpeg4 and h264 videos, including asf, avi, divx, flv, m2v, m4v, mjpeg, mkv, mov, mpg, ogg, ogv, rm, rmvb, webm, wmv, dv4 etc. If you want a specific video format to be supported, please leave the details in comments or email us. We’ll try to add the support in future release. Instead of using MX Video Player, MoboPlayer, DoubleTwist Player, mVideoPlayer, VPlayer, RockPlayer and many other video players to play the video in various formats, you can use Video Converter for Android to convert the video to formats Android support, and play the video using system player with hardware acceleration. It gives you better video experience. PERMISSIONS: android.permission.INTERNET: for ads display if pro key is not installed android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: for deciding if we can send out feedback android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: for store the output video files and logs android.permission.WAKE_LOCK: for video conversion when phone screen is switched off android.permission.READ_LOGS: for collecting logs in case a conversion fails. Users will be asked if logs should be sent back every time.
release_text: 2.1.0 - notification background fix - few bug fixes

description: ***new features: add reduce size profile, convert video to gif with smaller size so it's easy to share in the web*** Android video to gif (also known as video2gif) is the tool to create animated gif from video. There are tons of gif maker tools available on Android, but few of them has the capability to create gif from video. The tool allows you to convert video to gif easily. You’ll have control over frame rate, image resolution, repeat times etc. You can also view your gif files with the app. Three clicks to video gif creator: 1. click a video from Videos tab or Browser tab 2. set start time and end time, and click extract 3. set frame rate, repeat, and resolution, click OK VIDEO TO GIF LETS YOU * convert part or entire video to animated gif. Two kinds of interfaces are provided to select the start time and end time, including a seekbar and start time end time picker. *browse your video easily. The app reads the list of videos from system database. You can also browse to a folder to locate the video to convert to gif with the Browse tab. *preview your gif before conversion. You can adjust the frame rate, looping etc. and preview the animation before hitting the OK button to start conversion after the frame extraction is done. *export, rename, share gif. You can long press an animation at the Library tab and select move, rename or share the gif animation. ****coming soon***** support for more video formats: currently we only support the video formats supported by Android system. We will add support for more video formats (e.g. flv, avi, mpg, mov, rm, mkv etc.) in future release. The app is in beta, so we expect users may encounter some issues. We always appreciate your feedback. You can leave your comments or send us an email.
release_text: 1.1.0 --allow choose of frame extraction frequency --a few bug fixes 1.0.1 --better video thumbnail --support more devices 1.0.0 --first release. Convert video to gif

Are you sure you know how to spell Spanish words correctly? Check your knowledge with a new game "¡Escribién!", a game for smart ones only! In the orthography quiz we have gathered for you the most interesting and complicated to spell words of Spanish language. Each round consists of 20 questions. There appear 4 ways of spelling of a tricky word. You have to choose which one is correct. At the end of each round you will see what is your knowledge worth: from an 10 SB to 1,0 SP. You can make your game even more fascinating! With new compliments and options you will be able to: - have more of interesting words - complete levels - translation of words in the English language - correct your mistakes and a lot more! Improve your spelling skills, set records and compete with other players! Collect stars and medals and become the best! You can play ¡Escribién! alone or organize a competition between friends and let everyone know who is the smartest one! The game creators used authoritative dictionaries of the Spanish language. Authors and performers of music used in the app: - band NewPeople (Roman Balyshev) ¡Escribién! - escribe bien «¡Escribíen!»© AllyTeam 2013.

Приложение InvestPay (Invest Pay) от Челябинвестбанка - это полноценный банковский сервис в вашем мобильном телефоне. В любое время в любом месте Вы сможете использовать приложение для контроля состояния счетов и совершения различных банковских операций. Больше не нужно спешить в отделение до его закрытия, с помощью приложения вы сможете: - узнавать состояние ваших счетов, - видеть балансы карт, вкладов и кредитов - просматривать реквизиты счета и отправлять их на e-mail - делать выписку по счету - просматривать историю транзакций за выбранный период - быть в курсе специальных предложений - узнавать курсы валют и драгоценных металлов - найти, как добраться до ближайшего банкомата или отделения - создавать диалоги с банком по интересующим Вас вопросам Скачайте приложение и Вам будут доступны его информационные сервисы. Для того, чтобы воспользоваться доступом к Вашим счетам из приложения, необходимо оформить заявку на сайте, либо подключить услугу в любом отделении Челябинвестбанка . Web-клиент доступен по адресу https://investpay.ru/ . 2014 - Invest Pay Appendix InvestPay (Invest Pay) from Chelyabinvestbank - a full-service bank in your mobile phone. At any time, in any place, you can use the application to monitor the status of the account and the various banking operations. No longer need to rush to the department before it closed, using an application, you can:  - Find out the status of your accounts,  - See the card balance, deposits and loans  - View account details and send them to e-mail  - To make a statement of account  - View your transaction history for the selected period  - Be aware of the special offers  - Learn currencies and precious metals  - Find out how to get to the nearest ATM or branch  - Create a dialogue with the bank on your questions Download the application and will be accessible to its information services. In order to take advantage of access to your accounts from your application, you must place an order online, or activate the service in any branch Chelyabinvestbank. You should have a Russian passport. Web-client is available at https://investpay.ru/ . 2014 - Invest Pay

description: В этом приложении описана методика сбора грибов и организации простого научного исследования видового состава и численности грибов в природных условиях. В состав методического пособия входит также учебно-методический фильм, демонстрирующий технологию проведения данного исследования в полевых условиях. Изложена техника сбора и маршрутного учета численности грибов, способы организации полевой работы силами учащихся, а также лабораторной обработки собранного материала, включая определение видов найденных грибов, расчет запаса (веса на единицу площади), а также классификация грибов по пищевой ценности и ядовитости. Данное методическое пособие и учебно-методический фильм могут быть полезны для учителей, педагогов дополнительного образования, организаторов полевых экологических лагерей и экспедиций, а также для учащихся, самостоятельно изучающих природу, и их родителей. This appendix describes the method of collecting mushrooms and organization simple scientific investigation of species composition and abundance of fungi in natural conditions. The structure of a manual also includes educational and methodical film showing the technology for this research in the field. Technique is described for collecting and routing counts of fungi, ways to organize field work by students, and laboratory processing of the collected material, including identification of species of fungi found, reserve calculation (weight per unit area) as well as the classification of fungi on the nutritional value and toxicity. This textbook and instructional film may be useful for teachers, supplementary education teachers, organizers environmental field camps and expeditions, as well as for students studying on their own nature, and their parents.

В данном методическом пособии речь идет об изучении раннецветущих растений - первоцветов, распространенных в зоне умеренного климата и цветущих сразу после схода снега. Приводятся важнейшие биологические особенности этих растений, методика заложения площадок для геоботанических описаний, методика оценки их распределения и численности на изучаемой территории, а также способы фиксации данных наблюдений и оформления результатов работы. This policy tool it comes to learning early-flowering plants - primroses, common in the temperate climate zone and flowering immediately after the snow melts. Are the most important biological characteristics of these plants, a technique of laying sites for relevés, the estimation procedure of their distribution and abundance in the study area, as well as methods of fixing the observational data and processing results.

Биология Комплекты материалов для подготовки к Государственной итоговой аттестации по биологии в новой форме (ГИА ) созданы специалистом ФИПИ, официальным разработчиком контрольно-измерительных материалов ГИА в 2015 году. Материалы для подготовки к ГИА по биологии рекомендованы ИСМО Российской Академии Образования для подготовки выпускников всех типов образовательных учреждений РФ к сдаче экзаменов в форме ГИА. В приложении есть типовые варианты экзаменационных работ 2015 года, которые сопровождаются инструкциями по выполнению работы и ответами ко всем заданиям. Ценным дополнением является подробный разбор выполнения заданий части С. Материалы предполагают два режима работы: 1. Режим «Экзамен» - условия выполнения заданий максимально приближены к реальной обстановке на экзамене. 2. Режим «Тестирование» - предполагает возможность тренироваться, исправлять ответы, сверять свои решения с правильными ответами. Выполнение всех заданий гарантирует выработку устойчивых навыков безошибочных действий на экзамене, решения заданий базового, повышенного и высокого уровней сложности. Учащийся, справившийся со всеми предлагаемыми заданиями, может с уверенностью считать себя готовым к ГИА по биологии. Предлагаемые материалы избавят Вас от необходимости покупать множество книг и искать дополнительную информацию в Интернете! Компании «Экзамен-Медиа» очень важно Ваше мнение о представленных учебных материалах! Мы ждем Ваших замечаний и отзывов о нашей работе и будем рады выполнить Ваши пожелания. + Полностью обновлено содержание экзаменационных работ. + Изменилась структура работы. + Изменилась система оценивания заданий. + Изменилось количество заданий и порядок их нумерации. + Оформление приведено в соответствие с новым содержанием. Materials for the preparation of the DPA in biology recommended Ismo Russian Academy of Education to prepare graduates of all types of educational institutions of the Russian Federation for exams in the form of the DPA. description: Приложение представляет полный сборник наиболее важных формул, по всем темам школьного курса физики, которые могут понадобится на Едином Государственном Экзамене. description: The n-back task is a continuous performance task that is commonly used as an assessment in cognitive neuroscience to measure a part of working memory and that has been suggested as a method for increasing fluid intelligence. The tn-back was introduced by Wayne Kirchner in 1958. The dual-task n-back task is a variation that was proposed by Susanne Jaeggi et al. in 2003. In the Dual-task paradigm, two independent sequences are presented simultaneously, typically using different modalities of stimuli. Performance on the n-back task seems to be more closely correlated with performance on measures of fluid intelligence than it is with performance on other measures of working memory (which is also correlated with performance on measures of fluid intelligence). In the same vein, training on the n-back task appears to improve performance on subsequent fluid intelligence assessments, especially when the training is at a higher n-value. Working memory is the system that actively holds multiple pieces of transitory information in the mind, where they can be manipulated. This involves execution of verbal and nonverbal tasks—such as reasoning and comprehension—and makes them available for further information-processing. Working memory tasks require monitoring (i.e., manipulation of information or behaviors) as part of completing goal-directed actions in the setting of interfering processes and distractions. Fluid intelligence describes the ability to think logically and solve problems in unfamiliar situations, making it crucial for learning processes of all kind. It utilizes the brain's capability to extract information, identify patterns and find new solutions through logic. It is used in every aspect of our lives where we are presented with a problem, be it in school, at work, or in conflict situations with other people. N-Back Challenge uses a scientifically proven concept to train and improve the fluid intelligence, allowing the user to solve problems more efficiently. Having a better memory can help you remember names, dates, locations, and recall important information more quickly and accurately. According to a study published by the University of Michigan (USA), presented at the Association for Psychological Science (Washington), shows that playing dual N-Back 20 minutes a day of 20 days, may actually improve the working memory (short term memory) and fluid intelligence. The memory task game helps to achieve better results in IQ tests since it increases the ability to reason and develop new problems. Fluid Intelligence refers to the ability to reason and to solve new problems independently of previously acquire knowledge. This game aims improving short term memory and fluid intelligence by exercising your brain on sets of working-memory training exercises. This program is a kind of dual N-Back task. Dual N-Back game, can measurably increase your fluid intelligence (what you use for problem-solving, learning and pattern recognition). We show a number of different characters and their position - you need to specify whether the character met or position a few steps back. For the answer, pull the slider to the right or to the left. The game starts when you click the slider and ends when the setting up of the size of the sequence, or when the button was released slider. Thereafter, a transition occurs in the results window. In the settings you can adjust the size of the sequence, the state of the show, the repetition rate and the sensitivity of the button states sliding (ie, how much we have to move the slider button for the answer).

И тогда начинаются долгие попытки вспомнить подходящую песню - чтобы и гитарист мог сыграть, и все, желающие подпевать, текст помнили. Спасти ситуацию поможет данная программа - удобный песенник с аккордами для гитары. Преимущества: - Без рекламы - Возможность смены тональности (транспонирование аккордов) - Автопрокрутка текста песни - Возможность импорта собственных песен - Не требуется подключение к интернету (интернет нужен только для загрузки новых песен) Often there are situations where a group of friends it comes to guitars. And then begin the long attempts to remember good song - and that could play guitar, and all who desire to sing, remember the text. Save the situation will help the program - handy songbook with chords for guitar. Advantages: - No Advertisement - Ability to change the pitch (transpose chords) - Auto Lyrics - Ability to import your own songs - Do not require an internet connection (internet only to download new songs)

description: How often you receive sms with unused information (spam)? This application helps you! The principle of operation is simple: anything that does not come from the contact list, a priori considered to be spam. At the same time, there is an opportunity to put some numbers to the white list. Any locked messages can be viewed at any time on a separate tab of the application. The program is completely free and, unlike similar applications, don't require any side permits. Thus, you can be rest assured about the correspondence, the lack of data leakage guaranteed by security system Android OS. Features: * Block SMS based on black and white lists * See blocked SMS in 'Logs' (blocked sms tab) tags: sms, black list, anti-spam
release_text: v1.4 - Czech translation added - Interface updated - Some bugs fixed - Source code has been opened at https://github.com/subprogram/ParanoidSmsBlocker v1.3 - You can remove blocked sms now - Some bugs fixed v1.2 - Add notification about new blocked sms. v1.1 - Add backup/restore feature

description: Связной Трэвел – это приложение для поиска и покупки дешевых авиабилетов, без которого не обходится ни долгожданный отпуск, ни деловая поездка. Начать путешествовать с нами проще простого: достаточно указать направление, даты вылета и прилета и число пассажиров, и приложение подберет оптимальный вариант авиабилета, отсортировав тысячи предложений от 700 ведущих авиакомпаний мира. Купить билет дешево – проще простого. Установив приложение, вы сможете: •искать авиабилеты, используя различные критерии поиска, и выбирать то, что для вас важнее: дешевые перелеты или максимально комфортные рейсы; •отслеживать информацию об оптимальных перелетах благодаря функции «Динамика цен»; •оплачивать выбранные билеты прямо в мобильном приложении; •бронировать авиабилеты для последующей оплаты онлайн или в салонах «Связной» – наличными или картой; •оформлять страховку перелета через приложение; •пользоваться хранящимися в приложении паспортными данными, просматривать выбранные ранее варианты рейсов; •отправлять информацию своим попутчикам по e-mail или sms; •использовать данные, однажды введенные вами в Личном кабинете на сайте www.svyaznoy.travel; •получать уведомления о статусе рейса, времени вылета, погоде в пункте назначения, проходить регистрацию на рейс (раздел «Гид по перелету» в карточке заказа); •получать информацию о правилах провоза багажа (раздел «Поддержка»); •копить плюсы на карте «Связного-Клуба», чтобы затем тратить их на покупку новых авиабилетов. Что немаловажно, цены в мобильном приложении идентичны ценам на сайте www.svyaznoy.travel. Остались вопросы? Испытываете трудности с оформлением заказа? Знаете, что и как можно улучить в работе приложения? Мы открыты для ваших замечаний и предложений и стараемся максимально оперативно отвечать на все ваши сообщения. Всегда ваша, Команда «Связной Трэвел» The Messenger Travel - is an application to search for and purchase cheap airline tickets, without which no cost, no long-awaited vacation or business trip. Begin to travel with us easier, simply specify the direction, date of departure and arrival and the number of passengers, and the application will select the best option ticket, sorting thousands of offers from 700 leading airlines in the world. Buy cheap ticket - simple. By installing the application, you can: • search for flights using a variety of search criteria, and choose what is more important to you: cheap flights or flights to the most comfortable; • Keep track of information about the best flights through the 'Dynamics of prices "; • pay the selected tickets directly in a mobile application; • book flights for subsequent payment online or in the salons of "The Messenger" - cash or card; • to issue insurance trip through the application; • Use stored in the application passport data, view previously selected options flights; • send information to your fellow travelers by e-mail or sms; • use the data once you have entered in the Dashboard online www.svyaznoy.travel; • be notified of the status of the flight departure time, the weather at your destination, you check in (see "Guide to overshoot" in the card order); • receive information about the rules of baggage (see "Support"); • stash pros on the map "Coherent Club" to then spend it to buy new tickets. Importantly, prices in the mobile application are identical to the prices on the site www.svyaznoy.travel. Still have questions? Are having difficulty with your order? Know how and what can be improved in the application? We are open to your comments and suggestions and do our best to respond promptly to all your messages. Always yours, Team "The Messenger Travel"
release_text: Отличная новость: начиная с текущей версии, можно оформлять страховку перелета прямо через приложение. Что это значит? Это значит, что можно больше не переживать об утере багажа и задержке вылета, а также о том, что придется тратить драгоценные время и деньги, которые вам никто не возместит. Стоит страховка недорого, зато гарантирует спокойный отдых. Кроме того, чтобы вы не забыли оплатить заказ и не опоздали на свой рейс, мы разработали для вас удобные и информативные push-уведомления.

description: Уважаемые мамы и папы, бабушки и дедушки, если вы хотите научить читать своего ребенка, то эта игра станет для вас незаменимым помощником , а также научит малыша быстро читать любые двухбуквенные сочетания и слоги (склады). Для этого нужно просто выбрать поезд с нужной гласной и помочь ему доставить важный груз до места назначения, например мышки ждут сыр, а больные звери ждут лекарства от доктора Айболита. Но, чтобы поезд поехал, нужно громко повторять, а затем и самому читать слоги, которые появляются на его пути. И когда все поезда в этой игре станут скоростными и будут ездить без запинок по железной дороге, вы сможете смело сказать, что ребенок выучил все слоги, и готов читать любые слова. Счастливого путешествия в удивительные мир чтения и новых открытий. Dear mom and dad, grandparents, if you want to teach your child to read, then this game will be your indispensable assistant, as well as teach a toddler to quickly read any two-letter combinations, and syllables (warehouses). To do this, simply select the desired vowel train and help deliver an important goods to the destination, such as a mouse waiting for cheese, and sick animals waiting drugs from Dr. Dr. Dolittle. But the train to go, you need to repeat out loud, and then read the very syllables that appear in his way.  And when all the trains in this game will be the speed and will go without hesitation by rail, you can safely say that the child has learned all the syllables, and ready to read any words. Happy journey into the amazing world of reading and discovery.

Краткий справочник по физике: формулы, законы с пояснениями. - Пояснение к каждой формуле (по нажатию): входящие в нее величины, их размерность и константы. - Иллюстрации и графики Приложение прекрасно подойдет как изучающим физику на профильном, так и на базовом уровне. На данный момент доступно пять разделов: механика (включая кинематику, статику, гидростатику и гидродинамику), молекулярно-кинетическая теория газов, термодинамика, электричество (включая электростатику и постоянный ток), магнетизм, колебания и волны. Остальные разделы (оптика и квантовая физика) будут добавлены в ближайших обновлениях. Quick reference to physics: formulas, laws with explanations. - Explanation of each formula (by pressing) included in it the values ​​of the dimension and constants. - Illustrations and graphics The application is perfect for both studied physics at the profile, and at a basic level. Currently there are five sections: mechanical (including kinematics, statics, hydrostatics and hydrodynamics), molecular-kinetic theory of gases, thermodynamics, electricity (including electrostatics and DC), magnetism, oscillations and waves. The remaining sections (optics and quantum physics) will be added in the next update.
release_text: - Добавлен раздел "Колебания и волны". - Исправлены некоторые ошибки.

description: Take advantage of all Yandex.Mail features with your phone. Send messages no matter where you are. Get push notifications about new mail. With the Yandex.Mail app you can: - send and receive messages with attachments; - use push notifications so you no longer have to check your mail manually; - search your messages; - group messages by subject; - filter messages by label, for example “Unread” or “Flagged”; - manage your Yandex.Mail for domain mailboxes.
release_text: Themes are now available in this version. The skin you’ve chosen for your web interface will now delight you the same way in the app. We’ve also slightly changed the menu, background, and font of the folders list to adapt to the new Android design (Material Design). We’ll be working more on this in future updates. Yandex.Mail Team

description: Yandex.Market is your mobile consultant for products and prices. In the Yandex.Market catalog you will find the widest selection of products ranging from kitchen utensils and children's toys to auto parts and air conditioners. Select important filters and the app itself will choose an appropriate product. For example, you can specify the screen size of a television or the maximum weight load of a washing machine. You can browse shoes, clothes and accessories for both children and adults, after choosing the size, material, style and other parameters. In addition you can see detailed specs of products, read customer reviews, compare prices and choose the cheapest deals on Yandex.Market. You can start using Yandex.Market on one device and continue from the same point on another. Items from your wishlist are stored on all your devices after signing in. With Yandex.Market you can: - search products by manufacturer, price and more; - filter suggestions by price; - find a product by name, or by scanning a barcode or QR-code; - find out the characteristics of a product, read reviews by actual customers and leave your own; - start your search on a computer and then continue on a smartphone; - contact the store directly from the app or go to the website for online ordering; - see store locations on a map.
release_text: We’ve added new features to the app. Now you can read specifications of products in your wishlist without an internet connection. Also, if you leave feedback on products or stores, then you can find them in the new “My reviews” section. The app will let you know about any updates concerning your reviews, such as when they get approved by the moderator or other users rate or respond to them.

description: Metro journey planner.The app does not require an internet connection so you can use it on the go. Quickly navigate the metro systems of Moscow, Saint Petersburg, Kiev, Kharkiv and Minsk. Get an estimation of your journey time and even find out which carriage to sit in to avoid lengthy walks to the other end of the platform. The Yandex.Metro app offers the following features: - optimal journey planning; - estimated journey times; - "Podorojnik" ticket refill (St. Petersburg only); - If you are a proud owner of Samsung's Galaxy Nexus, Google Nexus S, HTC One X or Sony Xperia S supporting NFC, you can also use the app to see how many trips you have left on your metro pass in Moscow.
release_text: We’ve fixed the error where Metro would suddenly close on startup on devices running Android 2.2. If you are still having problems with stability, be sure to contact our support service. Don’t forget to specify which brand of phone or tablet, as well as which operating system you are using. Yandex.Metro Team

description: Available only in Russia! The Yandex.Taxi app is a quick and easy way of ordering a taxi. Cars are normally dispatched within 7 minutes and you can track their location on the map in real time. Features: - Order a cab without calling the dispatcher – your order is sent directly to the drivers in your area so they reach you as quickly as possible. - The app shows all the necessary information about the driver and their car. - Refine your search, for example, smoker or non-smoker, children’s seat, receipt etc. - Track the location of your car on the map, - Get price estimate in the cities supporting this feature, - Rate your journey, which will affect the overall score of the driver. The app is currently supported in Moscow, Saint Petersburg, Voronezh.
release_text: Thank you for your patience - your favorite addresses are back in the app. Yandex.Taxi team.

description: The Yandex.Traffic widget shows overall road congestion and lets you monitor real-time traffic conditions in more than 60 towns and cities in Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan and Belarus. You can quickly switch to Yandex.Maps from within the app. You can also receive current traffic information for a optimal route (in Moscow and Ukraine only). The widget is available in three sizes: 1x1, 1x2 and 2x2. You can select your town and specify the information update frequency in the settings menu. You can also plot and find out traffic conditions for a optimal route in Moscow or anywhere in Ukraine (beta version). www.yandex.ru

description: ZArchiver Donate - a special version of ZArchiver for donating to project. Advantages of Pro version: - Light and dark theme; - Password storage; - Image preview in archive; - Editing the files in the archive (see notes); ZArchiver - is a program for archive management. It has a simple and functional interface. ZArchiver lets you: - Create the following archive types: 7z (7zip), zip, bzip2 (bz2), gzip (gz), XZ, tar; - Decompres the following archive types: 7z (7zip), zip, rar, rar5, bzip2, gzip, XZ, iso, tar, arj, cab, lzh, lha, lzma, xar, tgz, tbz, Z, deb, rpm, zipx, mtz, chm, dmg, cpio, cramfs, img (fat, ntfs, ubf), wim, ecm, arc (freearc); - View archive contents: 7z (7zip), zip, rar, rar5, bzip2, gzip, XZ, iso, tar, arj, cab, lzh, lha, lzma, xar, tgz, tbz, Z, deb, rpm, zipx, mtz, chm, dmg, cpio, cramfs, img (fat, ntfs, ubf), wim, ecm, arc (freearc); - Create and decompress password-protected archives; - Edit archives: add/remove files to/from the archive (zip, 7zip, tar, apk, mtz); - Create and decompress multi-part archives: 7z, rar(decompress only); - Partial archive decompression; - Open compressed files; - Open an archive file from mail applications; - Extract splited archives: 7z, zip and rar (7z.001, zip.001, part1.rar, z01); Key features: - Multithreading support (useful for multicore processors); - UTF-8/UTF-16 supporting in filenames. Allows you to use national symbols in filenames; - No need for enabling multiselect mode. You can select files by clicking on the icon from the left of the filename; ATTENTION! Any useful ideas and wishes are welcome. You can send them by email or just leave a comment here. Notes: File modification in the archive it is the ability to update the file in the archive after changing it in an external program. To do this: open the file from the archive, select the application (if required), edit the file, save the changes, back to ZArchiver. Will be prompted to update the file in the archive, when you return to ZArchiver. If for some reason are not prompted to update the file, the modified file can be found on the memory card in your Android/ru.zdevs.zarchiver.pro/temp/. Mini FAQ: Q: What password? A: The contents of some archives may be encrypted and the archive can only be opened with the password (don't use the phone password!). Q: The program is not working correctly? A: Send me an email with detailed description of the problem. Q: How to compress files? A: Select all files, you want to compress, by clicking on icons (from the left of filenames). Click on the one of selected files and choose "Compress" from menu. Set desired options and press OK button. Q: How to extract files? A: Click on archive name and select suitable options ("Extract Here" or other).
release_text: 0.8.3 - System folders icon overlay; - Option for keep screen on; - Bug fix. 0.8.2 - Hotfix open image file from the archive. 0.8.1 - Fixed crash on some devices; - Fix support img; - Small fix. 0.8.0 - Android 5 support; - Used device themes; - Extract arc (freearc) archive; - Image preview in archive; - Extract LHA SFX archive; - Many fixes and minor improvements.

description: This is the Paid version of free Reverse RSI Calculator. Ads removed, and no trial period expiration. Reverse RSI Calculator by Screenulator.com ® This app calculates RSI values and the reverse values (future stock prices of given RSI levels), therefore allowing you to set limit or stop prices at any desired RSI levels. It supports multiple lookback periods, and RSI levels. About Relative Strength Indicator (RSI): RSI is a momentum oscillator that measures the speed and change of price movements. It is considered by many to be the single best indicator for Swing Trading by professional traders. It is considered overbought when above 70 and oversold when below 30. It can be used in varying degree of time frame - from day trading to long term investing. Most frequently used time periods are 2, 14, and 30 days. This App lets user enter any stock symbol, or company name with auto-complete text box, shows near real time quotes and RSI values, and reverse RSI price levels. It supports stock symbols from world markets, with near real time data. - Supported markets: NASDAQ, NYSE, AMEX, TSX, Asia: HKEX, Australia, New Zealand, India (NSE), JKSE, Shenzhen, Singapore, Europe: London, Paris, Brussels, Amsterdam, Milan, Madrid,

List Ease is a beautifully simple free shopping list app. Create a free shopping list, grocery list, to-do list, or any other checklist and share it with family and friends! As seen on Forbes ‘The Best Apps For Smart Black Friday Shopping’ and CNBC ‘A Stress-Free Holiday Is Only One App Away’, Grocery Shopping List Ease is the best shopping list app around! Features of Free Grocery Shopping List Ease: - Share your grocery list, checklist, or to-do list with family and friends with real time syncing – be someone’s “grocery pal”! - Sync your grocery list app to share coupons across several mobile devices - Receive push message alerts when other shoppers on your shared list are purchasing checklist items or groceries - Be reminded of shopping list items in-store by inMarket's BLE beacon (ibeacon) technology – increase your “grocery iq”! - Add groceries into our shopping list app easily and instantly using our barcode scanner - so you always “remember the milk”! - Add groceries from history – bring items from your last shopping list to your new list with just one tap - Browse a variety of new coupons added daily to help you save money - Simplify your life and save money by keeping track of already purchased items in your pantry – never run out of milk, eggs of bread again! - Manage multiple shopping lists –flip between grocery and pantry lists in seconds - This shopping list app is perfect for all event planning and holiday grocery shopping - Add quantities, measurements, prices, and additional notes to your food list items to keep your recipes perfectly organized - Mr. Listo, our free grocery list app’s mascot, is your shopping list maker companion- at home or in the supermarket! This version is without ads! Get Rummy Card game play with two or four players. Rummy is a group of matching card games notable for similar gameplay based on the matching cards of the same rank or sequence and same suit. The basic goal in any form of rummy is to build melds which consists of sets, three or four of a kind of the same rank, or runs, three or more cards in sequence, of the same suit. The original form of rummy is called Sai rummy or Basic rummy. The Mexican game of Conquian is considered by David Parlett to be ancestral to all rummy games, which itself is derived from a Chinese game called Khanhoo and, going even further back, Mahjong. You can choose in this rummy to play against one or three opponents. Play the classic game of free Rummy! Draw, knock or discard. Form melds and eliminate deadwood. It is very simple! Rummy is one of the most popular forms of rummy. Rummy is generally played by two players each receiving ten cards. Rummy, which evolved from 18th-century Whiskey Poker , was created with the intention of being faster than standard rummy. The objective in Gin Rummy is to score more points than your opponent. The basic Gin Rummy strategy is to improve one's hand by forming melds and eliminating deadwood. In standard Gin Rummy, a player may not knock unless he has 10 or fewer points of deadwood. He must knock, a Gin Rummy term, if he has 0 points of deadwood. Knocking with 0 points of deadwood is known as going Gin or having a Gin, while knocking with deadwood points is known as going down in Gin Rummy. gin rummy.. So do not wait and download and play now the rummy card game Enjoy playing the free rummy card game!

Voice Recorder Voice Recorder is simple voice recording application. It is very easy to use Dictaphone application with main function of recording voice. With voice recorder application you will turn your Android mobile phone to Dictaphone! Why would you write to notes, when you can simply play record button and record your sound with this voice recording application. But with my voice recorder application you will be able to send your recordings via eMail or any other service. So this application is voice messenger. You can share recordings via DropbBox and all Voice Recorder is synced with your computers and other mobile devices. All recordings are saved at your SD card inside of your phone. So you can search records via file managers. When you finish making voice record you can simply set name of your recorder voice file and you will know anytime what the recording is about. Another feature in this application is setting the category of recorded voice memo. This way you can separate voice memos and know which is for what part of the day. All files are recorded in .3gp format and you can listen to theme anywhere!

Recycling is necessary to keep our planet clean, we all know that. But, have you ever considered that picking up the trash might also be a fun thing to do? Are you ready to take the ultimate challenge and save our planet? Play the game and become the Master of Recycling! Beware, it won’t be easy. Careless people have filled the sky with all kinds of litter. Will you be able to recognize which waste falls into the correct recycling category? First four levels challenge you to separate the trash precisely in only 1 minute. Every time you make a mistake and pick up the red bag or collect the trash that is not the part of your current mission your score will lower. Pay attention when you see a storm coming, it might change your focus! When you learn enough, you progress to the biggest challenge awaiting. The final level truly tests your recycling expertise. While the sky fills with all sorts of waste instructions change each time you see the storm coming. Be careful to avoid the lethal rocks and not to lose gas, otherwise your mission will come to an end. So, what are you waiting for? Tilt you iphone left and right and catch as much nasty trash as you possibly can. The planet needs you!

Fast action shooter game for Android platform from Ficus Frenzy Games. Rabbits Beware brings funny cartoon graphics and fast paced action to your Android mobile phone. You play a role of a farmer who must defend his crops from being eaten by freaky rabbits. They come in all colors and sizes but with a single mission: to eat or destroy your vegetables. You can use your gun or help from your friend the DOG to exterminate rabbits and live in peace again on your beautiful farm. Game is accompanied with fast country music and great visual effects. Day and night levels bring a lot of satisfaction to player who can also earn many achievements and compare them with friends. Rabbits Beware!

description: Do you want to reboot and your rom doesn't have that shortcut? Do you want to enter the recovery and you don't want to enter the line manually into the terminal? Do you want to enter your bootloader to use fastboot and there is no way reboot into it? Now also including a Soft Reboot and Safe Mode reboot options! Be afraid no more! This simple application gives you 5 shortcuts to do all these tasks without having to type it into command lines. You just need root permissions and you're good to go!!! It only does what it's advertised, nothing else. Can't be easier than this.
release_text: v4p11: 1 - Add Shutdown option 2 - Fix a bug that prevented the app to scroll down v4p10 1 - Add Soft Reboot option to reload the UI without hard rebooting the device 2 - Add option to reboot into Safe Mode 3 - Now sending a system broadcast that the device is going to reboot so that it safely flushes any outstanding data for a clean reboot operation 4 - Decrease the priority of the background threads of each request to prevent any type of starvation

description: 상위 1%만 보는 운세를 무료로 이용해보세요! ▶▶총 9개의 무료운세 테마구성◀◀ ✔오늘의운세 하루의 기운을 미리알고 활용하는 지혜! 하루의 운세가 모여 한달 그리고 일년 평생의 운세가 되는 것입니다. 하루의 운이란 좋고 나쁨보다는 기운에 알맞은 활용을 생각해야 합니다. 하루를 알차게 계획하시어 평생 성공의 습관을 가지시기 바랍니다. ✔주간종합운세 한주간의 흐름을 한눈에 파악하고 활용하는 방법. 일주일 동안의 실생활에 직접적인 도움이 되고자 총론/재물운/로또운세/애정/건강/처방전 등 6가지 테마로 구성하였습니다. 운의 흐름을 미리 확인하시고 활기찬 한 주를 준비하시기 바랍니다. ✔월간종합운세 한달동안 나의 운세를 관리하자! 올해의 운세가 좋거나 나쁘다고 모든달이 또한 좋거나 나쁜것은 아닙니다. 용신의 판별과 분석을 통하여 이달의 총론을 제시하고 다섯가지 테마를 설정하여 세부적인 보충설명을 첨가하였습니다. 실생활의 적용과 좋지않은 기운을 변화시킬 행동양식을 주로하여 설명하였으며 또한 매일의 재정흐름과 이달중 반드시 피해야하는 날을 사주카렌다로 제시하였습니다. ✔로또1등비법운 행운은 결코 우연이 아닙니다! 자신의 기운과 부합되는 상수역학의 근본. 기운이 부족하면 이를 충당하며 기운이 넘치면 이를 부합하게 해주는 수의 논리 가볍게 지나치기에는 숫자에 대한 비밀이 너무 많습니다. 주간운세와 각 요일별 운세 그리고 정예화 하여 다섯 가지 형태로 살펴 본 숫자궁합을 살펴 보시기 바랍니다. ✔벼락부자비법 재물의 흐름을 파악하는 특별 사주 분석! 나에게 타고난 부자운은 과연 얼마나 되는 것인가? 오직 재물의 운용과 활용 관점에서만 분석된 상황사주분석 부자와 거지팔자는 동일하다는 사실을 알고 계십니까? 시기를 활용하는 현자만이 사주에 숨겨진 부자의 기운을 이용할 수 있습니다. 때와 시기 그리고 무엇을 어떻게를 알면 부자의 길을 보실 수 있습니다. ✔토정비결 원본 토정 이지함님의 술서를 바탕으로하여 144괘를 현대적 의미로 알기쉽게 재해석. 인생의 길흉지사를 144괘로 분석하여 이를 재해석한 현대역학의 새로운 비결. 천년비서가 과거의 역학이었다면 현대는 새로운 역학적 패러다임을 가져야 합니다. 한 해를 새롭게 살아가는 이정표가 되시기를 기원합니다. 참고로 토정비결과 신년운세는 서로 다른 역학으로 해석적 범주가 틀리다는 것을 명심하시기 바랍니다. ✔자식교육 효율적인 자녀관리를 위한 지침서! 자녀의 효율적인 관리를 위하여 자녀의 교육방법과 관리방법을 서술하였습니다. 사회성, 수행성, 감수성, 수학능력, 사고력등을 통한 효율적인 자녀를 관리하시기 바랍니다. ✔좋은날받기 길일과 흉한날을 같이 제시하여 활용가치를 높였습니다. 각 개인의 사주적인 특성을 철저히 분석하여 개인의 입장에서 해석합니다. 단순히 길한 날과 흉한날을 벗어나 길한 날을 잡기위한 방법까지 제시할 수 있습니다. ✔사상오행 동양의 전통적 분류법인 목(木),화(火),토(土),금(金),수(水) 와 음양, 체질을 결합한 분석툴 개인 마다 음양, 오행, 체질, 남여가 다르듯 이를 반영하여 사람의 성격을 총 40가지로 분류하여 다양하게 표현되어집니다. 사주를 모르더라도 개인의 이름과 생일만으로 분석이 가능합니다. 자신도 모르고 있었던 정확한 성격을 알아볼 수 있습니다. Countdown timer for various trainings. Interval Training Timer is an invaluable tool for all interested in workout and training. Just set up any number of workout and rest intervals and you're ready to maximize your training results. It doesn't matter what workout you do - whether you run, use it for cycling, sprint, tabata, weightlifting, hiit, cardio, boxing or martial arts. It is suitable also for lot of "home trainings" like the ones found on bodyrock.tv! It can also fully substitute your Gymboss interval timer or other timers you'd otherwise need to carry in gym! The best thing is that this app is always with you, because it's on your phone. You can always set your own training schedule with number of rounds, workout time and rest time. Before exercise you can set up preparation time and after you finish use relax time for cooldown. Import, Export, Download and Upload your training plans! http://itimer.info - This site is a great addition to Android app itself. You can find here all the information about Interval Timer, some tips & tricks, all the user uploaded training plans and many more. Check it out after you're done with your workout. Interval Training Timer: - Logs of your training - Gives you awards as you workout - Allows you to set own sounds, vibrations and colors - Is ready for import and export of your exercises, stats and awards to SD card - Allows you to download and upload the training to the Internet - And share them with the world! - Combine various training into one long session in Extended Training Tip: If you hear the counter through the external speakers even when the headphones are plugged in - you can always go to the preferences and un-check the "Use alarm volume". !! Tip: If your background music is disrupted with every sound timer makes, you just have to disable "use alarm volume" in options If you are willing to help me translate this app into your language, send me an email ;) Free AD supported version! homepage: http://halmi.sk Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Interval-Training-Timer-for-Android/134782373239031 Google+: https://plus.google.com/u/0/+TheRootko/ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/TheRootko/
release_text: 2.3.1 - Fix for working in background when sounds are switched off. Logs unfinished trainings. Long-tap and move up-down to change the order in Extended Training (Android 4.0 and above). Long tap and move left-right to delete training from Extended training (Android 4.0 and above). 2.3.0 - fix of colors, preparation for data export for New Interval Timer

description: Aplikácia O2 Extra výhody umožňuje zákazníkom mobilného operátora O2 Slovensko využívať výhody a zľavy od rôznych partnerov priamo zo svojho mobilného telefónu. Aplikácia poradí, kde sa nachádzajú najbližší partneri. Ponuky je možné vyhľadávať podľa kategórií alebo priamo na mape vo svojom okolí. The O2 extra edge allows customers to mobile operator O2 Slovakia to benefit from the advantages and discounts from various partners right from your mobile phone. Aplikácia tell you where they are closest partner. Tenders can search by categories or directly on the map in your area.

description: Sketch/Draw on your Live Camera, Frame the Picture, Share it on Facebook. Load a picture from your gallery, draw on it, frame it, and share it! We are proud to announce that we have just added Coloring Book Pages and a Paint Bucket feature to Sketch Pad Pro, the premium version of Sketch Pad / Drawing Mirror. To use the paint bucket feature, tap the paint bucket once, pick your color with the color picker and start painting. To use the Coloring Book feature, just tap the coloring page and pick one of the 6 pre-loaded coloring book pages. Feel free to download your own coloring book pages and color them with the new paint bucket coloring feature. NOTE: The paint bucket does not respond to the live camera image, only what you have drawn or the picture you lave loaded. However, you can tap the Save button and load your picture to "paint" it with the paint bucket :) Check for updates often, I am adding new stuff to this app all the time. We have added the ability to switch between your cameras (if your device has more than 1 and you have android 2.3 or higher) ! If you like the Sketch Pad / Drawing Mirror you are going to LOVE Sketch Pad Pro! Now you can FRAME YOUR PICTURES and just in time for Saint Patrick's Day and Easter! We will continue to add new picture frames. Sketch Pad / Drawing Mirror now offers the following: St. Patrick's Day Picture Frame Easter Picture Frame Easter Egg Picture Frame Golden Picture Frame Wood Picture Frame Sketch and Draw on the Live camera image, Load a picture from your Gallery and Draw on it, or just draw on a black background! The Sketch Pad Pro drawing app now has a new menu item that allows you to load any picture and Draw on it without changing the original! Pick your color and start doodling. If you want to clear your picture and start over just tap the clear drawing icon. It can't get any easier than that. This is better than crayons and a coloring book to keep your kids entertained while waiting at a restaurant. If you just want to draw without the camera on, tap the Camera icon and draw without the mirror view in the background. Draw, Doodle and Sketch on your screen with Doodle Drawing Mirror and share your sketches and drawings with your friends on Facebook or Email or GMail. I hope you enjoy drawing with Sketch Pad Pro as much as I have. It really is just a lot of fun to draw on your phone / tablet. This app turns on the front facing camera and allows you to draw on top of it with your finger. Great Free Android App, your kids will love to Draw, Sketch, Doodle, and Fingerpaint on their new tablet for Christmas! Works on over 2000 Android Phones and Tablets. If you love to draw, this app allows you to select your color and start drawing Instantly! You can share your drawing on Facebook Wall with all your friend. If you have friends who like to Draw, Doodle, or Fingerpaint you can share Sketch Pad Pro with them right from the menu. Mind Trick Software hopes you enjoy drawing and finger painting with Sketch Pad Pro! The Camera feature is only available on Android version 2.3 or higher, but you can still sketch away on a black background or load a picture from your library and draw on it if you are running 2.2) Drawing Features for Sketch Pad Pro: > Draw as precisely as you like with brush widths down to 1px > Select from a pallet of 16 million possible colors > Share your Pictures on Facebook and Email > Erase the last 5 steps in your drawing Thanks for playing with Sketch Pad Pro! Some of the Pictures here are shown with ads - the actual App has NO ADS.
release_text: Whats new in Version 40: Every new feature ads more and more fun!!!! 1. Coloring Book Pages 2. Paint Bucket 3. Draw with 1px or 3px line.. Create some real artwork with these bad boys! 4. Tap the MENU button (3 dots) and you can Load ANY picture and DRAW ON IT! 5. Tap the eraser icon to erase the last line drawn (saves last 5 lines drawn) 6. tap the Color button and pick any color you can imagine to draw with!

description: College Basketball Scoreboard gives you up to the minute college basketball scores, schedules and news stories for the following conferences: ACC, Big 12, Big East, Big Ten, Conference USA, Mountain West, Pac-10 and SEC- plus Top 25 schools. Includes schedules and scores for Conference tournaments and the NCAA Tournament (March Madness). Now includes AP & BCS Polls and Conference Standings. Also includes schedules, news and scores for the following conferences: America East, American Midwest, Atlantic 10, Big Sky, Big South, Big West, Colonial Athletic (CAA), Great West, Horizon, Ivy League, Mid-American (MAC), Mid-Eastern Athletic, Metro Atlantic (MAAC), Missouri Valley, North Coast Athletic, Northeast, Ohio Valley, Patriot League, Sun Belt, Southern, Southland, Summit, West Coast & Western Athletic. Scores for these conferences are not updated every minute- scores are updated periodically throughout the games. Scores, Schedules and News are displayed by conference. Keep track of your favorite teams and your rivals all at a glance. Real time scores are officially licensed from Sports Direct. This free version is ad supported. If you don't want to see the ads, check out College Basketball Scoreboard Plus. - Custom scores feeds by conference. The ticker now shows scores from your selected conference first, then other Top 25 games. - Trash talk you rivals! Share scores and news stories via Facebook, Twitter and Email from within the app.

description: Smoothie Recipes The Best of Smoothie recipes Now on Your Android Smartphone! Have you ever wondered what the best Smoothie recipes are? Ever searched for them, and having been unable to find proper recipes, just given up on your smoothie making ambition? Did you know that smoothies aren’t all just about fruits, but they can also have milk, yogurt and syrups? In fact, you can even make smoothies using soy milk, green tea and many other health and nutritional supplements. Sounds like a healthy yet delicious gym drink doesn’t it? In fact, they can have anything that you wish them to have, as long as it is mixed with the right ingredients but from where to know the right ingredients? Or the best and the most delicious recipes for making these smoothies? Well, now, with this all new app, you have the best of these Smoothie recipes all at your fingertips. With the summer season on, smoothies are something that everyone loves. A smoothie is a blend of fresh fruit, and is easily the summer favorite beverage of many. Not only is it extremely tasty and a cool refreshing drink for the summers, but the fruits in it also give it a healthy taste. If you are drinking them just for the taste, then honey, fruits, crushed ice make up a great smoothie. And from the health point of view, a smoothie is easily one of the tastiest and healthiest recipes that you can whip up for yourself in summers. The goodness of all fruits combined to give a fantastic taste make up the refreshing drink, we all know and love as a smoothie. However, it is not as simple as it may seem. Often, one needs some Smoothie recipes in order to make a good one. However, these are not available as easily on the internet as other recipes. Hence the need for an app that can give not only the recipes, but also any additional details that may be necessary to make the best smoothies. And this is where Android’s number 1 app for these delicious Smoothie recipes comes in. This app is a one of its kind on Android, and should surely help you whip up some great fruit and delicious beverages from summer. No matter what kind of smoothie you want, this app will provide you with the best and the most suitable of recipes for the same. Some of the features that this Android App gives you include: A comprehensive list of all recipes given with proper detail It also lets you know how much time it would take to prepare the desired smoothie. Smoothie Recipes Categories: -Banana Smoothies -Blueberry Smoothies -Mango Smoothies -Orange Smoothies -Strawberry Smoothies

Myanmar Tripitaka is a traditional term used by various Buddhist sects to describe their various canons of scriptures. As the name suggests, a Tripitaka traditionally contains three "baskets" of teachings: a Sutra Pitaka, a Vinaya Pitaka and an Abhidharma Pitaka.

From now on, Office: Presentations Mobile is free to download and use, both for home use and business. Now there is no excuse to use an inferior office solution – you can have the best without paying a dime! Office: Presentations Mobile is the only presentation program for Android that lets you open, edit, and save all your PowerPoint files while preserving all formatting and content. It displays your presentations exactly like they look on your PC, even including sound, animations, and slide transitions . ► Edit and save all .ppt and .pptx files from Microsoft PowerPoint 97 up to 2013 seamlessly, without losing formatting or content ► Also opens and saves password-protected Microsoft PowerPoint files. ► Run self-playing or user-controlled slideshows ► Play sound, all object animations, animation schemes, and slides transitions during slideshows ► Export to PDF format and as collections of image files directly from within the app ► On-the-fly spell checking for English (US+UK), German, Swiss German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish, Dutch ► Access documents in Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote, and OneDrive directly from within the app. ► Many character formatting options, including bold, italic, underlined, font and size, text and background color, subscript and superscript, small caps, and all caps ► Flexible paragraph formatting: left and right indent, first-line indent, paragraph alignment, line spacing, space above/below paragraph, tabs ► Lists with bullets and automatic numbering ► Display any TrueType or OpenType font ► Insert tables and images into placeholders ► Built-in slide sorter, outline view, and notes view ► Insert, delete, duplicate, rename, and hide slides ► Automatic hyphenation in 33 languages ► Multi-level undo and redo ► Send presentations by e-mail directly from Office: Presentations Mobile in any of its file formats (PDF, PPT, PPTX, HTML, etc.) ► Menus and dialogs switchable between English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Japanese, Chinese, Russian, Hungarian, Bulgarian, Greek, and Turkish ► ... and much more! Office: Presentations Mobile is the only presentation-graphics program for Android that truly deserves its name. Check it out now, you will be amazed by its capabilities, its spotless compatibility with Microsoft PowerPoint, and its friendly user interface. Imagine this: You can start a presentation in Microsoft PowerPoint on your PC, edit it using Office: Presentations Mobile , then finish it with Microsoft PowerPoint. Everything stays intact, no formatting is lost. No other Android presentation program does this! Supported file formats: SoftMaker Presentations, Microsoft PowerPoint (PPT, POT, PPS, PPTX, POTX, PPSX, PPTM, POTM, PPSM), RTF, HTML, many image file formats Notes: If you have questions about this application, please do not post them in the ratings, but contact our support team directly: E-mail: support@softmaker.com Forum: http://www.softmaker.com/forum Web site: http://www.softmaker.com We look forward to hearing from you! You can view the built-in help pages by opening the menu and then tapping on Tools > Help . Additional tips can be found at http://www.softmaker.com/english/tipsandroid_en.htm

description: SEE EVEN MORE SCREEN SHOTS AT https://www.facebook.com/smallscreensoftware *** THIS IS THE FREE, 3-DAY TRIAL OF CHECKBOOK GENIUS! When the trial ends, buy the full version and use the Backup Center to pull any entries into the full version! *** Manage any account with a balance – checking, savings, debit cards, gift cards, even credit cards – and avoid costly bounced check fees or low balance surprises! Balance your checkbook with Checkbook Genius! And now, do it with a splash of color with the new customizable color background! Recompiled and adjusted for Android Lollipop (Version 5.0), Checkbook Genius has been around since 2009 and has helped thousands of users avoid overdraft fees not just by flagging accounts that are negative, but when they’re getting low. Low balances – you pick what’s “low” – are flagged in yellow, while zero or negative balances are flagged in red. And you can see all your accounts in one handy place! An easy-to-use interface makes it a snap to enter checks (with automatic check numbering), withdrawals, deposits, and more. If you pay bills online, there’s even a place for you to type in confirmation or reference numbers! Handle transactions you create on a monthly basis in one of two simple ways. Presets let you specify a payee and an amount, and you can edit a preset any time if changes are needed. Or create recurring transactions – you schedule for transactions to be automatically posted to the accounts of your choice, and when the post date arrives (or if it has passed), you simply approve each transaction to have it written to the account and your balance adjusted. No surprises! Reconciliation is also easy – Checkbook Genius can bring up a single screen where you can see a total of all your uncleared transactions. Then you tap another button to automatically create an adjusting entry in your checking account. If you need to clear a bunch of transactions as a batch, that’s easy, too – you can mark every transaction in your account with one action, or specify a cutoff date. Checkbook Genius also has a handy backup center, making it easy for you to migrate your Checkbook Genius data from one Android device to another. Here’s a list of some of the features in Checkbook Genius 3 for Android: (NEW!) CUSTOMIZABLE BACKGROUND COLOR. Pick a background color that suits your mood! (NEW!) PAYEE SEARCH. Find all transactions matching a particular payee. RECURRING TRANSACTIONS. Great for managing transactions that occur regularly like rent, mortgage or car payments. CONFIRMATION NUMBER FIELD. Pay a lot of bills online? Jot those confirmation or reference numbers in this new field for transactions! TABLET SUPPORT. If you have an Android tablet, you can enjoy using Checkbook Genius in the easy to view landscape mode designed for larger screens and devices! PRESETS. Presets allow you to pre-define any payee and amount combination for regular use. SCRATCH PAD. A handy place to jot down reminders, built right into the app. SORTING. Sort accounts 6 different ways, and sort transactions 8 different ways. TRANSFERS. Move funds directly between accounts. RECONCILIATION. Checkbook Genius totals up all transactions not marked as cleared. The difference is automatically added or subtracted from your account. AUTO-FILL OF PAYEES. Less typing! After entering the first two characters of a payee name, you’re presented with a list of payees. Just tap the one you want to use. CHANGEABLE LOW BALANCE INDICATOR. You can determine what is “low”. If your account’s balance drops below the figure you set, the account display appears in yellow. PASSWORD PROTECTION. Don’t feel like pattern-locking your Android phone? Create your own custom password or passcode. Stop giving money for bounced checks to your bank and know more about your money with Checkbook Genius!
release_text: New features for Version 3.1.0: - CUSTOMIZABLE COLOR BACKGROUND. Add a splash of color to the information screens by picking your own color! - PAYEE SEARCH. description: Этот сборник содержит более 16 000 анекдотов на популярные темы. Надеюсь сборник доставит удовольствие как заядлым фанам анекдотов так и простым любителям хороших шуток. Понравившийся анекдот можно добавить в избранное, скопировать в буфер, послать на смс, вконтакте, одноклассники и т.д. (любое установленное на телефоне приложение, которое принимает текст) Также есть возможность выбора анекдотов по категориям: - про авто (1353) - про армию (563) - про Вовочку (353) - анекдоты на врачебную тему (1079) - про евреев (584) - компьютерные (1058) - мужские (2664) - про политику (1037) - про праздники (256) - про блондинок (307) - про работу (1418) - разное (2974) - про семью (1782) - студенческие анекдоты (668) Надеюсь, что это приложение поможет Вам насладиться хорошими анекдотами и подарит Вам хорошее настроение! P.S. если есть замечания или предложения пишите. Спасибо This collection contains more than 16,000 jokes on popular topics. I hope the collection will delight both avid fans of anecdotes and simple lovers of good jokes.   Favorite anecdote you can add to, copy to clipboard, send sms, vkontakte, classmates, etc. (Any installed in the phone application that accepts text)   Also, there is a choice of anecdotes by category:   - About cars (1353)   - About the army (563)   - About Vovochka (353)   - Jokes on the medical theme (1079)   - About the Jews (584)   - Computer (1058)   - Men (2664)   - About politics (1037)   - About the holidays (256)   - About blondes (307)   - About the job (1418)   - Various (2974)   - About the family (1782)   - Student jokes (668) I hope that this application will help you to enjoy a good joke and will give you a good mood! P.S. if you have any comments or suggestions contact. Thank you
release_text: Удалил большое количество повторов анекдотов (более 100, прогнал через скрипт и некоторые вручную, к сожалению такое кол-во анекдотов самому не проверить). Исправлена проблема зависания приложения после обновления (проблему нашел, очень надеюсь что именно она) Исправлена проблема повторений анекдотов (в разделе Студенческие). Исправлена проблема с неправильным выводом названия категории.

description: Bible de Jérusalem (français). Ancien Testament et du Nouveau Testament. Liste des chapitres (Ancien Testament): Genèse, Exode, Lévitique, Nombres, Deutéronome, Josué, Juges, Ruth, 1 Samuel, 2 Samuel, 1 Rois, 2 Rois, 1 Chroniques, 2 Chroniques, Esdras, Néhémie, Tobie, Judith, Esther, Job, Psaumes, 1 Maccabées, 2 Maccabées, Proverbes, Ecclésiaste (or Qohélet), Cantique des Cantiques, Sagesse, Ecclésiastique, Isaïe, Jéremie, Lamentations, Baruch, Ezéchiel, Daniel, Osée, Joël, Amos, Abdias, Jonas, Michée, Nahum, Habaquq, Sophonie, Aggée, Zacharie, Malachie Liste des chapitres (Nouveau Testament): Matthieu, Marc, Luc, Jean, Actes des Apôtres, Romains, 1 Corinthiens, 2 Corinthiens, Galates, Ephésiens, Philippiens, Colossiens, 1 Thessaloniciens, 2 Thessaloniciens, 1 Timothée, 2 Timothée, Tite, Philémon, Hébreux, Jacques, 1 Pierre, 2 Pierre, 1 Jean, 2 Jean, 3 Jean, Jude, Apocalypse La Bible de Jérusalem est une traduction de la Bible élaborée sous la direction de l'École biblique et archéologique française de Jérusalem. « Réalisée par les meilleurs spécialistes des études bibliques, elle est actuellement la plus répandue en France et fait figure de classique ». Étant un ouvrage collectif, elle tombera dans le domaine public en France le 1er janvier 2027, 70 ans après la date de sa première parution. En effet, c'est en 1956 que la Bible de Jérusalem fut publiée pour la première fois en un seul et unique volume. La Bible de Jérusalem a d'abord été publiée de 1948 à 1955 sous la forme de 43 fascicules comprenant chacun la traduction, une introduction et des notes. Jerusalem Bible (French). Old Testament and New Testament. Chapter List (Old Testament):     Genesis, Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers, Deuteronomy, Joshua, Judges, Ruth, 1 Samuel, 2 Samuel, 1 Kings, 2 Kings, 1 Chronicles, 2 Chronicles, Ezra, Nehemiah, Tobit, Judith, Esther, Job, Psalms, 1 Maccabees 2 Maccabees Proverbs Ecclesiastes (or Qoheleth), Canticle of Canticles, Wisdom, Ecclesiasticus, Isaiah, Jeremiah, Lamentations, Baruch, Ezekiel, Daniel, Hosea, Joel, Amos, Obadiah, Jonah, Micah, Nahum, Habakkuk, Zephaniah, Haggai, Zechariah, Malachi List of chapters (New Testament):     Matthew, Mark, Luke, John, Acts, Romans, 1 Corinthians, 2 Corinthians, Galatians, Ephesians, Philippians, Colossians, 1 Thessalonians, 2 Thessalonians, 1 Timothy, 2 Timothy, Titus, Philemon, Hebrews, Jacques, Pierre 1 2 Peter, 1 John, 2 John, 3 John, Jude, Apocalypse    The Bible is a translation of the Bible prepared under the direction of the French Biblical and Archaeological School of Jerusalem. "Made by the best specialists in biblical studies, she is currently the most widespread in France and leads to classical." Is a collective work, it will fall into the public domain in France on 1 January 2027, 70 years after its first publication. Indeed, it was in 1956 that the Jerusalem Bible was published for the first time in a single volume.    The Bible was first published from 1948 to 1955 in the form of 43 booklets each including translation, introduction and notes.

Bíblia Ave Maria (Português). Antigo Testamento e Novo Testamento A Edição de 1819 é a primeira versão completa da tradução de João Ferreira de Almeida da Bíblia. Lista de cabeças (Antigo Testamento): Gênesis, Êxodo, Levítico, Números, Deuteronômio, Josué, Juízes, Rute, I Samuel, II Samuel, I Reis, II Reis, I Crônicas, II Crônicas, Esdras, Neemias, Ester, Jó, Salmos, Provérbios, Eclesiastes, Cântico dos Cânticos, Sabedoria, Eclesiástico, Isaías, Jeremias, Lamentações, Baruc, Ezequiel, Daniel, Oséias, Joel, Amós, Abdias, Jonas, Miquéias, Naum, Habacuc, Sofonias, Ageu, Zacarias, Malaquias Lista de cabeças (Novo Testamento): São Mateus, São Marcos, São Lucas, São João, Atos dos Apóstolos, Romanos, I Coríntios, II Coríntios, Gálatas, Efésios, Filipenses, Colossenses, I Tessalonicenses, II Tessalonicenses, I Timóteo, II Timóteo, Tito, Filêmon, Hebreus, São Tiago, I São Pedro, II São Pedro, I São João, II São João, III São João, São Judas, Apocalipse João Ferreira de Almeida O que se sabe hoje da vida de Almeida está registrado na Dedicatória de um de seus livros e nas atas dos presbitérios de Igrejas Reformadas do Sudeste da Ásia, para as quais trabalhou como pastor, missionário e tradutor, durante a segunda metade do século XVII. Nascido na cidade de Torres de Tavares, em Portugal, Almeida morreu em 1693 - na Batávia - atual ilha de Java, Indonésia. Com apenas 16 anos, João Ferreira de Almeida dá início à tarefa de tradução da Bíblia, a qual se dedica até o final de sua vida. Hoje, a tradução Almeida, feita em 1753, se encontra entre nós em diversas versões: “Versão Antiga”(Sociedade Bíblica Brasileira e outras editoras): por causa da escrupulosa fidelidade aos originais hebraico, aramaico e grego é útil para o estudo, contudo rígida demais para uso litúrgico-catequético. “Versão Corrigida” (Imprensa Batista): integra correções provindas de manuscritos melhores, atualizando levemente a linguagem. “Versão atualizada” (Sociedade Bíblica Brasileira): igualmente corrigida com base em melhores manuscritos e atualizada mais corajosamente quanto à linguagem. É a “vulgata” dos protestantes de diversas confissões no Brasil de hoje (Sociedade Bíblica do Brasil, Rio de Janeiro 1969). Existem muitas edições, para usos diferentes; vamos mencionar somente a Bíblia “Vida Nova”, provida de bom material de estudo. Bible Ave Maria (Portuguese). Old Testament and New Testament The 1819 edition is the first complete version of the translation of the King James Bible. List of heads (Old Testament):     Genesis, Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers, Deuteronomy, Joshua, Judges, Ruth, I Samuel, II Samuel, I Kings, II Kings, I Chronicles, II Chronicles, Ezra, Nehemiah, Esther, Job, Psalms, Proverbs, Ecclesiastes, Song of Canticles, Wisdom, Ecclesiasticus, Isaiah, Jeremiah, Lamentations, Baruch, Ezekiel, Daniel, Hosea, Joel, Amos, Obadiah, Jonah, Micah, Nahum, Habakkuk, Zephaniah, Haggai, Zechariah, Malachi List of heads (New Testament):     St. Matthew, St. Mark, St. Luke, John, Acts, Romans, I Corinthians, II Corinthians, Galatians, Ephesians, Philippians, Colossians, I Thessalonians, II Thessalonians, I Timothy, II Timothy, Titus, Philemon, Hebrews, St. James, St. Peter I, II St. Peter, I John, II John, III John, Jude, Revelation João Ferreira de Almeida What is known today in the life of Adams is registered in the dedication of one of his books and records of the presbyteries of Reformed Churches of South East Asia, for which he worked as a pastor, missionary and translator during the second half of the seventeenth century. Born in the town of Torres de Tavares, Portugal, Almeida died in 1693 - in Batavia - actual island of Java, Indonesia. At only 16, King James begins the task of Bible translation, which is dedicated to the end of his life. Today, the King James translation, made in 1753, is among us in several versions:     "Old Version" (Brazilian Bible Society and other publishers): because of scrupulous fidelity to the Hebrew, Aramaic and Greek documents is useful for the study, but too rigid for liturgical and catechetical use.     "Fixed Version" (Baptist Press): includes fixes stemmed the best manuscripts, slightly updating the language.     "Updated version" (Brazilian Bible Society): also corrected based on the best manuscripts and updated more boldly about language. It is the "Vulgate" the Protestants of various denominations in Brazil today (Bible Society of Brazil, Rio de Janeiro 1969). There are many editions for different uses; we mention only the Bible "New Life", provided with good study material.

app_name: Air Hockey Pro: Russia vs USA
description: Air Hockey pro is great android sport game, the theme of our air hockey pro is universal. Russia vs USA is our beautiful theme for our air hockey pro game. Do you like to play air hockey android sport game and you want to play against the computer or against your best friend? Download air hockey pro now, play, enjoy, and have lots of fun. You could find similar games in the store... But none of the games is like our game! We worked on every last detail so that your air hockey experience is as close to the real thing as possible! Player vs Player Player vs Computer Different level of Hardness Features: ✓ Real life physics; you will not believe how real it feels! ✓ Quality Graphic. ✓ 1/2 Players choice; supports 2 players in the same device ✓ Option to adjust difficulty ✓ Option to adjust colors for all elements; just tap on the element (striker/Puck) to change it in the settings screen. ✓ Easy controls (Smooth and very responsive) ✓ Supports Android 3.2 or above. ✓ Compatible with both Phone and Tablet! Please contact us with you feedback's and your propositions, so we can update our game properly by your demands.

Finally on Android, the first game simulating a flight on Cezna 172 and 182! Features: - 3 different tipes of view - Cockpit View - Airplane View - Tower View - 2 airports - Realistic terrain. - Very realistic physics - Using Nasa’s utility FoilSim 3 to calculate angles. - Other aircrafts and ballons in the air. - World is really huge! Enjoy the experience of real flight a Cezna 172 in your hands!

The number-match game that inspired 2048 & many others with completely different play style! TO PLAY: Slide same numbers together to add them. New numbers then drop down to fill the board. Play until no more moves. YOUR GOAL: Get highest score possible! Learn in seconds, hooked in minutes. However, it will take months if not longer to master it. This is the game that will keep your brain sharp and spinning for a lifetime! If you enjoyed 2048, you will love this game and see how it is much more strategic, addictive and challenging! Play and Play Again to achieve personal best and compete on GameCenter Leaderboard! Want to have fun later on? Your progress is saved automatically! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ HOW TO PLAY & MASTER POWER OF 2! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ - Slide two identical numbers together to add them up. - A new, random number then drops down to keep the board filled - Play till there is no more moves - Create larger numbers to earn more score and coins - Coins can be used to activate power ups! - It's a simple game that takes time to master. While a beginner's game could end in minutes, a master's game could last hours or days! You don't have to finish it in one sitting, since your progress are always saved as you play! - To master the game, you may have to even think 10 steps ahead. Kind of like a chess game, for one person. - With a perfect strategy, you will earn enough coins for your spending needs. In-App Purchases are available and completely optional. - Challenge yourself and others on Gamecenter Leaderboard. This is a game that measures your brain power, and improves it as you play. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ "Power of 2!" is brought to you by veteran puzzle game development team Thinkcube Inc. Like us on facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ThinkCubeGames Try our other puzzle games like "Hexic Flow", "Slide & Roll", "Glow Free", "Blockbuster" and more! Love our game? Share it with your friends! Comments? Feedback is always welcome!

app_name: How to Make a FaceTime Call
description: Phone calls can be so impersonal. All you get is crackling audio, with no images to liven things up. With FaceTime, you can take your phone calls into the 21st century. Use it to video chat with your grandparents across the country or with your best friend down the street. Follow this easy guide to use FaceTime on your iPad.

Our life’s rhythm dictates us to manage our time with wide spectrum of schedulers and reminders. The cloud solution for your personal assistant is optimal way to support your personal reminder/scheduler experience on all your gadgets with one service transparently. No problems with battery discharge or device loss. TimeAct is a plain to-do list and simple personal assistant service to manage your time. TimeAct is free of charge application with Android (higher v.2.2) and Web platforms support ( http://www.timeact.biz ). The light, transparent, intuitive user interface of this app is the best choice for people who loves minimalism. Main features: 1. Personal scheduler, to-do list. 2. Group scheduler (family, small business). All devices are synchronizing with one TimeAct account. 3. Project scheduler. The project supports list of tasks. A person or group is responsible for task. 4. Simple synchronizing with push notifications support. 5. SMS-Assistant is a new feature, which helps automatically create new tasks from incoming sms with future's date inside. (e.x. "CitiBank, Please pay your monthly fee till 10/4/2013").

Includes 50 pictures to colour in, photo decorator where you can draw on your own photos and add stickers, letter and number tracing templates and black and white backgrounds for drawing and sketching. Features: Fun, age appropriate topics: animals, professions, sports, nature, etc. Option of saving creations, possibility of importing images, limited colour palette, a number of backgrounds to draw on, eraser to rub out and undo option as well as lots of illustrations to colour in. ABOUT US: PaquitoLand from Imaginarium This application is part of PaquitoLand, the content platform from Imaginarium. As a company, we have been playing with children for more than 20 years. We have set ourselves the task of creating the best applications for concerned parents who want quality content for their children, and which enable young children - the digital natives - to enjoy all that these technologies have to offer.. PaquitoLand: content platform from Imaginarium. Visit us and discover the best and most carefully selected collection of ebooks, games, Apps, TV series, films, music and audio books for children. ABOUT US: i-wow from Imaginarium i-wow is a new dimension for playing and learning in which the physical and digital worlds merge. The best technology adapted to the learning and entertainment needs of children.

L'applicazione gratuita dello Stardust Village di Roma offre gli orari completi di tutti i film in programmazione, sia quelli odierni che quelli dei prossimi giorni. Puoi consultare le trame dei film, vedere i trailer e prenotare i migliori posti in sala, selezionandoli direttamente sulla mappa posti. L'applicazione mostra in tempo reale gli orari della biglietteria del cinema, per essere sempre aggiornata sulle ultime novità e variazioni: nel caso la biglietteria del cinema non fosse raggiungibile (adsl guasta), l'applicazione mostrerà un messaggio di mancato collegamento, ma gli orari torneranno appena il collegamento sarà ripristinato. Questo può succedere usando un collegamento in tempo reale, ma abbiamo preferito questa scelta per poter presentare sempre le informazioni più aggiornate. I nuovi orari dei film vengono impostati nelle biglietterie del cinema ogni mercoledì, per il periodo compreso tra giovedì e mercoledì della settimana seguente. Scaricando l'applicazione dichiari di accettare la Privacy Policy consultabile al seguente indirizzo: http://tixproduction.com/home/informativa-sulla-privacy.html The free application of Stardust Village of Rome offers a complete timetable of all current films, both those of today and those of the next few days. You can see the plots of movies, see the trailer and book the best seats in the room, selecting them directly on the map places. description: As the administrator of a Pivot server system, you would like to know at anytime and anywhere, whether your system is up and running without any problems or, if problems occur, what the problems are and its severity to decide whether an immediate interaction is necessary.
