You see status information of your system as well as health status of the various Pivot Apps at one glance, which allows for immediate interaction. Requires the Xposed Framework . Grab it at http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1574401 and make sure it runs properly on your device. ROOT only required for installing the Xposed Framework, it can be dropped afterwards. This app patches several vulnerability issues found on Android collectively known as 'Master Key' exploits: - bug 8219321 - bug 9695860 - bug 9950697 In general terms, these allow exploiting signed APKs by replacing the code they contain while maintaining the existing signature valid (hence the term 'Master Key'), leading you to think the original author is someone you trust. The original Android sources have been corrected to fix these problems, but it might take a while till stock ROMs include the fixes, if ever. To check if you're vulnerable, you can use other apps available on the store such as SRT AppScanner (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.backessrt.appintegrity) or Bluebox Security Scanner (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bluebox.labs.onerootscanner). Note : If using Bluebox Security Scanner, make sure to force a refresh on the app once the fix is applied, otherwise you might get a cached and incorrect result. For any questions or to support my work, please visit http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2365294
release_text: 2.0 - Fix bug 9950697; additional corrections taken from Android 4.4 1.3 - Fixed problems with parsing some zips depending on the rom original code 1.2 - Added 2 additional zip entry integrity checks that were missing 1.1 - Support for additional devices with modified core libraries (e.g. MTK6589)

description: Official app for channel Hromadske TV - Watch live stream from Hromadske.tv, translated from Ukrainian "Public TV" - See past videos - Push notifications with updates from the Hromadske.tv team Hromadske.TV is an Internet television station in Ukraine that started to operate on 22 November 2013. The project was announced in June 2013 by 15 journalists. The idea originated from journalist Roman Skrypin in September 2012. After the April 2013 ownership dispute at TVi 31 journalists resigned from TVi on 29 April 2013, they believed as TVi employees they could not anymore "guarantee our audience to provide objective and unbiased information". They then announced on 30 April 2013 to set up a "web project in which we will do the same job". Your suggestions for the app https://hromadsketv.uservoice.com

description: Readability Bookmarklet could help you create a browser bookmarklet, which can trigger a script to makes reading on the Web more enjoyable. app_name: 背單字-Android 手機學英語 初級單字篇 Free
description: 『 初級單字篇 Free (初級體驗版) 』，最方便實用的背單字App， 請更新至最新版本，『約2,200筆 初級單字、4000筆以上的例句』全部上架，不論是單字模式與測驗模式皆可離線使用！ 如果您安裝後沒有聲音，或是按下『播放』鈕後，單字快速往下跑，或是單字拼音時有奇怪的發音、發音不好聽，表示您的『TTS語音』未安裝、設定錯誤、或是目前使用的TTS無法完全支援您的手機，請更換不同版本的『TTS語音』。 由於部份TTS語音不支援『單字拼音』的發音，所以取消預設播放『單字拼音』功能，請使用者自行於app開啟。 www.learning.idv.tw 有詳細操作說明與TTS安裝方式，非常感謝您的使用與支持。 英文要學好，單字不可少，讓Android機器人陪你(妳)走到哪、背到哪。 用聽的背單字，反覆記憶最有效！打破背單字一定要看書的傳統方式。這種重覆式大腦記憶法能更有效的熟記單字，同時達到訓練聽力並更精準的了解單字的使用方式。 用聽的背單字，讓您善用「耳朵」的記憶力來學習單字！不論是在坐公車、搭捷運、走路、…，善用生活上的零碎時間，讓學習無所不在，照樣說一口道地英語！ 單字不是萬能，沒有單字是萬萬不能。Android手機學英語-單字篇，參考「財團法人語言訓練測驗中心公布的7000單字」，重新分類整理與編輯出適合國人考試、生活、出國旅遊、工作進修的核心單字，廣泛地適用於一般的初學者、國中生、高中生、大學生、社會人士，有系統的聯想式記憶法，有效幫助使用者快速累積單字量。背單字功力迅速倍增。 Android手機學英語軟體，總共分成三個正式版本與三個體驗版本：初級體驗版、中級體驗版、中高級體驗版、初級、中級、中高級。 目前開放『初級體驗版』、『中級體驗版』於Android Market 免費提供下載與試用，初級正式版、中級正式版供付費使用，其它版本將陸續上線。 Free版本與正式版差異：目前除了廣告之外完全相同。未來正式版會增加完整版的『真人語音』、『自建單字庫』功能。 以下是版本說明與下載連結： ◎初級正式版(約2,200字，4000筆以上的例句)：適用於全民英檢初級、國中小考試。 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tw.idv.learning.VocabularyBasic ◎初級體驗版 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tw.idv.learning.Vocabulary ◎中級正式版(約2,600字，3600筆以上的例句)：適用於全民英檢中級、高中考大學必考單字【基礎篇】。 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tw.idv.learning.VocabularyIntermediate ◎中級體驗版 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tw.idv.learning.VocabularyIntermediateFree ◎中高級(約3,200字)：適用於全民英檢中高級、高中考大學必考單字【進階篇】，會在初級與中級正式版下載破萬後推出。 Android手機學英語-單字篇-軟體內容： 1.完整收錄全民英檢必備單字與片語，每個單字均詳列 KK音標、DJ音標、多筆完整的實用例句與中文解釋，讓您能更輕鬆的理解單字詞義與用法。 您還在用沒有音標與單字例句的單字書嗎？不要做沒有效率的學習，快來試試 Android手機學英語-單字篇。 2.『用聽的背單字』，不只是唸單字與例句，Android機器人還會拼單字的字母給你(妳)聽喔。TTS語音清楚唸出每個單字的發音，讓您背單字，不用看畫面，只要用聽的，輕鬆記單字！ 自由設定『單字發音與拼音次數』、『單字例句播放次數』，以及『上一筆單字播放』、『下一筆單字播放』、『全篇單字播放』。藉由獨創的重複聽力背誦學習法，讓您輕鬆背記單字。 3.所有單字都經過系統化編排，字母依A~Z排序，方便查詢與背誦。 除了內建的單字庫，每個單字還可以直接上網查詢喔。 4.每個單字皆附一筆或一筆以上的實用例句，是同類產品中單字例句最多最詳盡的App，活學活用、輔助理解加強記憶。 一個單字常常具有數種不同的意思與用法。Android手機學英語-單字篇 藉由不同的例句、詞性與中文解釋，讓您不僅可以增加單字量、還可以了解單字不同的用法與意義，讓背單字更有效率。 5.『測驗模式』，系統化檢視您的學習成效，只有實戰才能真正的靈活運用，讓你的英文功力在考場與職場上完全展現！ 獨創的單字測驗模式，不只測驗中文解釋、英文單字拼音、還可以測驗聽力，學習成效立即呈現！ 目前提供的測驗模式：『中翻英』、『英翻中』、『拼字測驗』、『模擬試題』，歡迎您來挑戰！ 6.每筆單字可標記熟練度。 藉由是否顯示已背誦的單字的功能，驗證記憶成效並方便背誦，讓您輕鬆背英文單字。 7.完全適用國內各類英檢考試。 例如國中基測、推薦甄試、大學學測與指考、二技、四技、公職考試，以及托福(TOEFL iBT)、SAT、GRE、全民英檢初(GEPT)、多益(TOEIC)。快速提昇您的字彙能力，讓您變成字彙達人。 8.好用的播放與查詢介面。 App將每個單字皆標上編號，方便查找。同時使用『手指快播方式』或是『點選上一筆與下一筆的方式』，讓您隨時預習、複習單字。 9.已內建好完整的單字庫，不需要另行下載與安裝，真正可離線使用的背單字App，只要配合您的英文程度選擇適合的單字書。 在單字軟體上自建單字資料庫要花多久的時間！不要再做沒有效率的事，Android手機學英語-單字篇分三種資料庫，適合全民英檢初級、中級、中高級與各類考試。 建議您以下列順序學習： 1.藉由『中文解釋』與『單字例句』了解單字的字義。 如果資料庫上的範例不足，可以直接使用線上字典查詢(目前提供六個網站查詢，版權為各公司所有)。 2.練習單字發音。 參考『TTS語音』、『KK音標』與『DJ音標』唸出每個單字的正確發音。 3.語音設定，將單字不斷重覆播放，用聽的背單字。 請將『播放單字拼音』打鉤，並設定適合自已的『單字發音與拼音次數』、『單字例句播放次數』。 Android手機學英語 - 單字篇，是一套符合國人學習使用的手持裝置軟體，主要特色是可以在手機與平版電腦上，利用零碎時間學習，用最新式的聽力學習法背單字。 版本進度：由於台灣的Google Market付費平台暫時關閉，作者也停滯了一年沒有更新版本。2013年2月底，付費平台已開放，近期已在加速開發與更新App。 長期版本規劃：開發托福單字版本、商用英文單字版本。 常見問題回覆： 聽不到聲音、級別分類、機器人語音難聽、沒唸出中文、自行設定例句要發音與否、字體大小與音標。 1.按『播放』後，頁面一直跑，聽不到聲音。解決方式：安裝TTS (text to speech) TTS 設定， 可參考網址 http://www.learning.idv.tw/mobile/list.aspx?main=180 有少數低階手機使用者無法完整安裝TTS語音，請耐心等候作者完成真人語音功能，即可解決此問題，未來也不需要安裝TTS語音。 在 設定 -> 語音輸入與輸出裝置 -> 文字轉語音設定 -> 引擎 引擎可使用『Pico TTS』、『SVOX』或『eSpeak TTS』。 如果您的『安裝語音資料』為淡灰色，表示沒有安裝成功，請先點選『安裝語音資料』後，會連到Android Market的『SpeechSynthesis Data...』，再安裝此App，即可完成Pico TTS的安裝。 『eSpeak TTS』安裝連結 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.googlecode.eyesfree.espeak 『SVOX』安裝連結 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.svox.classic 2.機器人語音很難聽。在真人語音未完成前，可試試不同的TTS，也有不錯的效果。 3.沒有唸出中文。中文的發音與真人語音會一起製作，希望能趕在年底一起發佈。 4.自行設定例句要發音與否。本軟體可自行設定例句與單字拼音要發音與否，還可以設定例句與單字拼音的播放次數。 5.字體大小與音標的設定，本軟體可自行設定字體大小，是否顯示單字範例、KK音標、DJ音標。 備註： 作者發佈軟體皆經過很多的測試，但身邊的測試設備不足，無法完整測試完所有設備與不同的Android版本，還請各位朋友能體諒，並在使用的過程協助回報問題與機器設備。 意見反應網址： http://www.learning.idv.tw/mobile/contactUs.aspx 操作上有任何問題、單字內容錯誤、系統錯誤、手機相容性問題、相關建議，都非常歡迎您來網站反應，非常感謝您的支持。 如果您覺得本軟體對您有幫助，請到Android市集撰寫評論，幫作者打打氣。
release_text: V1.25修正離線廣告 11/28：V1.24修正範例中文翻譯 09/11：V1.23解決測驗模式時的畫面刷新錯誤，增加完整的範例中文翻譯 07/15：V1.21新增範例的中文翻譯、同一字母可不分段、測驗的答案改成隨機出題 05/26：桌機版網站啟用 04/24：V1.20測驗模式的美工與當機修正 04/14：V1.19播放時文字變色 V1.18增加TTS安裝說明、更新操作說明 V1.17增加購物連結、修正單字庫內容 V1.14：增加螢幕的支援度。 V1.13：更新資料庫，約2,200單字全部上架、修正TTS安裝頁面、新增網路單字查詢 V1.12：修正資料庫 V1.11：新增拼字測驗 V1.10：新增模擬試題 V1.09：新增英翻中 V1.08：新增中翻英 V1.07：修正單字本『E』的錯誤 V1.06：增加例句2000筆以上 V1.05：修正Google字典 V1.04：修改操作提示 V1.02：增加音量控制、TTS安裝、工作室網站連結 V1.01：App上架 未來陸續加入功能： 測驗完成後增加統計報表 自建單字庫 測驗模式也加入語音 強化美編 真人語音 同義字、相反字

description: 【姓名】是每個人的第一張名片，其音形義具有一定的訊息能量，【吉祥】對於華人而言，就像水之於魚，天之於鳥，氣之於人。有鑑於此，本團隊請教多位命理大師、姓名權威專家，研究漢字組合藝術，輸入姓氏後，由系統自動幫您挑選多筆符合命理五行、數理格局、音形義俱佳的吉祥名字，對一個人的健康、婚姻、事業有極強的靈動力和暗示力，增進人與社會的和諧相處。內建數萬筆姓名字庫，包含姓名命理分析、字義解釋、姓名讀法。 　　本程式繁、簡體均適用，分為五大部分： 1.吉祥起名 2.周易姓名五格吉凶算命 3.稱骨算命 4.姓名筆畫說明 5.萬年曆(新曆-農曆)。 　　生辰八字算命採用袁天罡稱骨算命法，輸入西曆生日時辰，系統會自動轉換成農曆，根據農曆的出生年月日與時辰，能夠確定一個人一生的吉凶禍福、榮辱盛衰，讓人能夠趨吉避凶。 　　姓名五格吉凶算命採用五格剖象法，輸入繁體字或簡體字均適用，也就是根據易經的"象"、"數"理論，依據姓名的筆劃數和一定的規律建立起的五格數理關係，並且運用陰陽五行相生相剋的道理，推算人生各方面的運勢，可當作後代子女取名的參考。 　　生肖分析部分，是以出生年所屬的生肖，分析一個人的基本性格與命理，並且根據當年生肖分析當年運勢。 　　萬年曆包含西曆與農曆對照，並且標出農曆二十四節氣，適用年分從西元1901到2100。
release_text: V 1.06 修正日期在新曆一月份時,生肖分析產生的錯誤

Recent Change: V1.1 fix reinstall problem V1.2.4 fix reinstall to new phone or new ROM V1.3.0 Froyo move to SD V1.3.6 Add search function v1.5.5 Fix failure app icon and app name on Foryo v1.5.7 It'll default show all backup apps in the backup list. v1.5.9 Show backup status v1.6.0 Can backup apps that are moved in SD card. v1.6.1 Backup list sort by name and add search function v1.7.2 Fix Size problem v1.7.3 Fix FC on android1.5 v1.7.4 Add backup list button

Air Waves is a "one to many" local radio broadcasting service which could be used for many things such as live translations for an audience, a baby monitor or a 2-way intercom/walkie-talkie. Prior to creating this app, we had looked into alternatives. The translation system we were almost about to pay for cost nearly $8,000. That included only a transmitting station, microphones and 4 headset devices. With Air Waves, we paid (in $AUD): - wireless N150 router ($60) - $120 for x2 cheap Android phones to test our setup with - $20 for x2 in-ear Sony headphones - $0 to bring your own additional listening device So for $200 we've provided the same service which an $8,000 system would have, except Air Waves is easier to set up and far cheaper if we need more headsets. *** How to use it *** It doesn't get much simpler than this! BROADCASTER: Click on the microphone to immediately start broadcasting. LISTENER: Simply click on the headphone icon and choose the channel/language you want. Note: all devices need to be on the same WiFi network. *** Advanced usage *** - Press menu to set your device name - Press menu to enable/disable audio playback via headset (for speaker) *** Hardware required *** - At least 2 phones with Android 2.1+ installed. - A router with wireless capabilities (preferably at least N standard) - (optional) Some headphones and/or microphone for better audio quality *** NOTES *** I've been testing this at Ecclesia Mission Hills church (translation service) every Sunday for a few months and it's at the stage where I'm ready to release it into the wild to check for devices compatibility. I've only tested on a handful of phones, simply because I can't afford to buy every phone in the market. Below are the phones which are known to work with Air Waves: - HTC Droid Incredible 2 - HTC One X - Nexus 4 - Samsung i9000, S2, S III, Note II, S III Mini, S4 (SCH-I545 Verizon) - Sony xperia X10 mini - Xiaomi Mi 2S - ZTE T12/Telstra Uno Some additional advice: - Note that both the broadcaster and audience must be on the SAME wireless network. - There is notably less audio latency on Android +4.1 devices as Google has fixed up some audio processing issues. - If you use a hands free microphone, the microphone you use will affect recording quality. Garbage in = garbage out - Each broadcasting device has different methods of noise cancellation. Pick the one which works best for you. - Each listener will use approximately 20Kbps, so please ensure your broadcasting device can handle the given number of listeners. See below for a detailed breakdown. - Lite version can only broadcast for 2mins. You can get the full version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=twig.nguyen.airwaves.pro *** *** Wireless network speed *** Theoretical vs actual and the number of supported listeners. * Wireless G 54Mbps (actual 20Mbps) = 2,700 listeners * Wireless N 150Mbps (actual 40Mbps) = * Wireless N 300Mbps (actual 50Mbps) = * Wireless AC 1300Mbps (actual 85Mbps) = Formula: number of listeners = (actual Mbps * 1024) / 20Kbps *** Currently working on *** - random halts in receiving broadcast - automatically reconnect to server - use non-blocking IO *** DISCLAIMER! *** If you have any problems, EMAIL ME. I'm still in the process of testing so please feel free to try it out and email me your feedback. I don't use reviews/comments as a form of "bug reports". AirWaves is currently in testing. Please do NOT rely on Air Waves for something important. ************************ *** Releases *** v1.01 - bumped required Android level to 2.2 (name change dialog breaks on 2.1, only used for internal testing) - fixed crash on exit v1.00 - Initial release (testing for device compatibility)
release_text: v1.11: - if broadcaster presses stop while listeners are connected, prompts speaker if they want to disconnect listeners v1.10: - fixed issue with listeners being unable to find broadcast when broadcaster locks screen - added permission android.permission.WAKE_LOCK to prevent recording/wifi stopping when screen locked - rewrote the broadcast into a service, no longer stops when switching to another app - lots of code restructuring for future planned updates

description: If you want to simply read your source code with syntax highlighting, look up snippets or cool solutions on-the-go then Code Peeker is for you! It's a great little code reader (note: not read, NOT an editor) that enhances current coding knowledge by highlighting your past coding expertise. This app has been selected to be part of the Google Play for Education program and currently used in schools as a teaching aid. With Code Peeker you can share coding success tricks during a job-interview or meetings. It'll make you look much better than promising "I don't know. Let me get back to you on that one". Code Peeker will open and highlight any supported code language (and unicode/utf-8) you throw at it. It'll also: - Mark the line number - Provides a built-in file browser (in case your phone doesn't have one) - Opens from both external SD and internal memory! - Supports other file browsers (Dropbox, File Expert, FX, Astro File Manager, etc) Code Peeker Pro includes: - Theming capabilities for easy reading - Access to recently opened files - Shortcut widgets to quickly open files straight from the home screen - Ability to map unrecognised file extensions to known syntax formatting It supports a wide variety of new and old languages such as: - C/C++ (c, cc, cpp, h, hpp) - C# (c-sharp, csharp, cs) - CSS - Java - JavaScript (js, jscript) - PHP - Python (py) - Ruby (rails, ror) - XML (xml, xaml, xslt, html, xhtml) - ActionScript 3 (as3) - AppleScript - Cold Fusion - Delphi/Pascal - Diff/patch files - Erlang - Groovy - JavaFX (jfx) - Perl (pl) - PowerShell (ps) - Sass - Scala - SQL - Terminal scripts (bash, shell, sh, rc, conf) - Visual Basics (vb, vbnet) - Verilog & System Verilog (v, sv) If Code Peeker can't recognize the file extension, it'll give you the option to select a format or show the source as plain text (no color highlighting, but at least you still can read it). Got a feature request or a file that won't highlight properly? Just contact me via email (It's hard to communicate via Play Store comments) IMPORTANT: - It is 100% free code viewer. - No creepy permissions required. - No secret Internet connectivity required. - No ads! If you're happy with it and want to support me, please grab a copy of Code Peeker Pro =)
release_text: Please note I've made modifications so it now compiles with the Android Lollipop framework. If you see any strange behaviour, let me know v1.97 Pro - *new* Added text search! v1.97 Lite + Pro - *new* Added "Go To Line" number - *semi-fix* Prevent crash when trying to open from Google Drive (still doesn't open yet, need a big rewrite to open files properly) - changed default setting for "Exit on Close" to be false - various code tweaks for future changes (minimum Android 4.1 when v2.0 releases)

description: Ever spent a night enjoying dinner at a restaurant, followed by a week in hospital? Lunch regret ever had you rushing for the toilet during an important meeting? Food poisoning can often be caused by; unhygienic kitchen practices, insufficient access to sanity facilities, poor temperature control or uncovered food, rat and bug infestation within the food preparation area, the sale of expired or even deceivingly-labelled goods, or anything else you can even dare to imagine! Some of the most common food safety breaches are; - (35%) Cleaning and sanitation - (13%) Temperature control - (13%) Pest control – infestations, droppings - (13%) Hand washing offences - (11%) Protection from contamination - storage, personal hygiene These things happen quite often but have no fear; we're bringing the notorious NSW Food Authority "name and shame" list straight to your Android! The NSW Food Authority lists penalty notices for businesses which have breached NSW food safety laws. Information provided in the fines give YOU, as the consumer, the ability to better pick and choose where you decide to eat. Fine Food makes it much easier to view penalty information. You can: - List all the (on the spot) fines currently displayed on the NSW Food Authority #nameandshame list. - Determine dodgy business hotspots with the Map view. - Search and filter fines which are relevant to you (by suburb, postcode, and/or severity). - Quickly locate stores by name. - Highlight penalties by severity using the simple interface. We'll keep the list up to date as soon as it comes out. Notes: - This app REQUIRES Google Maps to be installed. - Please keep in mind that this is an UNOFFICIAL app which simply makes use of freely available data. - Penalty notices are defined in two ways; on-the-spot fines and court fines. Currently we are only displaying on the spot fines. - Information is updated whenever we notice any updates posted by the NSW Food Authority. - This only shows the list of fines for NSW businesses. Permissions: - network access (retrieve fine details, map data) - test access and modify contents of USB storage (map stores cache data onto your phone) - read Google Service information (for map access)
release_text: v1.15 (27/12/2013) - fixed annoying update notification on net connection - removed unnecessary files - upgraded maps backend code - fixed issues with non-Australian map entries v1.1 (15/08/13) - checks for new updates when WiFi connected - added [new] to latest fines - performance improvements when scrolling - updated contact email - fixed the way updates are checked - bunch of other server side fixes v1.0 (24/06/2013) - Initial release

description: Ever wondered what someone would look like if they had an instant moustache or beard? Wonder no more! Moustachify will add a moustache to almost any face! Need a moustache on: - yourself for a special someone? - your baby? - your girlfriend? - ... yo Grandma!? Simply take any photo and this magical app will turn it into an awesome photo with funny faces that everyone will love! If you're not happy with it, you can adjust the photo or moustaches to your liking. Save your stachetastic photo and share it with your friends! Works best on: - Humans (and sometimes dogs) - When the whole face is visible - Faces are positioned upright - Tom Selleck (yo dawg, I herd you like moustaches) Notes: The previous version of "Moustachify Everything" with over 70,000 installs is now outdated and no longer works as the online services which it used are no longer available. Moustachify Everything 2.0 has been rewritten from scratch to take advantage of new Android technologies. This app now: - Provides over 12 new moustache styles! - Ability to manually position, resize and add/remove moustaches if needed - Facial detection is now done on the phone, much quicker than before! - Easily share with your friends Try it out today! Permissions: - Write to storage: To read/save photos - Internet/network state: Ads - Billing: Purchase additional styles (optional)
release_text: v2.20 - added an additional moustache pack - a few performance tweaks - fixed the way play store link opens - reduced apk size - label changes v2.10 - *NEW* added ability to pick moustache styles - no longer crashes when unable to read file - updated a few icons and confusing labels - fixed play store URL - bug fixes and performance updates v2.0 - Complete rewrite from scratch!

description: This application allows you to display the Officially Licensed University of Michigan Logo as a Live Wallpaper on your phone. You can choose to either display the Live Wallpaper as a 3-D animated flag on your phone with the Michigan logo, or as a picture frame for your personal images with the Michigan logo. Users can set the following options to personalize their phone with the Michigan Live Wallpaper: 1. Select a variety of different modes including the animated flag mode or as a picture frame for images from your Facebook account, your FlickR account, or from your phone. 2. Select from a variety of different picture frame templates, including: 1) a Chalk board, 2) Cork Board, 3) Football Field, 3) Wild West Template, 4) Fire Template or 5) Metal Template 3. Select a variety of settings for different templates such as how fast the images change, how the images rotate, random picture shuffling and automatic image resizing. Installation Instructions ----------------- 1. After downloading, go to Applications and Select 'Michigan Live Wallpaper' 2. When the initial screen opens, tap the "Select Wallpaper/Change Settings" button 3. Select the "Michigan Live Wallpaper" application from the list of Live Wallpaper applications 4. Tap the "Settings" button to configure the application 5. Tap "Photo Source" to select either "Animated Flag" mode or picture frame mode for personal images from your phone, Facebook or FlickR. Instructions for setting up Picture Frame SlideShow --------------------------------------- 1. Go to ‘Michigan Live Wallpaper’ and select ‘Settings’ 2. Select 'Photo Source' and choose either Facebook, FlickR or Phone Images 3. If you chose Facebook, go to 'Log In' and enter your Facebook account information. The Michigan Live Wallpaper application will log into your Facebook account. 4. You can select to show images from your Facebook Albums, as well as photos you have been tagged in. You can also select to show images from your news feed 5. After you have setup your Facebook settings, you can choose which Michigan Live Wallpaper Picture Frame Template you would like to use from the "Select Template" settings. 6. If you chose FlickR, you can choose a particular FlickR feed to show by either searching on a specific search term or user. 7. After you have chosen either Facebook, FlickR or your own phone images, you should "Clear Images" and "Force Update" which will reset your images

Мобильное приложение «Домашние Финансы» создано для удобной работы со своим аккаунтом системы «Домашние Финансы - home.finance.ua» с мобильного устройства под управлением Android и, в отличие от веб-приложения, не требует постоянного интернет-соединения. Вносить новые расходы и доходы можно при каждом удобном случае: в магазине или возле банкомата, сохраняя их в памяти устройства. Отправка операций на сервер системы для работы с ними в веб-приложении, осуществляется по желанию. В текущей версии приложения доступны два отчета: • «Итоги» - это список виджетов расходов и доходов за текущий бюджетный период, а также виджетов остатков «на сегодня» • «Операции» - общий список последних совершенных и ближайших запланированных операций Приложение позволяет вносить все типы операций, просматривать текущий и прошедшие бюджетный периоды, редактировать списки категорий, счетов и виджетов, менять основную валюту аккаунта. Переключение между бюджетными аккаунтами позволяет вести с мобильного устройства несколько бюджетов одновременно. Нововведения по сравнению с веб-версией – возможность прикреплять к операции изображения (фото купленного товара или оплаченного чека). Mobile app "Home Finance" was created for easy work with his account of the "Household Finance - home.finance.ua» mobile devices running Android and, unlike the Web application does not require a permanent Internet connection. Introduce new costs and revenues can at every opportunity: in the store or near ATM, storing them in memory. Dispatch operations to the server system to work with them in a web application, is optional. In the current version of the application available two statements: • «Results" - a list of widgets costs and revenues for the current budget period, as well as residues widgets "for today" • «Operation" - a common list of recent and perfect the next scheduled operations The application allows you to make all types of transactions, view the current and previous fiscal periods, edit the category lists, invoices, widgets, change the base currency of your account. Switching between budgetary accounts allows mobile devices multiple budgets simultaneously. Innovations compared with the Web version - the ability to attach images to the operation (photo goods purchased or paid receipt).
release_text: Последние изменения в приложении: - возможность отсроченной регистрации - переключение между бюджетными аккаунтами - изменение основной валюты аккаунта - прикрепление к операциям изображений - исправлены некоторые ошибки Перед обновлением версии – обязательно сохраните локальные изменения на сервер!!!

description: ★ Top Developer (awarded 2013) ★ ### 9 REVIEWS! See below ### This is the same as our "Move it!™ Free", but with no ads and a massive 672 puzzles spanning 6 difficulty levels! Tired of sliding block puzzles that only allow block movement in one direction? Then this is for you! Move it!™ is a fresh and exciting new block-sliding puzzle and not just another Unblock me clone! Unlike the plethora of similar block sliding clones (almost all based on Yoshigahara's famous Rush Hour puzzle), Move it! provides a much richer variety of shapes that can move freely, not just in restricted planes. The end product is a very natural game of great depth and variety, very well suited to the new generation of touch-screen devices. Move it! comes with 6 levels from Novice to Expert. Depending on level, it can be either a quick casual game or an extremely challenging puzzle. -- Designed for both Tablet and Phone **** 9 Reviews !!! ★"If you think you’ve already played the best block puzzle games on your smartphone, wait until you’ve played Move It!" review by Arnold Zafra android-apps.com ★"For the die hard puzzle fanatics who love a challenge, this game will not disappoint." review by Vincent Messina Androidrundown ★"It's all about the puzzles and the puzzles are good.... In conclusion, this is a solid puzzle game that is a nice addition to the Android Market" review by Alstar MeandMyDroid ★"Today I will tell you something that will definitely change your life. In a better way, of course. Al Factory Limited is happy to present you a breathtaking puzzle game of the “future”." review by Kim Zalewski AndroidTrek ★"What is nice about Move it! is that it looks simple and not intimidating, but is actually really challenging. An excellent puzzle game!" Yasushi Tanase (4 times world computer Shogi champion) ★"I like to think I’m pretty decent at puzzles, but some of these definitely had me sweating" review by AppSafari ★"If you have a few minutes, or few hours to spare, and are looking for something challenging, yet fun, this is a great solution to end your boredom!" review by Jerad DiPane AndroidCentral ★"Sliding, sorting, shuffling and shifting blocks actually proves to be a pleasant diversion from many of the other available gaming apps on the various marketplaces" review by James Woodcock ★"Colorful game environment, a lot of game levels to conquer, and challenging puzzles, of course, characterized by how well this game is... A bright, ambitious and fun spin-off" review - androidmobilez.com **Note that when upgrading from the Free version, the stats (only) are retained. To do this the game needs to read from your SD card when it starts for the first time, so please make sure the SD card is available and not connected to your PC**

description: Wiki Encyclopaedia Gold presents Wikipedia ®, conveniently formatted and speeded up for your Android device - even without an internet connection! * New "Turbo-load" gets those Wikipedia articles displayed even faster even on a mobile connection! * Take all the Wikipedia knowledge with you even without an internet connection, with Android's ONLY app to offer downloadable offline databases in over 30 languages! * Make reading Wikipedia fun with our random article function right from the first page of the app! * Discover meaningful encyclopedia articles and learn more about your surroundings with Wiki Encyclopaedia Gold's "articles near me" feature - Pre-set the languages you use the most as your "favourite languages", then easily switch language to read the same Wikipedia article in one of those languages! - Switch and search between online or offline Wikipedia Encyclopedia, or online Wiktionary ® dictionary * Wiktionary dictionary allows you to search for words in any language and will provide the translation to that word as well as the meaning! It is a perfect two-in-one dictionary and translator. - Suggest/Autocomplete feature for faster searching - Show/Hide Wikipedia editing tools for contributing to Wikimedia's project - "Search on page" - Day/Night mode settings (Black text on white background or white text on black background) - Share articles directly from your Wiki app - Mobile/Desktop mode - Set Text Size - Save Wikipedia or Wiktionary dictionary article to phone's memory/ Reading list - Great for education: school, university, learning and researching, homework etc. The app uses your phone's location sensors including GPS if active, in order to locate you and provide the "articles near you" functionality.. this shows geo-referenced articles that refer to landmarks, buildings, or events with specific locations. Wikipedia Encyclopedia with offline databases is a back to school or back to university essential reference! Supported Wikipedia languages include: English, Nederlands, Deutsch, Svenska, Français, Italiano, Español, Русский, Polski, Tiếng Việt, 日本語, Winaray, Sinugboanong Binisaya, Português, 中文, Українська, Català, Norsk (Bokmål), Suomi, فارسی, Čeština, 한국어, Magyar, العربية, Română, Bahasa Melayu, Српски / Srpski, Minangkabau, Türkçe, Bahasa Indonesia, Қазақша, Slovenčina, Esperanto, Dansk, Lietuvių, Euskara, Български, עברית, Hrvatski, Slovenščina, O‘zbek, Volapük, Eesti, हिन्दी, Galego, Nynorsk, Download Wiki Encyclopedia Gold today and share the app with your friends to qualify for a free offline database! ==If you are having trouble downloading the offline wiki encyclopaedia databases, please go to the left menu, DOWNLOAD WIKI, RECOVER PURCHASE. From here you will be able to recover your offline wiki automatically and re-start failed downloads. Any further problems, please email us! ===
release_text: New TURBO page loading for an even faster Wikipedia experience! (BETA) Go to settings to turn this on!

description: Crossword Solver is a fast dictionary search app for help with solving crosswords or codewords. Features: - Finds all possible word matches based on pattern matching for known letters - Uses open source built-in english dictionary - Dictionary installed on your phone - no network access required - 2 to 15 letter words accepted - Records last word search - Option to exclude letters - Can be installed on an SD memory card (Android 2.2 and later) - In-app email support lets you ask questions and report problems Paid version features: - No advertising
release_text: Prevent text boxes expanding beyond screen

description: Word Solver is a fast dictionary search app for help with all word based games. Scrabble, WordSmith, Words With Friends, Word Game, DroidWords, Literati, WordWise, Crosswords, Word Mix & WordFeud Features: - Built-in popular dictionaries (SOWPODS, TWL, ENABLE) - Dictionaries installed on your phone - no network access required - Toggle background transparency (see the game underneath) - A choice of dictionary definitions to use - Enter up to 15 letters, unlimited board letters and 2 blanks - Sort the results by length or score in order to find the best playable word - Runs in status bar for quick access within games - Three seperate tabs for Anagrams, Scrabble and Crosswords - Records last word search - Highlights board, rack and blank letter for easy identification - Two letter word reference list available from options menu. - In-app email support lets you ask questions and report problems Paid version features: - Up to 15 letter word length - Unlimited search results - No advertising
release_text: Allow blanks in board letters. Fix app not shutting down first time. Remove caps lock. Fix blank highlighting for duplicate letters. Fix move to SD card.

description: Body Progress allows you to keep track of your Body Fat, your measurements and how you look through photos. Body Fat can be calculated through the Jackson & Pollock 3 and 7 point tests using callipers or it can be manually entered. Body Progress allows you to track the size of your neck, chest, shoulders, hips, waist, arms and more. Front, Back and Side photos can be saved. Body Progress does more than just offer a place to store your Body Fat, Measurements & Photos as it actually makes it easy to compare one reading against all previous. Perfect for anyone looking to track muscle gain or weight loss. You must be 13 or over to use this app. This app is advert supported. You can remove adverts by purchasing the unlocker. Search "Body Progress Unlocker" or go to: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.bodyprogress.unlocker
release_text: - Removed measurement limit - Android L support - Added adverts for non-Pro users

description: FREE DICTIONARY OF THE MONTH! Chambers Thesaurus Ultimate Edition Available until April 1, 2015. THE RICHES OF THE ENGLISH LANGUAGE 8 comprehensive English dictionaries and thesauruses available for in-app purchase. Full wordlist and 50 sample entries of each dictionary to preview before buying. The app allows to easily and quickly navigate through and try out any dictionaries, as well as experience the most advanced search, learning and input features. Now you can make sure that a dictionary complies with your language level and contains all words you need before purchase. Full-fledged versions are available for buying with the in-app dictionary catalog, containing: Chambers Dictionary Ultimate Edition Chambers Thesaurus Ultimate Edition Chambers Adult Learners' Dictionary Chambers Advanced ELT English Dictionary Chambers ELT English Dictionary Chambers Concise Dictionary Chambers Compact Thesaurus Chambers Crossword Dictionary _____ Convenient search methods allow you to find any word in a number of different ways: • Headword search. • Full text search. • Search for anagrams (bat-tab). • Search within entries to narrow down and quickly navigate larger entries. • Wildcard search to find the word even if you don’t know its exact spelling. • Similar words search in case of misspelling. Search and input features: • Full text search feature allows you to look up words more efficiently throughout the whole dictionary content, including headwords and usage examples. • Enter the word in your own handwriting with Paragon’s PenReader handwriting recognition software, search by voice using Google Voice recognition service (Available for OS 2.2 and higher) or take a picture of the text and get definition of words with Google Goggles. • Easy copy-and-paste functions and the Share button feature (Available for OS 4.0 and higher) allow to copy unknown words from an active application, like web browsers or email, and automatically to open the relevant dictionary entry. • Use the Share button to send copied text to the dictionary directly and get the definition in one click! (Available for OS 4.0 and higher). • English morphology module helps to find words in any grammatical form. Learning features: • English audio pronunciations recorded by native speakers. • Favorite articles to quickly access and revise frequently searched words. Interface features: • Built-in dictionary catalog for in-app purchases. • Dictionary installation on SD card (Available for OS 2.2 and higher). • Search History feature shows the last 100 words looked up. • Hyperlinks between articles and directions. • Flexible font size settings for your comfort. • No Internet connection required.
release_text: FREE DICTIONARY OF THE MONTH! Chambers Thesaurus Ultimate Edition Available until April 1, 2015.

description: Sports stopwatch with time interval speech, history, email, configurable precision, current lap time, laps, splits, fastest, slowest, average, delta, point time, range, notes, side button operation & screen lock. High quality configurable stopwatch with 1, 1/10, 1/100 & 1/1000 second precision and multiple time data views. The ideal running stopwatch for the track, treadmill or road. Summary ------------- Talking Stopwatch is a feature rich precision chronograph with speech and history. This stopwatch is so simple to use, yet highly configurable for advanced users. Talking Stopwatch was conceived to address the short comings of the iphone stopwatch and the leading android offerings. Current lap time, split times, delta times, stats, speech, side button operation and touch screen locking make Talking Stopwatch the ideal stopwatch for runners and athletes. Main Stopwatch Features ----------------------------------------------- * Speech at configured time intervals * Speech on button operations * History * Email export * Display precision: 1/1000, 1/100, 1/10 & 1 second. * Speech precision: 1/1000, 1/100, 1/10 & 1 second. * 100 hours max duration. * Large clear display with multiple views * Total time * Current lap time * Lap times * Split times * Fastest lap * Average lap * Slowest lap * Lap number * Delta fastest lap * Delta average lap * Point time * Lap time range * Works with side buttons * Screen stays awake * Touch screen lock * Runs in background * Lap on/after stop * Time measured with system time (1/1000 second) * Speech actions configurable. * Lap timer works via touch, not press * Haptic feedback Key Design Principles -------------------------------------------------------- Clarity ------------- The timer display is large and clear even in bright sunlight, a very important consideration for running,jogging, sailing or cycling. The timer has multiple screens views accessed via a horizontal swipe. This allows Talking Stopwatch to display a lot of information to the user without cramming to much on the screen at once. Accuracy ----------------- Lap timer operates precisely to 1/1000 second via on-touch actions (not on-press). Nearly all other stopwatches and lap timers on the Android market operate on press... these timers are not as accurate as Talking Stop watch since a press can take up to 1/3 second and yet a touch is instantaneous. Adaptability as a multi-use timer --------------------------------------- Talking Stopwatch was designed as a track timer for runners; however we feel it is also ideal many other timing scenarios as follows: * Jogging stopwatch * Swimming stopwatch(coached) * General athletics timer * Gym training timer * Circuit training timer. * Treadmill timer. * Cycling stop watch * Skiing timer * Cooking timer * Time out timer * Yachting / sailing timer * Lecture timer * Meeting timer * Track lap timer for motorsports * Slot car racing timer!.. yes really ..( see below) * Team sports stopwatch - football, soccer, basketball,
release_text: # Added setting button # fixed share option

description: Earth Satellite Live HD is a stunning live wallpaper using high-definition textures and offering the option to track any of over 1200 artificial satellites. Watch the geometric separation of the Iridium satellite constellation or marvel at the circle formed by the geostationary satellites as their orbits perfectly synchronise with the rotation of the earth. Alternatively remove the satellites completely for a beautiful representation of our home planet. Features • High-definition textures from NASA • Tracking of over 1200 satellites • Real-time rotation and sun position • Customisable animation speed • Realistic lens flares • Support for full multi-touch gestures Please note that all the features can be enabled with an in-app purchase. Feel free to send us an email with either your feedback or your suggestions for further development.
release_text: Version 1.2.22 Free version is now ad supported to enable ongoing development Version 1.2.19 Option to disable gesture detection when the wallpaper is set

description: Kids Paint will help the little ones to improve some of their creative, imaginative, hand-eye coordination and dexterity skills in a way that is fun and entertaining. Kids Paint, the fun way to aid the development of your child's key skills and help them on their way to fulfill their potential.
release_text: 1.0.4 Improved graphics library 1.0.3 Update to the splash screen

description: Spotty Pad games for young children was inspired by Mr Tumble’s Tumble Tap device, which features on the BBC CBeebies television channel. It is legally different. The Tumble Tap does not do anything that Spotty Pad does. Spotty Pad consists of eight games for young children. The first – Photo Show – is suitable for children of pre-reading age. It displays a photo and plays a music clip. It uses your device’s text to speech engine (we recommend the Google text to speech engine, free on Google Play) to read out the text of the photo to reinforce what everyday (mostly) images are called. You can your own images, too. The remaining games require a degree of understanding of words. In Word Tap, the child is given an image and two words – one correct and one incorrect. The child needs to tap the correct word to score a point. In other games, the child needs to know the names of colours or shapes and in the classic “I spy with my little eye” the child needs to be able to tap on the correct image from a choice of three. Chaser, Super Chaser and Duplicator are increasingly difficult games with moving circles. In the free trial version of Spotty Pad, each game can only be played five times. For full details of what Spotty Pad does and doesn’t do, see the PDF guide at www.jrsoft.co.uk/spottypad/spguide.zip
release_text: Spotty Pad version 1.3 Added: Favourites function for Photo Show. Inspired by a two-year-old who wanted cat, cat, cat! To set a photo as Favourite, go to Menu>Manage Photos. Select image and go to Edit. Set or unset Favourite. To control showing frequency, go to Menu>Manage Photos and select whether Favourites show: -- All the time. -- Just more frequently than non-favourites. -- Or Favoutites function off.

description: “Z”, the classic Real Time Strategy Game by the Bitmap Brothers remade for Android. Fans of this classic strategy title are in for a real treat. Everything is in here from the terrific comedy cut scenes to the frantic game play making this the definitive version of Z. MOBILE AND TABLET REVIEWS *Edge Magazine: 8/10 of all the RTS games before and since, there's never been anything else quite like Z. *148Apps.com: 4/5 " A Solid Classic. Anyone who enjoys strategy games should find plenty to love here. *AppSpy.com: 4/5 Z The Game hits the spot *TouchGamers.de 9/10 Z the best strategy game for the iPhone *MetroOnline.co.uk:7/10 Cleverly originally gameplay *iReviwt.com: 4.5/5 Plus Must-Have Award *Appsnap.com: 7/10 •Z is a real time war game played in a totally free environment. •A breathtaking race to capture territory and resources. Crush your enemy before they overpower you. •Over thirty minutes of humorous movie sequences provide intros and outros for each level. •Movie and in game voiceovers are spoken in English, French, German, Italian or Spanish. •Z has a conditional Music system, which reflects in real time the mood of the battle. •Z has six types of Robot soldiers each with their own individual personalities. Will they carry out your orders and march into the jaws of hell? Or will they chicken and run? •Robots perform up to 40 different actions, armed with rifles, machine guns and antitank missile launchers. •Twenty challenging levels set on five planets each with a unique terrain ranging from Arctic waste to lands of fire and lava. •In game world map and radar which can be displayed at any time. •Lots of hardware for you and your soldiers to control, ranging from three types of tanks, jeeps, repair vehicles and armoured personnel carriers to field guns and missile launchers. •Robot leaders provide you with spoken alerts throughout the game. •Capture and control installations including factories manufacturing robots and vehicles, radar and vehicle repair facilities. •You choose what kind of robot or vehicle your factories manufacture. •Z comes with pictorial player guide. •Google Game Services - 25 Achievements - 10 Leaderboards Z is... the fastest, funniest, most frantic, feature-packed action-strategy game you'll play this century!
release_text: 3rd November Update 1. Fixed language selection on resume 25th October Update 1. Added new audio options. 2. Fixed issue with super high screen resolutions. 3. Added language selection in Options. 4. Added Options within game. 5. Fixed bug changing languages did not reload sound bank or panel sprites. 6. Fixed bug with mini-map when not open you can drag and select in that area below. 7. Fix for level 14 crash, repairing bridges. 8. Altered cut scenes to display full screen.

description: Make the most of your time in Europe with the O2 Travel app. With the free O2 Travel app you can: • Discover local attractions and read other traveller’s reviews with TripAdvisor® City Guides. • Download and explore what’s around you with our offline maps. • Sign up for our new O2 Travel tariff and use data in Europe with peace of mind. O2 Travel from O2, the latest travel essential.

No more flipping between different calendar views. Touch Calendar does it all from one zoomable and scrollable view. Now with a beautiful Material Design interface. Rated 95% by reghardware.com ( http://goo.gl/vlIa5 ) and 9/10 by WIRED ( http://goo.gl/lLPoa ). Touch Calendar works with Google Calendar and any other calendars your phone supports. This is the full version including widgets to show your calendar directly on your phone's home screen. Also features calendar search and custom repeating events (e.g. biweekly, bimonthly). Touch Calendar is easy to use: - pinch-zoom to zoom in - tap an event to see its details - tap-and-hold on a date to add a new event - touch to scroll the calendar as much as you want, both forwards and backwards - jump to today, or to any date from the menu - calendar search - set the font size and default zoom level from the Settings - widgets so you can see your calendar on the home screen Zoom and scroll your calendar with complete freedom! Note: Text colour for events comes from the calendar colour. Set up different calendar colours in Google Calendar and they'll appear in Touch Calendar automatically.
release_text: 1.2.41: - fix for weekend days not being shown in different colours - linkify phone numbers in event titles as in previous versions

description: A complete talent calculator for the WildStar skill system, WildStar Action Set Builder lets you plan and tweak builds to your hearts content. Build your character just the way you want, anywhere you want! Features include: - All six WildStar classes. Engineer, Esper, Medic, Spellslinger, Stalker, and Warrior. - Points and action bar information updated as you tweak. Know exactly how many points and free bar slots you've got left. - Samsung S-Pen support adds hover over actions where supported. - Save and load your builds, with no limits. Plan out all the characters you like, ready for when you need them. - Send builds as a handy link (via email, Facebook, Twitter, etc) and load them into the talent calculator with one click. - Swipe pan between the skill panels or use the familiar tab buttons like in game. - Accurately mimics the look and feel of the WildStar in game action set builder. - 100% native app. Built from the ground up, purely for Android. Permissions: This app requires internet access to check for updates and SD card access for the database of talents. Want to see the app in another language? Come help out at http://translate.randomicon.co.uk Please note I cannot add features not supported by Carbine or NCSoft. This would include features such as importing characters from your game account. All WildStar related images and game data remain the property of Carbine or NCSoft where appropriate.
release_text: Corrected cost of major tiers to 5 points instead of 4

description: “Broken Sword 2 – La profezia dei Maya: Rimasterizzato” vede il ritorno di George Stobbart e Nico Collard nel seguito del campione d'incassi “Broken Sword – Il segreto dei Templari”, considerato da molti la migliore avventura disponibile per Android. Nel corso di un'indagine su una banda di trafficanti di droga, la giornalista Nico Collard s'imbatte inaspettatamente in un antico manufatto. Quella tavoletta di ossidiana intagliata trascinerà lei e il suo compagno di avventure George Stobbart in una storia piena di enigmi, intrighi e inganni, in cui i nostri due eroi dovranno affrontare dei potenti antagonisti decisi a tutto pur di realizzare i loro malvagi intenti. Tormenti, terrore, sacrifici rituali e massacri sono ciò che si cela sotto il velo di un arcano mistero maya. Rapimenti, tesori rubati, spionaggio e un feroce barone della droga rappresentano il male minore, mentre forze di natura divina minacciano di annientare l'umanità! Nervi saldi, astuzia e perspicacia risulteranno essenziali per completare questa avventura, tanto impegnativa quanto emozionante. Sarai all'altezza della sfida? “Broken Sword 2 - La profezia dei Maya: Rimasterizzato” costituisce una straordinaria rivisitazione del titolo originale che ha venduto milioni di copie. Oltre a un esclusivo fumetto digitale interattivo creato da Dave Gibbons, co-autore di “Watchmen’”, il gioco è arricchito da espressioni del volto animate, grafica potenziata, musiche di alta qualità, un sistema di suggerimenti contestuali e l'utile presenza del diario. L'integrazione del gioco con Dropbox, inoltre, rende possibile l'esclusiva funzione di salvataggio multipiattaforma, permettendo ai giocatori di godersi la stessa avventura su più sistemi contemporaneamente e molte altre novità. Dialoghi doppiati completamente in italiano, con la possibilità di sottotitoli in italiano, inglese, francese, tedesco e spagnolo. A qualsiasi versione possono essere aggiunti i file audio di altre lingue per permettere un supporto linguistico adeguato.

París en otoño... un asesinato brutal en el Palais Royale. Cuando inviten a Nico Collard a entrevistar al estadista Pierre Carchon, se verá involucrada irremisiblemente en una conspiración terrible. La aventura "Broken Sword: The Director's Cut", un clásico de todos los tiempos con nominaciones a varios premios BAFTA, sumerge a la atrevida periodista Nico Collard y al intrépido norteamericano George Stobbart en un viaje misterioso lleno de intriga y peligro. Guía a George y a Nico en su aventura por todo el mundo y explora lugares exóticos, resuelve antiguos misterios y frustra una tenebrosa conspiración para descubrir la secreta verdad sobre los caballeros templarios. "Broken Sword: The Director's Cut" presenta una interfaz táctil que ha recibido muchos elogios e introduce un nuevo e intrincado hilo argumental, además de la historia clásica que ya ha encandilado a millones de jugadores. Es hora de vivir las aventuras de George y Nico por todo el mundo de una manera completamente distinta, con rompecabezas novedosos, divertidísimos chistes nuevos y la historia característica y detallada que ha dado su merecida fama a esta saga. Es un juego de aventuras en estado puro. ✪ “(...) es un juego que nadie debería dejar pasar de largo: un exitazo de nuestros días en forma de montaje del director.” The Independent online (5/5) ✪ “Extraordinario ejemplo de cómo hacer el remake de un clásico.” Pocket Gamer (9/10) ✪ “El toque creativo de la interfaz de Broken Sword funciona a las mil maravillas en la pantalla del iPhone.” Touch Arcade Diálogos completamente en español, con la opción de subtítulos en español, inglés, alemán, italiano o francés.
release_text: Versión 2.0.07 ✅ Se ha mejorado la estabilidad Versión 2.0.06 ✅ Logros ✅ Subtítulos de la película

description: As Bad Dog there's only one way to to wipe the smile of those cats faces, poop! Feed the Bad Dog and fart your way high into the sky, aim for the blissfully unaware cats below and deliver your special Bad Dog parcel (a POOP!) to them. Splat all the cats in each level to progress through 4 entire worlds, spanning across the Beach, the Park, the City and Snow Mountain in a bid to clear those cheerful cats. Unlock special foods throughout each world to give Bad Dog a new, unique way of splatting his enemies. Feed. Fart. Fire - it's time to poop on those cats!

This is a remote control for VLC media player. It also lets you stream your media from VLC to your Android device. You can choose from the built in streaming profiles for 360p, 480p, 720p and 1080p resolutions, and you can customize your own profile which allows you to define the video codec, resolution, video bitrate, audio codec, audio bitrate and no of channels. You can also attempt to stream without transcoding the video if you have sufficient bandwidth. You can choose to stream over HTTP or RTSP. There is an install guide available at http://samicemalone.co.uk/remote-for-vlc/install.html . You can also find a list of FAQ's at http://samicemalone.co.uk/remote-for-vlc/faq.html . Recommended VLC version: 2.1.4 or 2.1.3. There are some issues with streaming on some older VLC versions, notably 1.1.11 and older, 2.0.1, and 2.0.4 so do not use these versions. This application does not handle media playback itself, instead it allows you to use the Android media player of your choice e.g. Android's built in video player or MX Player. This application is a fork of the application "Remote for VLC" by Peter Baldwin (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.peterbaldwin.client.android.vlcremote). The source code for this application can be obtained on request after you have purchased the app. This app should be compatible with AceStream since it is a derivative of VLC. If you are using VLC and AceStream simultaneously, remember to change the port of the HTTP interface. Changelog ============ v1.0.1 * Added library support for viewing multiple directories under one directory (via context menu). This is similar to Windows Libraries. * Fixed crashing occasionally when trying restore the search query * Added "What's New" dialog for displaying changelog on app update v1.0.0 Initial release

description: This is a sample application for the library ActionBar-PullToRefresh. ------------- ActionBar-PullToRefresh provides an easy way to add a modern version of the pull-to-refresh interaction to your application. Please note that this is not an update to Android-PullToRefresh, this has been created from new. You should think of this as Android-PullToRefresh's younger, leaner cousin. ActionBar-PullToRefresh has in-built support for: - AbsListView derivatives (ListView & GridView). - ScrollView - WebView ActionBar-PullToRefresh is open source, licensed under the Apache v2.0 licence.

Build your family tree with TreeView and you’ll have your family history at your fingertips, even when you have no signal! Whether you’re an experienced family historian or just starting out, you’ll find TreeView easy to use and an essential tool in your research. Features • Includes a number of flexible tree designs including Pedigree, Hourglass, Ancestors, Descendants and Family views. • Add and amend details easily and add notes, all from within the app. • View historical records for your ancestors via TheGenealogist (subscription required). • Upload photos to embellish your tree. • Offline mode – View your family tree even when you have no signal. • Information you add on one device will automatically be available on all your other devices. • Help and advice at your fingertips. Compatibility • Import a GEDCOM file of your family tree at TreeView.co.uk (Free of charge) or TheGenealogist to view and edit it on your device. • If you have already built a family tree on TheGenealogist or TreeView.co.uk, you can log in with that account to view and edit you tree. Privacy TreeView offers you the flexibility to be as private or public with your trees as you wish. With 3 settings you have the choice of who you share your family tree with. • Private • Invitation only (Users can see if there is a potential match in your tree, but cannot see the full tree’s details without your permission) • Public

There’s something for everyone - outdoor games for big groups such as dodgeball or tug of war, and indoor activities like ice lolly making and homemade instruments. So start exploring – and enjoy your adventures! • Start by choosing where your kids are playing – indoors or outdoors • Use the slider to select how many kids are joining in • Browse the suggested activities – each with full instructions explaining how to play • Watch the videos and print the activity sheets • Save your favourites • Share with friends via Facebook, Twitter or email

Build structures from atoms and solve puzzles in this unique physics game. You choose the chemical rules of the universe and then set the simulation running. Now with 30 challenging levels. (If the app doesn't work on your device then please let us know by email and we'll get it working for you. Or try restarting your device. Thanks for all the feedback so far, this has helped improve the app.)

*** THIS APP REQUIRES THAT YOU HAVE AT LEAST 10MB OF FREE SPACE ON THE DEVICE. *** Download the latest version of the official Edinburgh bus tracking application for Android. This application will let you view live bus departures for Lothian Buses services and estimated departures for trams in Edinburgh, Scotland. My Bus Edinburgh has the following features; * View the next departures for each bus service at each stop serviced by Lothian Buses and estimated times for Edinburgh Trams. * Keep a list of your favourite bus stops to easily revisit them later. * Ability to manually enter a bus stop code found at all bus stops to show live times for that stop, or alternatively scan the QR code at the bus stop. * Fully integrated vector Google Maps which can show your location as well as nearby bus stops and coloured bus routes. * The map is fully searchable so you can search for places and bus stop names. Includes voice search from Google. * Get the latest traffic and journey news in the News and Updates section. * Favourite bus stops can be saved to the home screen on your device for opening easily later. * Nearest bus stops listing. * Google Street View linking. * Integration with Google Backup. * Italian localisation. * EXPERIMENTAL FEATURE: add proximity alerts to alert you when you are near a selected bus stop, * EXPERIMENTAL FEATURE: add bus time alerts to alert you when a selected bus service is near a selected bus stop. * And more... * The features you are able to use is dependent on what version of Android is installed on your device. Experimental features are not guaranteed to work correctly - use with caution. A very big thank you to Anthony Totton for supplying the artwork. A big thank you to Matteo Doni for supplying Italian localisation and thank you to Ross McClymont for helping with beta testing. This application is officially endorsed by The City of Edinburgh Council and Lothian Buses. Follow My Bus Edinburgh on Twitter for the latest updates: http://twitter.com/MyBusEdinburgh Explanation of permissions; - Network based and GPS locations: used in the bus stop map and nearest bus stops listing to find your location. - Internet access: used to load bus times, update the bus stop database and load news. - Access network state: to intelligently use the network only when it is available. - SD card: backups of favourites are stored here. - Use Google Services: required to use Google Maps. - Vibrate: used for alerts. Disclaimer: this application does not support any other operator in Edinburgh than Lothian Buses (because it is not technically possible). The data comes straight from the My Bus Tracker service, operated by The City of Edinburgh Council. While The City of Edinburgh Council and Lothian Buses endorse this app, they do not take any responsibility for it. All data given by the application is a computational estimation and as such, should be treated as a guide only. Keywords: edinburgh, bus, tracker, official, lothian, buses, tram, trams
release_text: v2.2.4 Added support for displaying tram departures. Be aware, tram times are estimated and NOT live. This is because the trams do not have the required equipment on board for Bus Tracker. Fixed a few crashes and bugs.

Would you like to be more confident and feel more relaxed when it comes to public speaking? Then why not give hypnotherapy a try? Introducing the revolutionary new "Pocket Hypnotherapy" range from TapMedia. We have worked with some of the world's leading professionals in the hypnotherapy, NLP and self development fields to deliver a portable and cutting-edge product to help you achieve your goals. Instant hypnotherapy. Anywhere you are. Each track in this app is a combination of words spoken by certified hypnotherapist David Ridgeway D.Hypn., M.N.C.H. and soothing, uplifting "binaural" music. FEATURES: - High quality recordings from a qualified clinical hypnotherapist - "Binaural beat" technology to help you enter a deeper state of relaxation. - Alternative "wake up" ending or "sleep" ending - 50 Tips eBook - 4 therapeutic videos - Play alarm when therapy finishes (optional) - Exit app when therapy finishes (optional) Why pay for an expensive "hourly rate" hypnosis session when you can achieve the same life changing results over and over again in the comfort of your own home for a fraction of the price. (Thanks to the production team - Tommy, Tony, Mark, Lynne, Darren and David)

A free app for subscribing to, automatically downloading, and playing RSS and Atom podcast feeds on Android devices. Please send your feedback, including any podcast feeds which do not work with Podcatcher, to podcatcher@unkemptuous.com - I will do my best to address any issues. Version 0.3 and up include an example podcast feed from the BBC. If you have suggestions for podcasts in languages other than English (to include in future localised versions of Podcatcher), feel free to email me! Key features: - Simple UI, all current casts are shown on the opening screen - Support for RSS 2.0 and Atom feeds - OPML import/export - Downloaded casts are added to the 'Podcatcher' playlist for playing in other apps Explanation for required permissions: INTERNET - used to download feeds and casts ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - used to respect preferences for downloading casts using mobile data WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - casts are written to the SD card for offline listening READ_PHONE_STATE - cast playback is paused when the phone rings BLUETOOTH - control playback from a paired Bluetooth device

description: Root or Not is a powerful root checker that quickly and easily checks if your Android device is rooted. You'll get your result in a matter of seconds and also a list of tutorials on how to root your android device, in case yours isn't. From one-click methods to manual processes for every device, and we will add more very soon! Feel free to get in touch if you need support or just want to send your comments.

Fraction calculator with step-by-step operations and algebra. Shows results as you type. Graphical display of expressions with history. Use space to enter mixed fractions. Help site with instructions and examples: http://frac.mathlab.us If you have a question, send email to calc@mathlab.us PRO FEATURES * Workspaces to work on multiple tasks * Store often used expressions in a library * No advertisements FRACTION CALCULATOR * Step-by-step operations (option to turn off) * Arithmetic operations (+,-,*,/,÷), hold / to enter ÷ * Powers of fractions * Fractions simplification * Fractions with complex numbers * Decimal to fraction conversion and back * Symbolical fractions and operations * Integer roots simplification * Pinch to zoom ALGEBRA * Linear equations x+1=2 -> x=1 * Quadratic equations x^2-1=0 -> x=-1,1 * Approximate roots of higher polynomials * Systems of linear equations, write one equation per line, x1+x2=1, x1-x2=2 * Polynomial long division * Polynomial expansion, factoring * Solving inequalities with one variable, double tap ( and ) to enter less and greater signs * Linear and polynomial inequalities, x^3-4>4 * Inequalities with absolute values, abs(2x+3)<=5 * Compound inequalities, 1* Rational inequalities, (x+3)/(x-1)<=0

Zombie Rider: Run Smashing Car is a racing game of attack, defense and survival against imposing zombie hordes threatening to dominate all mankind in the ultimate zombie doomsday. Race through varied and exotic landscapes, annihilating whatever crosses your path, leaving a road of dead opponents behind you on a trip. In order to escape the walking dead infection you must hone your skills of speed, reflex, and strategy. Download Zombie Rider: Run Smashing Car and become the ultimate zombie hunter and survivor. Are you up to the challenge of annihilating countless numbers of zombies, planet Earth’s deadliest adversaries? In our game there are 7 battlefields you must conquer. Each battlefield increases in complexity and manifests itself in the form of various settings with differing obstacles and of course, hordes of walking dead! Each level requires expert zombie shooting and driving skills to prevent further outbreak. Leave zombie road kill wreckage in your wake, collect points, and upgrade your zombie killer vehicle to move to the next level. To avoid becoming a zombie driver infected by your foes, you must first have a vehicle worthy of a serious walking dead shooting joy ride! Not only is your car decked out with a zombie shooter death ray that fires from the front of your vehicle, there’s more. Check out the garage feature of our game where you can upgrade your vehicle’s gun power, shield power, engine power, gun spread, and gun range before going on your next zombie run. A zombie shooter is only as good as their weapon, so keep your car in top condition by upgrading each feature as you accumulate points. Not only can you upgrade the features on your car, you can upgrade your vehicle too! As you conquer each zombie road, you can access new vehicles either by way of a small payment or by waiting a certain period of time for a new car to unlock. Once you have your new zombie killer on the road, take charge of your new battlefield and kill as many of those stupid zombies as possible! Another feature of this game is the option to choose how you’d like to steer your car. Choose between 4 steering options that allow you to pick a way that’s most comfortable for you: finger or thumb steering, slide steering, and tilt steering. Absolute control of your vehicle is essential to preventing zombie infection and becoming a formidable zombie hunter. As you begin your race to survive and kill the undead, your vehicle will shoot out onto a dead road filled with walking dead. You can either kill walking dead using your death ray or use your car as a zombie smasher and run them over, turning them into a bloody pulp! Your vehicle is equipped with 3 renewable energy features: acceleration energy, annihilation energy, and defense energy cells. Each feature can be recharged by collecting bonus energy on the track represented by different colored energy icons. Each time you run over these icons, renewed energy will with added to your car. If you find yourself off track, hit the back-on-track button to get your bearings. If you need more power, hit the engine boost power button to increase your speed and watch the zombies run in fear! Upon completing each round, you’ll have the option to upgrade your vehicle or change cars. It won’t be long until mankind is faced with the doomsday of our planet. You will need to fight for survival in Zombie Rider: Run Smashing Car to avoid finding yourself on an entirely zombie planet! The race will select those with the strongest instinct to survive. In order to overcome the plague of these undead raiders, redneck, and stupid zombies, driver speed, skill, car upgrades and determination will be absolutely crucial. Download Zombie Rider: Run Smashing Car today and enter the zombie doomsday with an annihilation arsenal to win the honor of becoming a master racer on the infected planet Earth! Try multiplayer option now through Skillz SDK! * https://www.facebook.com/breakingdeadgame * http://www.plavu.co.uk
release_text: -multiplayer option through Skillz SDK gives great opportunity to compete with other hell riders, good luck ! -default car manipulator switched to enhanced sliding option - full car control!

description: Wheel of Fortune, Jeopardy and Hangman all in one. Select a letter of the alphabet and press that key, if the letter is contained in the word/phrase it is displayed in the playing panel. If the letter is not contained in the word/phrase you will receive 1 miss. 6 misses and you lose and phrase will be displayed with facts about that phrase. You do get 2 free random picks and one free hint. This is a good way to test your brain and also learn some very interesting quotes, saying origins, saying meanings. With 22 categories to choose from and over 13,650 phrases/sayings to test your skills. Designed for smart phones and tablets and all ages. Always adding new categories and phrases/sayings.

Test your hearing quickly, accurately, and efficiently using Audiometry Made Easy. This app performs a standard medical audiometry test, playing a series of tones over a range of 500 - 8000 Hz to determine hearing thresholds for both right and left ears. Simply connect headphones and begin testing! This is an open source project- check out the code at: https://github.com/ReeceStevens/ut_ewh_audiometer_2014 ************************* Note ************************* While installable on Android 2.2 and higher, this app is optimized for use with Android 3.x and higher. This app was created for the University of Texas at Austin's Engineering World Health Chapter.
release_text: Extra sweets for Android Lollipop users: new button effects! And, as always, optimizations and under-the-hood fixes. Be sure to leave a comment on the Google Play store and let me know what you think! Questions, comments, or problems with the app? Email me at reecestevens@utexas.edu and I will get back to you ASAP. Thanks for using Audiometry Made Easy!

app_name: Bắt Chữ - Duoi Hinh Bat Chu
description: Bắt Chữ là một trò chơi thú vị, thuộc thể loại "đuổi hình bắt chữ" đầy trí tuệ nhưng cũng ngập tràn thư giãn. Bắt Chữ với kho dữ liệu phong phú, hấp dẫn, đa dạng, ở nhiều lĩnh vực. Nội dung câu đố đặc sắc thú vị, phù hợp với tất cả mọi người, đem lại cho bạn những giây phút thư giãn sảng khoái. Thật hứng khởi khi tự mình khám phá những tầng ý nghĩa đặc sắc, hài hước, vui nhộn, bất ngờ, thú vị, mới lạ,... của các câu chữ ẩn đằng sau những hình ảnh quen thuộc. Bạn có thể sẽ không nhịn được cười khi mở ra các đáp án, những khuôn ảnh tưởng chừng như không liên quan, nhưng khi ghép lại với nhau, lại tạo thành những câu chữ kỳ thú. Bắt Chữ - khó mà dễ, dễ mà khó. Để vượt qua hết các câu hỏi, bạn cần có các kiến thức cả về tiếng Việt, Hán Việt, thậm chí cả tiếng Anh. Dải tri thức trải rộng từ các đồ vật thường dùng, đến địa lý, thể thao, danh nhân, lô đề, ... So với một số game cùng thể loại "đuổi hình bắt chữ" khác đã và đang tồn tại, bản game "Bắt Chữ" mới này có gì đặc sắc và khác biệt? Đầu tiên, đó là cách chơi cực kỳ đơn giản, kế thừa kiểu thao tác của game 4-pics-1-word nổi tiếng: không cần mô tả gợi ý, không cần mở bàn phím nhập chữ, không cần hạn chế thời gian. Thứ hai, đó là bộ hình ảnh được chăm chút rực rỡ sinh động, bạn chắc chắn sẽ không tìm ra một game nào tương tự có bộ dữ liệu đẹp hơn! Game là miễn phí! Khi gặp một từ mà không có trong kho tri thức của bạn, bạn có thể dùng điểm thưởng trong game để mở từ này. Hãy tận hưởng niềm vui, sự sảng khoái, và những bất ngờ thú vị với "Bắt Chữ"! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/batchu.weplay.vn Getting word is an interesting game, under the category "image began chasing the" full of wisdom but also full of relaxation. Getting word database with rich, compelling, diverse in many areas. Content excellent puzzle fun, suitable for everyone, giving you the relaxation mood. Really excited to discover for themselves the meaning unique stories, humor, fun, unexpected, exciting, new, ... of the words hidden behind the familiar image. You can not stop laughing when opening up the answer, the picture molding seemed unrelated, but when put together, to form the words amazing. Getting word - hardly easy, easy but difficult. To overcome all these questions, you need to have the knowledge of both Vietnamese, Vietnamese Chinese, even in English. The range of knowledge ranging from common objects, to geography, sport, celebrity, lots of problems, ... Compared to some of the games of the same genre "picture began chasing the" others already exist, the game "Getting word" characterless new and different? First, it is extremely simple to play, inherited type of manipulation of the game 4-pics-1-word famous without description suggests, without opening the keyboard to enter text, without limit of time . Second, there is the hard bit images vividly brilliant, you certainly will not find a similar game with the data better! The game is free! When you encounter a word that is not in your knowledge base, you can use the bonus points in the game to open the word. Enjoy the fun, the pleasure, and the pleasant surprise with "Getting word"! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/batchu.weplay.vn

description: LỊCH VẠN NIÊN 2015 - ỨNG DỤNG LỊCH VIỆT ĐẦU TIÊN ĐẠT MỐC 1.000.000 LƯỢT CÀI ĐẶT. LỊCH VẠN NIÊN 2015 - Bắt đầu xung kích mốc 5 triệu lượt cài! LỊCH VẠN NIÊN 2015: là ứng dụng MIỄN PHÍ, giúp bạn tra cứu âm lịch, dương lịch thuận tiện và nhanh chóng. LỊCH VẠN NIÊN 2015 cho phép xem các thông tin về lịch ngày, lịch tháng âm dương và rất nhiều thông tin hữu dụng khác. Các chức năng chính: - Xem lịch ngày. - Xem lịch tháng. - Đổi lịch âm sang dương, dương sang âm nhanh chóng và chính xác. - Xem thời tiết hàng ngày theo địa điểm. - Xem nhịp sinh học: cho bạn biết thông tin về trạng thái biến đổi của sức khỏe, tình cảm, trí tuệ của mình để sắp xếp thời gian làm việc phù hợp. - Văn khấn: cả trăm bài văn khấn trải rộng ở khắp các chủ đề. - Xem hướng và ngày giờ xuất hành. - Widget giờ, ngày, tháng. - Viết ghi chú theo lịch âm hoặc dương. - Cho phép tùy chỉnh màu sắc hiển thị. - Hỗ trợ cả các dòng máy màn hình nhỏ (240x320). Vui lòng để lại lời bình và đánh giá của bạn. Sự cổ vũ của các bạn là động lực lớn để chúng tôi tiếp tục nâng cấp hoàn thiện hơn cho sản phẩm. Lunar Calendar 2015 - APPLICATION SCHEDULE FIRST VIETNAM Installs 1,000,000 hits. Lunar Calendar 2015 - Start shock 5 million milestone set! Lunar Calendar 2015 is a FREE app, helps you search lunar calendar convenient and fast. 2015 perpetual calendar allows you to view information about the calendar day, lunisolar calendar months and a lot of other useful information. The main functions: - View calendar days. - See the calendar month. - Change the calendar negative to positive, positive to negative quickly and accurately. - View daily weather by location. - View circadian rhythm: to tell you about the status of health transformation, emotional, intellectual to arrange their working time accordingly. - Van pray: pray hundreds of essays spanning across topics. - See Exodus direction and time. - Widget hours, days, months. - Write notes calendar or negative. - Allows custom color display. - Support the small screen series (240x320). Please leave a comment and your rating. Your encouragement is a great motivation for us to continue to upgrade more complete product.

A fun soup of numbers came to Android! SopiNum is an educational game for finding numbers that will help kids to learn numbers greater complexity, by find them in a grid . Different constraints, defined by the size of the grid and the number of digits in the number, children will have fun learning! Designed for children aged 3 years, its funny characters will accompany them in their learning. They were wrong when dialing a number? Does not matter! SopiNum allowed to play until the correct and gives a score to each hit. Who gathers the most stars wins!

Make your telephone or tablet speak to you with Voxygen’s Best-of-Vox Voices. The Eva voice reads aloud any French text. Get rid of flat voices with no expression or personality! Discover Natural and Fun Voices, and listen to a sample here: http://www.best-of-vox.com/android . Follow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/VoxygenSAS to keep up with new voices! Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/voxygen.fr ★ What is it for? Various ways to use Best-of-Vox voices: voice guidance, E-books and SMS reading, ring tones, alarm clocks, Android accessibility features with Talkback and much more. Share your messages from the Best-of-Vox application on your preferred social networks: SoundCloud, WhatsApp, Skype, hubiC, Evernote, Drive, etc. ★ How does it work? The Best-of-Vox application allows you to type or paste text and to have it read out aloud by the voice that you have chosen. You can then save it as a ringtone or share it with your friends on SoundCloud ! From your emails, your Internet browser, or any compatible application, select some text and make your Best-of-Vox voice read it aloud by simply clicking on the “share” menu. ★ How to install it? Only 2 clicks to activate the Best-of-Vox voice in the Android settings that you reach from the application's main menu. Watch the installation video and follow the instructions. Please note: with Android versions prior to 4.0, one additional first click is required at the bottom of the settings list in order to activate the voice. ★ How to fix an occasional problem? – Cannot hear the Best-of-Vox: First ensure that the volume of your device is sufficient. If this is the case, than it may be that the voice's data was corrupted during or after its installation. In order to reinitiate the voice, please perform the following steps: go to “Android Settings / Applications / Manage applications / Best-of-Vox voice”, click on “Force stop”, click on “Clear data”, return to the home screen, ensure that the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network (which is required to download the data), restart the Best-of-Vox application, wait for the download and data preparation to be fully completed, enter some text and click on the “play” button. Questions? Please contact android@voxygen.fr . Credits: Moteur de synthèse vocale / Voix de synthèse / Synthèse vocale / Speech synthesis / TTS / tts / Text To Speech / Texttospeech / Speech synthesis engine / TTS engine / Synthetic voice / TTS voice : http://www.best-of-vox.com/android
