description: Roulette Predictor & Calculator Pro, will give you a set of prediction to the most REASONABLE/THEORETICAL numbers that are about to come out. The power of a Roulette Computer is now in your pocket. Normal Price 50$. (similar prediction computer/calculator may cost up to 2000$ !! ) RECOMMENDATION Test the app in youtube it a lot of fun! WARNING Do not gamble! WARNING Do not use this app If it is ILLEGAL in your country! WARNING this app is not always right and if you do decide to gamble use with caution! WARNING I am not responsible for any losses misuse / use of this app will bring you! WARNING This app may contain bugs! WARNING  The default values in the app assume 80cm Roulette wheel,but ball size/weight does not matter. WARNING  The new vibration mode may be confusing and/or with/out bags. For mathematical details of the kinematics (basic kinematics) solved by this app can ALSO be found in here but a basic knowledge in physics is all you need. http://chaos.aip.org/resource/1/chaoeh/v22/i3/p033150_s1 It works with the help of a user input by pressing the button each time the ball pass 0 (green), the app calculate the speed and acceleration of the ball, with that information, the app will provide the THEORETICAL predicted numbers. Training of the speed which the ball finally leaves the upper ring is provided in the pro version. Text to speech is enabled @ the Pro version. NEW!! Vibration mode! by roulette quarters! This mode will enable you to know on which quarter the ball is most likely to falls on.
release_text: NEW- Option to control the number the generated numbers. NEW - Long press headset button for reset. Training - updated the training screen. NEW - control the app with the headset button = never take your phone out of your pocket. NEW - Text to speech will read you the numbers. Fix - double click on headset.

description: Portland's Trimet times tracker made simple. Made by a commuter for commuters. Don't miss another bus using the notification system. Schedule alarms so you'll get notified when the bus is getting to your stop. Relax while you are having breakfast, no need to check the app. Check-in and the app will tell you when you should be getting ready to get off the bus. Connect with other commuters using the Commuter Center. Feedback from users is always the best one. Stay updated. The app will tell you if there is any Trimet Alert. Watches buses, shuttles, MAX and Streetcar. Pull down to refresh the times. Swipe to delete a stop. Drag and drop to reorder them. *** Please report any bugs you find and your suggestions using the feedback option or contact me: @aows Keep PDX weird and enjoy its beer
release_text: This hopefully fixes the "black screen of doom" (copyright goes to @Gates_Jon). - Changes to the stop screen to comply with Google Maps Terms of Use. ------------- Please keep the suggestions and bug reports coming through the feedback option, at my email, or twitter @aows.

description: “Rotterdam is a must-see city in 2014" – according to Rough Guides & The New York Times Rotterdam is simply bursting with architecture, design, art and culture, but also boasts a wide and varied range of festivals, attractions, shops, restaurants and clubs. The Rotterdam App highlights the very best that Rotterdam has to offer. Use the calendar to find out what to see and do in this vibrant city, from festivals and events to exhibitions. Find restaurants nearby with GPS and call directly for reservations. With the offline map you can easily navigate back to your hotel. Share locations with your friends via Facebook, Twitter, e-mail or Whatsapp. Or discover Rotterdam with surprising walking tours guiding you to unique locations in the city. Using the application will not require an internet connection or additional roaming costs. You only need an internet connection to interact with the web or to download the offline map and updates. FEATURES • The best tips for exploring the city • Information and images for over 500 locations • Dynamic events calendar • Step-by-step walking tours (with audio and video) • Find locations nearby using GPS • View locations on the offline map • View the events calendar for each location • Share locations via Facebook, Twitter, e-mail, SMS or Whatsapp • Call locations directly from the app • Journey planner for public transport & metro map • ROTTERDAM.INFO Twitter Feed with daily tips • Discounts with the Rotterdam Welcome Card FEEDBACK Do you have questions or suggestions for the Rotterdam App? Please send your feedback to reactie@rotterdam.info .
release_text: - Bug fix for 'Practical information' Do you have questions or suggestions for the Rotterdam App? Please send your feedback to reactie@rotterdam.info.

description: This is the Android version of classic FC Tank War game. It is so popular in the past 30 years. Simplistic as it is, it is very addictive. So there is no more need for Propaganda for the game itself. Follow are some tips for the newcommers. 1 triangle button for automatic shoot. 2 square button for single shoot. Sometimes you need this button to stop the automatic shoot. 3 Protect your home, the eagle, and kill all the enemy tanks. 4 Kill the blinking tank and you will get a gift. The star will increase your shoot speed. The Clock will stop the time. The landmine will explode all the enemies. The armor will make your tank invincible for some time. There are still more types of the gifts and explore them by yourself. Enjoy it!

Mini Karaoke is back again. This app will be continuously improved. There will be more powerful algorithms, more convenient operation, better user interface and a AD free version. Newer version comes soon. This is the first Karaoke player in the mobile world. With her you can sing Karaoke songs in your android phone, with the only requirement that you have the mp3 files. Our slogan is sing karaoke anytime anywhere. You need not search through webs for the special KTV song formats, nor search the lyrics. Mini Karaoke will settle everything for you. ver2.0 new features: 1 The decoding process now is real time. You do not need to wait half a minute for decoding. 2 Lyrics is now auto scrolling. What is more, you can adjust time by scrolling the screen with your fingers. 3 Fix the bug of decoding error, which only produces annoying noise. Key functions are as follows: 1 4 Karaoke related buttons Vocal Removal: The voice of the singer will disappear and the music of the song will be kept. Lyrics Download: On most occasions, the lyrics will be automatically downloaded according to the mp3 file name and mp3 tags. But sometimes it may fail, then you can click the button and input the song information manually. Microphone Input: It means your voice will be inputted and mixed with the music. You d better plug your headset or you will notice some echo noise which caused by the loop from speaker to microphone. Record: Record the song and your voice as you wish. After you click the button, a timer will appear indicating how long the recording has taking. When you stops, a dialog will popup and ask you whether to convert the recording wave file to the mp3 format, which is smaller in size. 2 Lyrics Display The lyrics will scroll with the time. If you need to adjust time slower or faster, you just scroll the screen with your figure. You can use a larger lyrics screen by switch to the Lyrics TAB. If you prefer your own LRC file rather than download, you can put the LRC file with the same name as mp3 file into fold MINIKAROKE. 3 4 ordinary player related buttons Play/Pause, Next Song, Previous Song, System Volume. Nothing special to say. 4 Human voice and music voice scaling It is a progress bar and the default is 5:5. It works only when you turn the microphone on. It adjusts the volume of human and music when mixing them. Some tips: The audio related settings should be used with caution. The default may be the best for most phones, but still you can try. These settings will take effect after restarting the APP. From now on, sing karaoke anytime anywhere with your android.
release_text: 1 Fix the bug that makes recording encode fail. 2 Now users can select the recording source whether record only vocal or both vocal and music. 3 Now users can choose whether to play the vocal from MIC simultaneously or not.

description: 1、计算依据：各城市人力资源和社会保障局最新公布的社会保险缴纳所占工资比例及上下限额、各城市住房公积金管理中最新公布的公积金缴纳所占比例及上下限额、《中华人民共和国个人所得税法实施条例》。 2、本工资计算器目前已采集上海、北京、广州、深圳四城市2010年一般职工个人缴纳社会保险、住房公积金所占工资比例数据，其它城市职工请自行设置比例；此外，该四城市职工可能因缴纳的保险类别不同导致个人承担的保险比例不同以及公积金缴纳比例不同，请自行调整比例设置。 3、本工资计算器会及时根据政府最新公布的数据进行调整，并根据用户需求逐渐补充其它城市的数据。 4、您有任何疑问或建议请联系： 最新的到手工资计算器，由专业的人力资源专家为您打造。 1 输入税前工资，工资计算器自动显示个人应缴纳的各项社会保险、公积金及个人所得税，点击计算得出到手工资额。 2 各项费用的比例可以使用标准设置，也可以自行设置。 3 本工资计算器依据政府最新公布的数据设置比例及限额，目前已采集上海、北京、广州、深圳四城市2010年数据，数据会根据政府规定实时更新。 4 使用了各城市人力资源和社会保障局最新公布的社会保险缴纳所占工资比例及上下限额。 5 使用了各城市住房公积金管理中心最新公布的公积金缴纳所占比例及上下限额。 6 可以分别计算2011年9月1日税改前后的收入。 v1.02更新 根据上海最新平均工资的更新进行了修改。 同时，加入了苏州，杭州，南京等城市。
release_text: v1.03更新 加入2011年9月1日后税改后计算模式。

description: A small experimental chess game application which allows saving and loading matches, customization. Tested on HTC Desire (Android 2.2 Froyo) Features: * Easy-to-handle chess board suitable for 2 players. * Ability to turn pieces (useful if your opponent is sitting in front of you). * Game state is saved when app is exited. You can continue later. * Ability create game saves and load them. Known bugs: * Mate checking is not yet implemented * Castling is not yet implemented * Check warning is not displayed * Board appearance settings does not actually change the background
Chords for six-string guitar and a tuning-fork to tune the strings. This application is well suited for both beginners and experienced musicians!

Useless functions and needless effects are not necessary to remove mines. You just do that faster. Minesdroid helps all of you spend the comfortable "mine-clearance life". A light play by the simple interface and operability. Your clearance is helped by not only basic functions such as a "flag" and a "?", but also zooming display, scrolling it and the overviewing map. OK, let's begin Minesdroid! Minesdroid (Minesweeper, Mines) is a single-player game. You can open a block with tapping and put up a flag with tapping and holding. In addition, you can use a question mark by tapping a flag. After flags and question marks are tapped and held, they return to blocks. When you tap the block to open it, the number of mines that exist in its surrounding 8 blocks is displayed. If figures on the open block are equal to the number of flags around it, you can tap (and hold) it to open its surrounding blocks on which a flag is put at a stretch. In this case, even the blocks a question mark is put on open. Moreover you can zoom display to operate the seek bar at the bottom. And display can be scrolled while you slide your finger keeping to touch the screen. Zooming lets you play this game much smoothly. If all of the blocks except to be mined a mine are opened, you win. In the custom mode, you can choose the width and the height in 10-30 respectively and can specify how many mines from 10% to 80% of the (width x height). Pressing the menu button in the score view enables you to initialize data. It is necessary to finish the easy mode, the medium mode and the hard mode more than 5 times each so that you can play the very hard mode. Listing functions ・Zooming display with the seek bar ・Scrolling display while one's finger is sliding on the screen ・Change of the color of the block ・Change of the color of the background ・Vibration on tapping and holding ・A reduction to overview ・Pause and Save ・Online ranking (half-width alphanumeric and ten or less characters available for the name.) ・Sharing score using SNS such as Twitter *Android 4.0 and up recommended *You may not be able to register and acquire the online ranking depending on time.

description: Choose your 3D Galaxy and create your own live universe. 3D Galaxy Live Wallpaper features are: - 3D space enviroment using OpenGL 2.0. It uses 3d hardware to render images and save battery. - 3D Galaxy Live Wallpaper has 17 planets to choose (including the real Earth and Solar System planets). - Planet Earth, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto - Beatiful real scenes: galaxies core, nebulae, eye of god, cosmos images, space backgrounds. - Optional music by Kevin MacLeod ( http://incompetech.com/ ) - Moon and asteroids, space station, Voyager, Sputnik - Move the live wallpaper camera using accelerometer and/or touch screen. - Many customizable effects: galaxies, planets atmosphere, speed, light intensity, use of accelerometer, planet, asteroid and moon size. - 3D Galaxy Live Wallpaper support both portrait and landscape modes. This 3d live wallpaper has been tested on latest devices. Please contact us if your device is not supported. Note: This is the free version with some features disabled.

description: ATTENZIONE!!!!!!!!!! Zooper widget Galaxy S5 non è un applicazione stand-alone è necessario disporre di Zooper Widget Pro 2.38 o superiore installato sul proprio device. Zooper Widget Galaxy S5 Installer non estrae direttamente le skin, ma permette di installarla con un passo successivo. Questo risolve il problema delle skin corrotte o di altri problemi che si sono riscontrati con la versione precedente.Per qualsiasi problema non lasciate giudizi negativi contattatemi che cercherò di risolverli. CARATTERISTICHE L'applicazione contiene diversi widget ottimizzati per smartphone e per tablet,il tema cambia in base alle condizioni meteo.Aggiornamento 2.0 aggiunta il tasto aggiorna,corrette le icone rese piu realistiche a quelle del galaxy s5,aggiornate le immagini di sfondo del widget anche esse piu realistiche rispetto le precedenti. dalla versione 3.0.2 inserita la possibilità di scegliere la trasparenza del widget come l'originale galaxy s5 disponibile in tre versioni di trasparenza 100% 50% 25% ,inserito il widget easy mode,con la possibilità di inserire i widget singolarmente,come il calendario l'orologio e il meteo,le app presenti nel widget easy mode per funzionare correttamente necessitano un lancher di terze parti,cliccando sul giorno del calendario esso si collega al calendario di sistema,VERSION 3.1.5 aggiunto impostazioni sveglia orologio (clic sull'orario) aggiunto calendario di sistema (clic sulla data),aggiunto orario e data dell'ultimo update,aggiunto il widget galaxy s5 open yahoo (clic widget) ATTENZIONE!!! per funzionare necessita l'installazione di yahoo weather (yahoo meteo). INSTALLAZIONE Una volta scaricata la skin dal play store essa installa un applicazione che troverete nel app drawer basta aprirla ed cliccare il bottone install skin e la skin sara installata su zooper widget,basta Inserire un widget zooper 4x3 entrare nelle impostazioni e scegliere Galaxy S5 Widget, se si hanno dei problemi e la skin non si aggiorna basta riavviare il device per risolvere il problema,se invece si hanno problemi di adattamento allo schermo dello smartphone basta entrare nelle impostazioni ed modificare il valore di scaling ricordatevi di dare la posizione (gps wifi) e forzare l aggiornamento del widget. Easy mode inserire un widget grande quanto la home ho in alternativa se si ha un launcher di terze parti ingrandirlo quanto tutto lo schermo, in caso di problemi di adattamento dello schermo basta entrare nelle impostazione e andare su scaling diminuire o aumentare in base alle vostre esigenze per i widget del calendario e orologio singoli vi consiglio utilizzare widget 2x2,per il meteo piccolo un 4x2. -install galaxy s5 yahoo open inserire un widget 4x3 scegliere il widget galaxy s5 yahoo open tra quelli presenti,installare yahoo weather (yahoo meteo) da qui: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yahoo.mobile.client.android.weather adesso basta clic sul widget ed si aprira yahoo weather con tutte le info. Vi chiedo una piccola cortesia dopo aver installato e testata l app lasciate un voto e una recensione ciò mi aiuterà a portare miglioramenti all' app grazie. WARNING!!! Zooper widget Galaxy S5 is not a stand-alone application, you must have Zooper Widget Pro 2:38 or higher installed on your device. Galaxy S5 Zooper Widget Installer does not pull the skin directly, but allows you to install it with the next step. This solves the problem of corrupt or other skin problems that are encountered with the version precedente.Per any problem do not leave negative feedback please contact me I will try to solve them. FEATURES The application contains several widgets optimized for smartphones and tablets, the theme will change according to conditions meteo.Aggiornamento 2.0 added the key update, correct icons made more realistic to those of galaxy s5, update the background image of the widget they also more realistic than the previous ones. from version 3.0.2 added the ability to choose the transparency of the widget as the original galaxy s5 available in three versions transparency 100% 50% 25%, added the widget to easy mode, with the ability to insert the widget individually, as the calendar clock and weather widget apps in the easy mode to run correctly lancher need a third party, by clicking on the calendar day it connects to the system calendar, alarm clock settings VERSION 3.1.5 added (click on ' time) added to the system calendar (click on the date), added time and date of the last update, added the widget galaxy s5 open yahoo (click widget) WARNING! operation requires the installation of yahoo weather (yahoo weather). INSTALLATION Once you have downloaded the skin from the play store it installs an application that you will find in the app drawer just open it and click the install button skin and skin will be installed on Zooper widget, just Place a 4x3 widget Zooper enter settings and choose Widgets Galaxy S5, if you have problems and the skin does not update just restart the device to fix the problem, but if you have problems of adaptation to the screen of your smartphone simply enter in the settings and change the value of scaling remember to give the location (gps wifi) and force the update of the widget. Easy mode to insert a widget as big as the home I have an alternative if you have a third-party launcher enlarge the whole screen as in the case of problems of adjustment of the screen just go into settings and go to scaling decrease or increase according to your needs widgets for the calendar and clock widget 2x2 single I recommend you use for the weather a little 4x2. Galaxy s5-install yahoo open add a 4x3 widget to choose the widget galaxy s5 open yahoo among those present, install yahoo weather (yahoo weather) from here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yahoo.mobile.client.android.weather Now just click on the widget and it will open yahoo weather with all the details. I ask you a little bonus after you have installed and tested the app please leave a rating and a review that will help me bring improvements to 'app thanks.

With this app you get an extension for the DashClock widget which shows you informations about new What App messages. Android 4.1+ uses the accessability service to read your incoming What App messages. This has to be activated in the system. Since Android 4.3+ the app uses the notification access service which also has to be activated in the system. The settings of this app brings you directly to the correct system settings. This extension requires the requires the Dashclock Widget by Roman Nurik: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.dashclock How you can add a widget to lookscreen is described here: https://support.google.com/nexus/answer/2781801?hl=en If you dont want an icon in launcher please use the donate version. Many users need a fine instruction for using this application first time and so we added the configuration as an app icon. The visibility of an app icon is not a dynamic settings in android so we need an new app version. Sorry. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.stallware.dashclock.whatsapp.donate Please report errors to our email adress.

Before I Eat: A Moment In The Zone, helps you manage food cravings and eating urges as they occur. Stop binge eating, emotional eating and overeating! Finally, a tool to help you manage the moment of the impulse! Over 100 minutes of audio plus specialty tools, you can quickly build a customized plan that's a virtual panic button at your fingertips to use whenever an urge strikes. Features: - 25 total sessions with 100+ minutes of combined Coach-led audio. - Tactical guidance and direction for when you're "In The Moment" of an urge. - Customize with your own personal audio recordings and notes. - Daily Journal, Notebook and Goal Management tracking systems. - Reward success using customizable random reward "fishbowl" drawings. - Countdown timers and motivational quotes for quick focus and inspiration. - Add any session or tool to "My Plan" for fast access. Before I Eat is literally an eating urge survival guide. Use it to create your own plan for handling your next eating impulse. Use it to guide you through it step-by-step as it happens! Before I Eat is a perfect companion app for anyone dealing with food cravings, overeating, binge eating disorder, emotional eating, trying to lose weight or weight loss and even bulimia. Wishing you the best of luck!

Build and command your own starship! 4.5/5 - TouchArcade “Should you dive in immediately? Absolutely.” 4/5 - Androidspin “A great mobile space romp which adopts a great theme, great gameplay and will keep you busy for quite a few hours...” Star Command let's you build your own ship, hire your crew, explore the universe and battle alien civilizations across the galaxy. • Premium game - no in app purchase roadblocks • HD support for retina pixel goodness • Level your crew members up and earn new skills • Build a ship in your own image • Four distinct ship hulls to choose from • Focus on tactical, science or engineering • Amazing soundtrack intensifies the action and exploration • Over 10 alien species to discover Brought to you in beautiful HD pixelated glory, Star Command brings to life the challenges and joys of managing a starship. Upgrade your ship, get out into the unknown and watch your crew die grizzly deaths all at your command. Strange and annoying alien civilizations await you at every turn. Manage each of your ships roles, focusing on science skills, tactical combat and ship engineering. And don’t forget that your decisions matter - an enemy made early could come back to haunt you later.

description: Let's face it. We all have a limited amount of time on this planet. A bucket list is a checklist of all the things you want to do before you die, or "Kick the bucket". Its an in-your-face method of motivating you to organize and carry out your life goals. Bucket List Buddy turns your mobile device into the ultimate bucket list. Using a simple, touch interface, create and update goals you want to achieve in your lifetime. Do you need an extra kick in the pants? Or perhaps you just want to reflect on how far you've come. Choose and attach photos to your entries, and then view them as slides in the Gallery mode. Its easy, fast, and convenient. No more hassling with pen and paper, or hunting down your list in that messy room of yours. You can always rely on your Bucket List Buddy! This is the ad supported version, Bucket List Buddy Free. We also have an ad free version available on the store, Bucket List Buddy. ** COMING SOON! ** + Import / Export to Dropbox. + Optimizations for tablets and larger displays.

description: This is "match 3" type game, but also it is a Math game. Bright graphics, neat speceffects and interesting gameplay you will find in this number puzzle game. The game has three difficulty levels. You can set the hiscore for each of them. Game features: - Combination of "Match 3" and "number puzzle" game - Cool graphics and animation - The number of points you get for each chain is a product of numbers, which it contains. - Interesting bonus balls which help you to destroy more balls. You can also purchase the PREMIUM version of the game. It has more balls and bonuses and no ads. Your small contribution can help our games to become even better! Please, take a moment to review this game, so we can make it better. Every issue will be solved in the next update! Enjoy playing!

description: S Pen Launcher allows you to quickly launch an app when detaching your Samsung S Pen. You can either automatically launch an app or display a customizable launcher with applications and shortcuts. S Pen Launcher is designed for the Samsung Galaxy Note 2, Galaxy Note 10.1, and Galaxy Note 8.0. Unfortunately the original Galaxy Note does not have an S Pen detachment sensor. Features • Automatically launch an app or shortcut when you detach your S Pen • Show app launcher when you detach your S Pen • Dismiss app launcher when you attach your S Pen • Add app launcher shortcut to use without detaching your S Pen An explanation of each permission required by S Pen Launcher can be seen here: https://spenlauncher.uservoice.com/knowledgebase/articles/183527 Please check out our feedback site at https://spenlauncher.uservoice.com . You can submit feature requests, contact support, and read the FAQ. If you encounter any bugs, please email us at tickets@spenlauncher.uservoice.com with a description of the bug. S Pen Launcher is a product of Steadfast Innovation. Our mission is to provide products and services that make the most of the latest advancements in technology. We are committed to providing the best experience to our customers. We would love to hear from you! Website: http://steadfastinnovation.com UserVoice: https://spenlauncher.uservoice.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/steadfastinnov Facebook: http://facebook.com/SteadfastInnovation Google+: https://plus.google.com/118390888103988810792 Youtube: http://youtube.com/SteadfastInnovation

With Stingray Music, you've got all the music genres, right at your fingertips. The best music for every moment, place and mood in your life, curated by music experts from around the globe. Features of the Stingray Music mobile app: • Easily navigate among hundreds of expertly curated music channels, in all popular music genres. • Enjoy unlimited streaming in the highest quality digital audio. • Access the latest releases and chart-topping local and international artists. • Authenticate instantly with audio signal recognition or use your TV provider’s single login. • Sign in using your Facebook account. • Play tracks while viewing the album cover art. • Bookmark your favourite channels. • See the current track info, as well as what’s coming up next* and the previous songs. • Read full channel descriptions and learn more about the channel programmers. • Sophisticated look and feel. • No ads, no talk. description: Listen on demand to your favorite news, comedy, sports and talk radio shows on your Android phone or tablet. Discover interesting episodes and amazing listening from over 25,000 shows. Change the way you listen to radio. ***WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING*** CNET “Stitcher is to news and information what Pandora is to music” BUSINESS WEEK “Makes Sirius look overpriced and stodgy” GIZMODO “Stitcher collects and stitches together spoken word radio content. Think of it as your local public radio station, times 400” ***KEY FEATURES*** * CREATE CUSTOM STATIONS: “Stitch” together your favorite shows to create customized stations. * DISCOVER NEW SHOWS: Stitcher helps you find new shows you’ll love by recommending shows other listeners of the same show also like. * LISTEN ON DEMAND: Get the latest episodes of your favorite shows as soon as they are released, without the hassle of downloading and syncing podcasts. * GET BREAKING NEWS: Keep up with the day’s biggest stories on the front page and via breaking news audio alerts sent to your phone. * SHARE WITH FRIENDS: Share your favorite shows on Twitter, Facebook and email. Stitcher is the best way to stay connected with the information that’s important to you. Stitcher Radio is a smarter way to listen to the radio. ***AWARDS & PRAISE*** - 20 Best Apps - TechCrunch - 25 Top Android Apps - TIME Magazine - 12 Best Entertainment Apps - PC World - Essential Driving App - Wired.com - Best News App - Best App Ever Awards - Best Mobile News App - Webby's People's Voice Award - Top 75 Android Apps - PC Magazine - Top 5 Podcast Apps - Mashable "Best Podcast app ever" -- Eric "Great, an easy way to keep up on current news" -- Jake “Unbeatable, and I’ve tried a few. Like having a real radio in your hand” -- Cyril “The best thing about it is having different playlists; one for my morning commute, another for my lunch hour and another for heading home" -- Jerry A NOTE ON PERMISSIONS "Read your contacts" - Stitcher allows you to invite your friends to start listening on Stitcher. The "Read your contacts" permission is required for this type of functionality. Contacts data will never be used without a user's explicit consent. We will never sell users' contacts data to advertisers.

description: Control your Android with just tilts and flips! Use combos of physical 3D gestures to do or launch almost anything you wish without even unlocking your device! Take a look at YT movie it tells more than thousands of words! This is real breakthrough to control your device by 3D gestures, make it with real sense, forget simple shaking, Magus takes you on the higher level! Featured by XDA-Developers.com and Lifehacker.com Never before have you done this kind of magic with your device. XDA: It's a pretty revolutionary idea actually, as it creates more choices for those who are looking for alternative ways to control their devices, or aren't able to use a device otherwise because of disabilities. Lifehacker: Magus is a new utility that lets you move your phone in three dimensions to open apps, unlock, take pictures, and more. NOW v 1.12 is even better!!! *** - Save more battery option for Android 4.3+ *** - Fingerptint Options for Galaxy S5 *** - Android Wear functionality - more innovative than air gestures - better than simply shake - more than launcher - better than icons - faster than standard gestures TASKER INTEGRATION AND PLUGIN! Find it on Google Play! This is what Magus is! Magus is an android application which allows you to control your device by making simple gestures - 3D phoneGestures (Face Up, Face Down, Right side Up, Left side Up, Top side Up, Bottom side Up). * * Please TRY FREE version before buy, Magus is very specific app * * Don't shake your device, just make real meaningful gestures! You can make various combos consisting of two, three or four gestures. Your combos can activate the following actions: * Hardcore unlock function for real hardcore users :-) * Taking a photo [ stealth/secret mode ] * Recording voice [ stealth/secret mode ] * Recording video [ stealth/secret mode ] * Running a chosen application * Run Tasker Task * Music controls (Play, Pause, Prev, Next) * Answering and Disconnecting a call * Locking and unlocking device * Bluetooth on and off * Wifi on and off * Turning the flashlight on and off * Dialing a number * Creating a text message * Direct sending text message (for example emergency sms) * Creating an email * Toggling audio profiles * Running your camera * Run Google Now * Say the actual time * Mute Sounds for X Minutes * Open VPN Settings * Open Home Screen You can do almost everything! Use your imagination! Launch, activate, toggle, change, run, record, take picture - anything you want! Watch YouTube videos or visit our website and take a look at tons of info and examples! NOTICE: Take a look at settings and adjust your scenario for Magus: choose between: Work all the time or Sleep when phone does mode and set the Scheduler to manage Magus in time! Those are very important things when it comes to battery usage. There is also a widget to have quick way to enable or disabe Magus.

description: Quick Measure can be used to measure distances up to 100m. Use to check out the length of rooms in your home, design a new garden layout, or simply measure how far you can kick a ball! It is simple to use: a target will be shown overlayed on your device’s camera. Aim this at the base of an object and the distance to it will be measured. The app also has an overlay with 1 to 5m, 10m, 50m, and 100m grid lines so that you can quickly see the approximate distance to surrounding objects. If you would rather see feet and inches than metres, you can change this in the preferences menu. The calculations within Quick Measure are based on trigonometry. To improve accuracy please see the “help” section with the app. Quick Measure Pro is the same great app as Quick Measure but without the adverts.

The Pipeline Inspection mobile app is designed to ensure safety of pipelines in different fields including oil and gas pipeline, water-supply and more. The app allows pipeline operators, contractors and inspectors to check parts of pipe networks and determine their condition, detect coating defects and corrosion anomalies. The app includes several inspection forms that collect key data on pipelines and facilities: The Technical Data Sheet summarizes the performance and technical characteristics of pipelines like types and location of pipelines, pipeline sizes and length, width of right of way and more. It also covers pipeline material and the areas to be disturbed by pipeline. The Pipeline Leak Survey mobile form allows to detect leaks and record your findings. The app covers: Leak number, Date found, Time found, Time classified, Location and Photos. Utilizing the Pipeline Inspection mobile app you will maintain pipelines in a good condition, keep your business safe, improve customer service and satisfaction. Summary app features include: • Conduct pipeline inspections and email the results to the manager • Check technical pipeline characteristics, test their performance and indicate problems • Sync collected data across multiple devices • Detect and report leaks • See all the conducted inspections on the Map according to the pipeline location • Retrieve PDF forms of the conducted inspections print them and share via email, network drives and other sharing options available on device • Store all the data locally on the device and access it anytime, anywhere • Collect different types of data including locations, images, dates, time, signatures etc. • Work in online/offline mode By utilizing the Pipeline Inspection app you will have the following benefits: • Performing inspections on the spot • Ensure pipeline safety • Keep pipelines in a good condition • Improve data accuracy • Increase efficiency • Save time and reduce costs • Eliminate paperwork and go green If you are not satisfied with our pre-built form solution, you can upload your own PDF form and 100% customize it to meet your specific business needs. Moreover, you can: - upload any PDF form or document from local storage or cloud drives - add your own fields to existing forms including datetime, text, numeric, location, signature, picture,radio, checkbox - fill in your PDF forms - print forms - share forms via email and messages - upload forms to cloud drives - save and view generated reports on your device Don't settle for an App that doesn't fit your business needs. Snappii Apps are 100% customizable, securely deployed and seamlessly integrated into you back end systems using the feature-rich Snappii Platform. Using the Pipeline mobile app for conducting inspections you will maintain pipelines in a good condition, keep your business safe, improve customer service and satisfaction. By downloading, you agree to the Terms of Use at https://www.snappii.com/policy In addition to using free Pipeline Inspection version you can remove all ads in the app by purchasing a $0.99 one-time fee and get unlimited number of form submissions by subscribing via an optional In-App Purchase. Subscribe from your device and access these services via mobile app. In-App Subscription Details: • Monthly Unlimited Form Submission Subscription to get is $4.99 US dollars per month • Annual Unlimited Form Submission Subscription to get is $49.90 US dollars per year • Payment will be charged at confirmation of purchase • No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period • Account will be charged for renewal automatically

Billy the SpaceCat is a great illustrated children's storybook with full narration, soothing background music and effects. It is the story of Billy, a kind cat and his companion Teeny the mouse trying to realize his dream to fly in the sky. You can read the story to your children or let the story gently narrate itself.

Mines is game for your Android device. The object of the game is to clear an abstract minefield without detonating a mine. The game is played by revealing squares of the grid, by clicking them. If a square containing a mine is revealed, the player loses the game. Otherwise, a digit is revealed in the square, indicating the number of adjacent squares that contain mines. If this number is zero then the square appears blank, and the surrounding squares are automatically also revealed. Main features: • Tree different difficulty. • Custom grid size and mines count. • Online highscores. • Large scrollable and zoomable game area. In order to keep the app 100% free, you will receive the following – Search shortcut icon on your home screen, Search shortcut on your bookmarks and browser homepage. This will help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future. You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), this will not affect the application in any way.

Saint Valentine's Day, commonly known as Valentine's Day or the Feast of Saint Valentine, is observed on February 14 each year. It is celebrated in many countries around the world, although it remains a working day in most of them. St. Valentine's Day began as a liturgical celebration of one or more early Christian saints named Valentinus. The most popular martyrology associated with Saint Valentine was that he was imprisoned for performing weddings for soldiers who were forbidden to marry and for ministering to Christians, who were persecuted under the Roman Empire. The heart (♥) has long been used as a symbol to refer to the spiritual, emotional, moral, and in the past, also intellectual core of a human being. As the heart was once widely believed to be the seat of the human soul, the word heart continues to be used poetically to refer to the soul, and stylized depictions of hearts are used as prevalent symbols representing love. Make you and your lover full of sweet and romance. ♥ Change the background color in all corners. ♥ Change the number of hearts. ♥ Set image of you or your love as background. ♥ I'ts Free How To Use: HOME->Press Menu->Wallpapers-LiveWallpaper In order to keep the app 100% free, you will receive the following – Search shortcut icon on your home screen, Search shortcut on your bookmarks and browser homepage. This will help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future. You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), this will not affect the application in any way.

description: Chronos (Ancient Greek: Χρόνος, "time," also transliterated as Khronos or Latinized as Chronus) is the personification of Time in pre-Socratic philosophy and later literature. CHRONOS CLOCK WIDGET is named after the Greek God of Time and has 14 Clocks not just to make your Android Device Beautiful, but to act as an Amulet (A Lucky Charm) to bring luck. We live in a colorful world. Most of the colors have feelings and emotions associated with them and each color has association with a specific day of the Week and the Planet which rules that day. Chronos Clock widget has 2 Analog Clocks representing each day of the week, designed with the Colors matching that specific day, to bring positive energies from the right combination. #MONDAY - WHITE OR YELLOW Monday is the day of the Moon and The color of the day is White or Yellow symbolizing Purity, Wholesomeness and Sacred Rituals. #TUESDAY - RED Tuesday is the day of Planet Mars and the color of the day is Red symbolizing Sacrifice, Sex and Earth #WEDNESDAY - GREEN Wednesday is the day of Planet Mercury and the color of the day is Green symbolizing Fertility, Renewal and Wealth #THURSDAY - ORANGE OR YELLOW Thursday is the day of Planet Jupiter and the color of the day is Yellow and Orange symbolizing Enlightenment, Creativity and Shyness #FRIDAY - WHITE OR BLUE Friday is the day of Planet Venus and the color of the day is Blue and white symbolizing Purity, Mystery, Nobility and Tranquility #SATURDAY - BLACK OR VIOLET Saturday is the day of Planet Saturn and the color of the day is Black or Violet symbolizing Power, Creativity and Artistic Talent #SUNDAY - PINK OR ORANGE Sunday is the day of the Sun and the color of the day is Orange or Pink symbolizing Adventure, Change and Love

description: When used correctly, this application can track your BAC level over the course of an evening, whether you’re drinking pints of beer, small glasses of wine or double martinis! Simply enter your drinks as you consume them, and based on your weight and gender the chart will tell you when you will return to under .08% blood alcohol level! Developed by well-known DUI lawyer James C. Egan of Seattle, Washington, this app is a lifesaver for avoiding per se DUI in any state. Other great features of the app: Bartender Ninja sobriety game (break those bottles!), text of the popular article “What you should know before being stopped for DUI,” by James Egan, an easy way to record an officer’s conversation (legal to do in Washington State!), and an easy way to call or text messages to James Egan personally, and set up a Skype/ Facetime consultation. Best of all, it’s perfectly free!” This app is provided as a resource by The Law Offices of James C. Egan PLLC, includes James C. Egan, a former prosecutor and public defender, Karl J. Verzani, Jay W. Wilkinson and Lynda J. Stone, experienced criminal trial attorneys. You will find us in downtown Seattle in the heart of historical Pioneer Square at First Avenue and Yesler Way. We have a combined 52 years of experience in matters involving DUI defense, civil rights, personal injury, and other misdemeanor defense cases in Seattle and surrounding cities and towns. The Blood Alcohol Concentration calculator is for entertainment purposes only and is not intended to provide scientifically accurate results of a person level of intoxication.

CI Mobile is a quick and convenient access to the China Airlines Mobile services. Experience the latest and best version of the official CI Mobile app, Which offers: * Online Booking : Starting from inputting your travel itinerary, the system guides you to go through whole purchasing process in an user-friendly way. * e-Shopping：Passengers enter the booking code and name; preorder any item (excluding tobacco and Dior items) online between 24 hours-14 days before the day of departure from “Taiwan, or 72 hours – 14 days departure through mobile preselected meals. * e-Menu：Passengers enter the booking code and passenger name and 24 hours before – 14 days departure through mobile preselected meals. * Travel Management : We are offering a customized booking feature as well as inquiry feature for flight schedule and flight status. You will be also informed regarding flight irregularities. * Flight Schedule：We are offering Online Inquiry for China Airlines' flight schedule information. * Flight Status : China Airlines' flight status will be displayed in a real-time manner by using departure/arrival city or flight number. * DFP services: Mileage check and related DFP news are available. * Promotion news: Various promotion news are available including Dynasty Package, DFP and China Airlines website activities. * E-check-in : e-check-in is available through mobile phone during 3-24 hours before flight departure. * Contact us : All china airlines service numbers are just a click away. * China Airlines Travel Channel : Our facebook provides a platform for fans exchanging their travel information.

Parker shows you where open parking spaces are right now in more than 30 cities and universities in the US and the UK, while also giving you access to information for over 24,000 parking lots and garages. Simply select a street with available spots or garage on the map and get turn-by-turn voice navigation. You'll also get instant access to prices, payment options, and hours. Up to the minute parking availability is offered in Los Angeles, Hollywood, Boston, Venice Beach, Studio City, Indianapolis, Reno, Fort Lauderdale and Ellicott City MD, as well as at Clemson University and Oregon State University, with more on the way. To see a longer list, scroll below. Features of Parker include: - Find open parking spots, and even see on which side of the street you’ll find them - Use filters to only show spots that meet your preferences. (No coins? Not a problem – we can show you where bills or credit cards are accepted; Need accessible parking? We can show you availability for that, too.) - View prices, payment options, hours (i.e., street parking free after 7PM), and more - One touch, turn-by-turn voice navigation quickly directs you to your preferred parking location - Built-in timer reminds you when your meter is about to expire - “Walk-to-Car” provides directions back to your car - View traffic conditions en route to your destination Up to the minute parking information for locations including… Birmingham, UK Boston, MA Capitola, CA Case Western Reserve University, OH Clemson University Cleveland, OH Ellicott City, MD Fort Lauderdale, FL Hollywood Indianapolis, IN Jacksonville, FL Los Angeles, CA Manchester, UK New York City - The Bronx, Roosevelt Island New Brunswick, NJ Oregon State University Redwood City, CA Reno, NV San Carlos, CA San Mateo, CA Studio City, CA University of Maryland, College Park Vancouver, WA Venice Beach, CA Washington D.C.
release_text: What’s New in Parker 4.3.1 * Various bug fixes

description: Ultra Battery Saver is an application which provides users an easy way to conserve battery life and data plan.The application provides features to switch off the WiFi and Mobile Data radios at selected intervals and switch them back for user defined minutes.This conserves battery life and your data plan.There are options to hold the application during Screen unlock (Example: You were watching a video and don't want the data saver to kick in) or during charge cycles.Bluetooth on Call is another battery saving feature which turns on your Bluetooth only during voice calls.With the combination of all these features you get extended battery usage without compromising your email syncs and social network feeds.
release_text: * Horizontal Scrollbar added for smaller screens * Bug Fixes * Added button to Switch Off data without any timer when phone is locked

Fetch allows to search for postings on Apartment.com, Backpage, Cars.com, Craigslist, Ebay Motors, Hemmings Motor News, Indeed, and Rent.com. Fetch features: - Simple and advanced queries with logical operators; - Strong map integration. Locations can be set from a map and search results can be shown on a map. - Alerts from queries running periodically in the background. - Evernote integration. Postings found with Fetch can be added to a Evernote notebook and tagged. - Favorites. Postings from a search can saved as favorites, shared by email, sms, etc.

GetAJob is the #1 application to help find and organize job opportunities from the top 10 job search websites including the US government. It finds jobs with SimplyHired, Indeed, AuthenticJobs, CareerBuilder, Careerjet, GitHubJobs, JobServe, USAJobs, LinkedIn, and Zijob. Job descriptions can be bookmarked as favorites or saved to Evernote as notes and tagged according to the job location, job type, company, and source. Evernote is always accessible from GetAJob and allows to annotate, follow-up, or search through saved job offers. GetAJob also geolocates job offers on a map, and supports 53 countries using local language versions of the job search engines. If you have comments or suggestions, please contact me at contact@studioeleven.fr . Happy hunting.
release_text: - Added support for 4 additional job providers: JobServe, USAJobs (US gov), LinkedIn, and Zijob, bringing the total number of job providers to 10!

description: With this application, you can find information of each route for KMB, NWFB, CityBus, NLB, MTR bus and Discovery Bay Bus. Besides the point to point route search and GPS Positioning functions you can find in original version of Hong Kong BusInfo, this version also have Bus Stop finding, bus journey navigation and interchange support for point to point route search! For permissions: Except for permissions to market verification, GPS usage and AD support, others are for navigation purpose only. This application is currently in beta stage, please report any bugs to developer's homepage or support e-mail. During beta stage, all functions are usable, and ADs can be removed if you have made a donation to the original Hong Kong BusInfo. Permission Requirements: ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION: Acquire your location in Where Am and Area Search I with Wi-Fi/Cell positioning ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION: Acquire your location in Where Am I, Area Search and Navigation with GPS hardware positioning ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Detection of where network is available for OSMDroid INTERNET: Used for display advertisements WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Used for writing error logs to storage card VIBRATE: Used to notify user in Navigation WAKE_LOCK: The phone must be kept awake during navigation DISABLE_KEYGUARD: Used to notify user in Navigation without need to unlock first (Lock will be restored after notification) CHECK_LICENSE: Reserved for future use BILLING: Reserved for future use
release_text: *** Remember either to enable auto-check update or check database update regularly to ensure you get the most current database *** Updated database to 2015/2/21 - Database Update

Don’t become just another shark snack! Skillfully swim a scuba diver through shark infested waters in this bright and colorful game. Simple, addicting, and just in time for Shark Week 2014, this game will surely entertain you for many hours! The controls are simple – tap the screen to swim up, and let the scuba diver sink to move down. Sounds easy, right? Think again! This game will have you on the edge of your seat as you try to avoid the Great White and Hammerhead sharks. Could the great white be the legendary Submarine shark? Or perhaps is the hammerhead Old Hitler himself? Good Luck, and don't become just another shark snack!

This application links to streaming media. A standard 2GB plan allows for roughly 60 hours of streaming audio, or 17 hours of streaming video a month. Extensive use of streaming media may exceed monthly data transfer allowance with your service provider. Please check with your service provider for information about your plan. On May 7, 1999, the International House of Prayer Missions Base in Kansas City, Missouri was founded by Mike Bickle and twenty full-time intercessory missionaries who cried out to God in prayer with worship for thirteen hours each day. Four months later, on September 19, 1999, prayer and worship extended to the full 24/7 schedule which continues today. description: About Fix Emotion And Body Pain Hypnosis App This powerful pain management hypnosis audio is created by Elizabeth Harford, licensed UCM minister since 1993 and certified hypnotherapist by the "The National Guild Of Hypnotists" in 2001. Do you have any physical pain like... muscle pain, back pain, body pain, acne pain, wound pain, skin pain, stomach pain, chest pain, wounds, headache, giving birth, etc... Or emotional pain like embarrassment, rejection, being hurt, lost of love ones and so on? It has been proven that hypnosis can control pain to a very substantial degree if not totally, even the severest pain, as in extensive burns and advanced cancer. It works great for dentistry and child birth, too. Clients with organic pain problems have excellent results obtaining pain relief. Until recently, nobody really understood how the mind relieved pain. We know now that chronic pain feeds itself, creating a self-reinforcing cycle that must first be broken and then reversed to bring relief. Pain, we know now, is highly subjective. It's a combination of physical sensations and emotional responses. The longer it persists, the more dominant the emotional component becomes. YOUR emotional reaction to pain must be resolved before pain can be relieved. This is where hypnosis really shines. Unlike other pain relief therapy, it has the ability to treat both the pain level itself, as well as the emotional reaction to it. It simply works! And once again, it is safe, 100% natural and effective. What would you give to wake up one day and no longer either feel or fear pain? You can now overcome pain. Wouldn't it be nice to look forward to living each day instead of just suffering through it? Well, you can, as easily as flipping a switch to turn on a light. It really is that simple, because that's all hypnosis does. It simply flips a few subconscious switches that are already there, just not turned on, (or off!), yet! And all you have to do is lay back, and allow yourself to be taken there, to a place where you have control over the pain levels in your body and your reactions to it. You're just an hour away from feeling and seeing the future with the new, pain-free you in it! Important message! Hypnosis can be very powerful in alleviating pain. But it should never take the place of a visit to a competent physician! Pain is often a warning signal and a symptom of an underlying disorder that needs to be treated. One should be screened first by a thorough medical examiner to establish the diagnosis and recommended treatment. Then follow it! Hypnosis should never be used in lieu of the doctors orders, but with the doctors approval certainly can be used in conjunction with them. This hypnosis audio used to be sold in a CD for $30 but you can now get it for free. Download Fix Emotion And Body Pain Hypnosis App to manage pain today. **************************************** What Is Hypnosis In General **************************************** Hypnosis is a state of heightened suggestibility, allowing the subconscious mind to accept suggestions easily, while in hypnosis. Habits that one has had for a long time can be eliminated altogether, or they can be changed to healthier and more beneficial choices. Hypnosis has highly positive results. In fact, scientists say that we use less than 10% of our potential - that being our conscious mind-- the other 90% being our subconscious mind. Hypnosis taps into the subconscious mind, unlocking it. Getting rid of the habits and problems and replacing them with new, positive lifestyle changes. Hypnosis can benefit everybody in every walk of life and proven. It helps to make everyone the best they can be at whatever they are trying to change or challenge in life. Try the Fix Emotion And Body Pain Hypnosis App today. It can be your pain management solution.

description: Smart Kids: Third Grade is a one-stop-app for a third grader to learn Math, English, Science and Social. The app is designed in a kid-friendly manner with easy to navigate screens. Colorful screens and engaging questions keep the kids interested. ***The scratchpad functionality is not available yet for this app.** ***** Best Elementary APP Award2011 for our First and Second grade apps ***** http://bestappever.com/awards/2011/winner/eled FEATURES: All U.S. states curriculum is taken in to consideration. Maintained high standards and framed good quality questions in all subjects. Some questions follow True or False pattern to explain the concepts. Explanations are provided for some hard questions to guide the kid in learning the concepts. MATH: -Additions(Easy number additions to Multiplication problems). -Subtractions(Easy subtractions to Division problems). -Geometry(shapes and fractions). -General(Reading different clocks and Number patterns). ENGLISH: -Grammar(Punctuations, Compound words, Nouns and Verbs). -Sentence(Fill in the blanks, Complete sentences). -Spelling(Identify the correct spelled word). -General(Plurals, Antonyms, Synonyms). SCIENCE: -Life science (understanding of Plants and Animals). -Earth Science (Measuring concepts like Pounds, Miles etc). -Physical Science(Solids, Liquids and Gases). SOCIAL: -Geography(States, Capitals, Nicknames, and Outline Maps). -Civics (Basic functionality of Government branches). -History(American History and Historic Places). -General(Time Zones like EST, CST and PST). We value your feedback, so please email us at info@smartkidsway.com for suggestions on improving our Third Grade App.

Compass with digital inclinometer for quickly estimating slope angles. Compass needle points true north. No calibration necessary. Air bubble can be used as a level. Blue inclination needle points down when device is held vertically. Digital readout of inclination angle shown in upper left. To measure slope angles in the mountains while hiking or backcountry skiing, hold device at arms length, align bottom of device with slope, and read the inclination angle. Slopes from 25-60 degrees typically have a higher avalanche risk. Human triggered avalanches are most common from 35-45 degrees, with 38 degrees being the most common. Avalanche hazard typically increases uniformly with slope angle. Close app after use to extend battery life.

SPT Mountain Locator Compass by Summit Peak Technologies. Have you ever been out hiking, snowshoeing, backcountry skiing, camping, or just driving around, seen a mountain off in the distance, and wondered about the name, elevation, or distance to the mountain? Have you ever been excited about fishing an alpine lake and wondered about the direction to the lake, and if the lake is over the next ridge or below the next peak? I have, and it can be tricky digging a printed map out of the ziplock bag in my pocket, or digging out the GPS and panning around to try and figure it out. Of course that never happens, since someone might see me and think I am lost -- how embarrassing. It just takes up valuable fishing time anyway, so why bother? If you have started carrying your phone into the backcountry as I have, and have it handy to snap a photo of any critter that may pop up, waterfall you come across, or you just need an excuse to catch your breath, now your troubles are over. Start up the Mountain Locator App and instantly see the direction, name, elevation, and distance to any nearby feature. If I'm fishing, I set it to display mountains, ridges, and lakes. If I'm hiking, I add falls, springs, benches, cliffs, and glaciers. If I'm driving around, I have my navigator add cities and trailheads (don't be a distracted driver). Impress your friends with your knowledge of local geography. Play games with your kids to guess the distance to a mountain on the horizon. Give better answers for those "Are we there yet?" questions. You may even discover new information about features near your house. Hold up your camera as if you were taking a picture of a mountain and see the name, elevation, and distance to the mountain in miles, displayed right on the camera video of the mountain. Move the phone around to view information for all surrounding mountains. Display information for surrounding ridges, hills, trails, lakes, ... (glaciers, cliffs, pillars, arches, craters, cities, etc.) out to hundreds of miles away. Works in any state in the US, including Alaska and Hawaii, as well as all US territories. Covers thousands of mountains, ridges, lakes, and other features in each state. Go the the Settings tab to select English or Metric units, adjust video zoom to fit your phone camera, adjust text size for easier reading, set the number and types of features (up to 24 feature types are supported). Then return to the View tab and hold up the camera to view features. Compass bearing is shown at the bottom.

description: Protect you and your loved ones from harmful solar ultraviolet (UV) radiation. The Sun Shield app is packed with important sun exposure and UV Index information right at your fingertips! Be informed of the strength of the sun’s UV rays at your location or any location around the globe. Use the simple assessment tool to determine your individual Skin Type. Let Sun Shield select the specific broad-spectrum SPF lotion you need and the number of hours you can safely spend in the sun. Get this doctor-recommended app today for your year-round protection. The Sun Shield App delivers: - Real-time daily and hourly UV Index measurements for anywhere around the globe at the solar noon and hourly intervals to safely enjoy your time in the sun. - 6-day UVI Forecast and Ozone Column information to prepare you in advance for a safe experience outdoors. - Your individual Skin Type using the complete Fitzpatrick Skin Type Assessment as used by dermatologists, the precautions you need to take based on your Skin Type, and why this is important in the prevention of skin cancer. - Which broad-spectrum SPF lotion you should use and how long you can safely stay in the sun based on your individual Skin Type, the UV Index and the time of day. - Important health-related facts from the World Health Organization (WHO) regarding Ultraviolet Radiation, Skin Cancer Prevention, year-round importance of UV awareness, etc. Doctor-Recommended: “Protection from the sun’s UV rays is critical in the prevention of skin cancers. I always advise my patients to be aware of the dangers of UV rays and the need to protect themselves. The Sun Shield app is a great tool for the real time reminder to my patients of these dangers while also giving them guidance for the right SPF lotion to use based on their individual Skin Type and the current local UV index. It’s sun exposure information at your finger tips which is great for patients.” Richard P. Lafleur, MD, FACP Medical Director Southern New Hampshire Internal Medicine Associates Use Sun Shield and enjoy your place under the sun!

description: QCat -Toddler's Dinosaur Park Puzzle Game (free) Wow!! Prehistoric fossil? Am I back to the Jurassic or Cretaceous? There are so many dinosaurs! Look! Distant volcanos is erupting!! Roar together with dinosaurs now!!! "QCat -Toddler's Dinosaur Park Puzzle Game" is a interactive jigsaw game for kids and toddlers from ages 1-6 . It's funny, colorful and beautiful for little baby. This jigsaw game has 4 native scene themes, and 16 dino piece mode puzzles. Each theme has 2 play mode (inlay mode and piece mode) and introduces 4 dinosaurs. Each Inlay mode puzzle has with 4 random dinosaurs. When finish the puzzle, kids click the picture, they can learn the dino's name. Each piece mode puzzle has 2 level (2x2 and 3x3) and 3 cutting form (random choice every time). Besides, it can help to develop cognitive skill, visual spatial skills, shape recognition, tactile skill, and fine motor skill. This App is designed to please the kids or cheer the children up. We wish kids feeling fun or happy by this one. Of course, we also hope that the App can be used as teaching material in the parent-child interaction time. Parents can play with their toddlers, teach them the name of each dinosaur, click the dinosaurs together. Get set to test drive and build with the ultimate construction crane parking simulator of 2014! This game works beautifully on both your phone or tablet! Crane is a type of machine, generally equipped with a hoist, wire ropes or chains, and sheaves, that can be used both to lift and lower materials and to move them horizontally. It is mainly used for lifting heavy things and transporting them to other places. It uses one or more simple machines to create mechanical advantage and thus move loads beyond the normal capability of a human. Cranes are commonly employed in the transport industry for the loading and unloading of freight, in the construction industry for the movement of materials and in the manufacturing industry for the assembling of heavy equipment. The first construction cranes were invented by the Ancient Greeks and were powered by men or beasts of burden, such as donkeys. These cranes were used for the construction of tall buildings. Larger cranes were later developed, employing the use of human treadwheels, permitting the lifting of heavier weights. In the High Middle Ages, harbour cranes were introduced to load and unload ships and assist with their construction – some were built into stone towers for extra strength and stability. The earliest cranes were constructed from wood, but cast iron and steel took over with the coming of the Industrial Revolution. Building a brand new city is not an easy task. Before any building goes up, there are foundations that need to be laid down.. The task of moving these block are with the heavy industry vehicles.. Take the control of the wheels of this huge construction crane vehicle and position it to help start with city construction! You will discover a beautiful play scene with tricky parking on each level as you progress. This game is sure to be come the hit parking game of this year! This definitive best parking simulator features following. Game Features: • FULL download - tons of content in game! • Beautiful super realistic crane and environment - feel the handling and realism! • Multiple driving missions with alternate objectives - prove your driving skills! • Beautiful soothing uber cool music score. • Real physics and handling - can you handle the mighty powerful?! • Amazing 3D world, full of details to explore. • Multiple adjustable camera angles to give you that perfect view. What are you waiting for driver? You got a full construction site to help build! DOWNLOAD TODAY and try for yourself. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- City Crane Parking Sim 2014

All widgets editable on the phone and via JSON. Tested to work with WidgetLocker. For those curious about OMC's permissions: Device & app history: OMC checks the currently-running app so it can sleep if the launcher is not on top, saving battery. Location: Required for weather updates. Photos/Media/Files: Writes to OMC's app-storage folder on your "external" storage. This permission is no longer required for KitKat and above, but some custom ROMs still error out without it. Run at startup: OMC's clock has to start refreshing once the phone boots. View network connections: Full network access: Used to download clock packs and show latest release notes. Set an alarm: Used for the tap-to-launch function to open up your device's alarm screen.

description: We have a NEW version! Check the Google Play store for "+Pregnancy Weight Calculator 4". Formatted for the newer Android devices! SureBaby's weight gain calculator will help you stay on top of your weight gain through your nine months. When you're between doctor's visits, just consult this app to make sure that you're on the right track! From the first week to your last month of pregnancy, you're expected to gain weight. Your body needs to grow in order to support your baby's growth; those numbers on the scale will, and should, increase steadily. However, it can be difficult to know just how big that increase should be week to week, month to month and over the course of your whole pregnancy. That's where the weight gain app comes in. Use it to: •Determine how much weight you need to gain. Plug in some keyinfo to find out your BMI, or body mass index. This will show just how much weight you need to gain and maintain for a healthy pregnancy and baby. •Monitor your steady progress. Include some more specific information, like how many weeks pregnant, whether or not you're carrying twins and how much you currently weigh to find out if you are over or under your ideal weight for any given week. •Keep track of any sudden changes. Big changes in weight can sometimes signal a problem, but if you're able to spot them early, you can avoid dangerous consequences. Keeping up with your pregnancy weight gain is a very important task, since how much you gain will influence other aspects of prenatal health. Visit SureBaby.com to explore sound advice, crucial tips and fun facts about each week of pregnancy as you move through them. Plus, you can sign up for our newsletter to get more updated, personal info delivered to your inbox each week! Congratulations, and all the best in your pregnancy from SureBaby.com!

description: The product of a scientific experiment gone wrong, Superfluid has broken out of its containment shell and remains blissfully unaware of the dangers which wait beyond the creation chamber. Seizing the opportunity, Super-Fluid sets out to escape the clutches of its demented creators Dynamisplice and gain the freedom it so desperately craves. In pursuit of Super-Fluid are all the failed experiments Dynamisplice likes to hide in the basement, such as the Diabolical Jelly and the Stalagbites. However, Super-Fluids true nemesis is the Clean Up Guy, who Dynamisplice has hired to track down and eliminate this stain on their reputation. Combined with a whole host of puzzles, traps and contraptions, Super-Fluids escape will not be an easy one. Super-Fluid is a 2D side-scrolling puzzle game which combines tilt-based controls with the ability to change state between solid, liquid and gas to complete a variety of puzzles and challenges. Developed with support from Virgin Media.

Dit is de meest complete getijden app voor Nederland en de Noordzee. Het Getij toont zowel de waterstanden op de aan getijden onderhevige locaties, als live waterstanden en waterstand verwachtingen in de grote rivieren, IJsselmeer en Schelde, tot Antwerpen. De meetwaardes worden weergegeven in NAP en LAT en waar van toepassing in MSL (Mean Sea Level) en komen rechtstreeks uit de database van Rijkswaterstaat. Leveringsvoorwaarden. We doen ons uiterste best om een fantastische en accurate getijden app te leveren, maar kunnen natuurlijk niet garanderen dat de software en de daarin gepresenteerde data altijd 100% correct werken en zijn. Deze locatiegegevens worden door Surfcheck op geen enkele andere manier gebruikt. The Tide will show you the astronomical tide forecast and the actual water height on all 164 points Rijkswaterstaat, both in the list and on the interactive map, for the whole of 2014. You can add your favorite tide locations to your preferred list, so you get a fast overview at the start of the app. The conveniently tide clock on the home page you can see exactly where the spring and neap tides is. In addition, the app shows the current moon phase and illumination level. And of course, with rise and fall times of sun and moon. The Tide shows both the water levels in the tidal sites, and live water levels and water level forecasts in major rivers, the IJsselmeer and the Scheldt to Antwerp. The measured values ​​are displayed in NAP and LAT, and where applicable, in MSL (Mean Sea Level) and come directly from the database of Rijkswaterstaat. Delivery.
