And the keywords: tide, tides, water, rivers, ijsselmeer, Scheldt, mudflats, zealand, london, harbor, getijapp, getijdenapp ebb tide, north sea, surfapp, zeilapp, visapp, duikapp, windsurfapp, zeilapp
release_text: v1.7 - Meetpunt Zaltbommel toegevoegd + verwijzing naar de nieuwe HP33 stroomatlas-app. v1.6.2 - Bugfix waterhoogte Zutphen en Wijk bij Duurstede + bugfix Zon & Maanwidget. v1.6 - Kaartweergaven verbeterd + knop om Zeeweer te starten toegevoegd + nieuwe machtiging om kaartcaching op de SD-kaart toe te staan. v1.5 - De app toont nu ook alle waterstanden en verwachtingen in de grote rivieren, IJsselmeer en de Schelde. + De actuele waterstand wordt nu ook in LAT weergegeven.

description: Toont u het actuele weer en golfgegevens, direct uit de meetnetten van KNMI en Rijkswaterstaat. Op de Noordzee, langs de hele Nederlandse kust, de Wadden en de Zeeuwse Delta. Zeeweer is gratis en biedt u: √ Live weermetingen van uw locatie, rechtstreeks uit het KNMI-meetstationnetwerk en uit het Landelijk Meetnet Water van Rijkswaterstaat. √ Het actuele Marifoonbericht. √ De waarschuwingskaarten voor zowel kustwateren als Noordzee. √ Gedetailleerde GFS-analysekaarten met Wind- Golven- Zicht- en Regenverwachting voor de komende negen dagen. √ Synoptische analyse KNMI, zowel op korte als lange termijn. √ Bracknell- Hirlam- ECMWF- en GME (Deutscher Wetterdienst)-kaartenreeksen om uw eigen analyse te kunnen maken. √ De pluimen en algemene 5-daagseverwachting voor Nederland. √ De KNMI-neerslagradar. Leveringsvoorwaarden: We doen ons uiterste best om een fantastische en accurate weerapp te leveren, maar kunnen natuurlijk niet garanderen dat de software en de daarin gepresenteerde data altijd 100% correct werken en zijn. Daarbij kunnen databronnen soms wisselen en kunt u geen rechten ontlenen aan deze weerapp of de daarin gepresenteerde informatie. Door Zeeweer te downloaden en gebruiken accepteert u deze leveringsvoorwaarden. Locatiegebruik De locatiepermissie is alleen nodig voor de app en widgets om u de actuele weergegevens in uw omgeving te tonen. Deze locatiegegevens worden volstrekt anoniem verwerkt en door Surfcheck op geen enkele andere manier gebruikt. Shows you the current weather and wave data directly from the monitoring networks of KNMI and Rijkswaterstaat. In the North Sea, along the Dutch coast, the region and in the Zeeland delta. Zeeweer is free and offers: √ Live weather readings from your location directly from the KNMI station network and from the National Water Quality Monitoring Network of Public Works. √ The current VHF message. √ The warning cards for both coastal waters and the North Sea. √ Detailed maps GFS analysis with Wind-Wave-Current and rain forecast for the next nine days. √ Synoptic analysis KNMI, both short and long term. √ Bracknell-Hirlam-ECMWF and GME (Deutscher Wetter Dienst) card sets to make. Your own analysis √ The plumes and overall 5-day forecast for Netherlands. √ The KNMI precipitation radar. Terms of delivery: We do our utmost to deliver a fantastic and accurate weerapp but can not guarantee that the software and the data presented therein be 100% accurate and are working. In addition to data sources may change and you can not derive any rights from this weerapp or the information presented therein. By downloading and using Zeeweer you accept these terms. Location Use The location permission is only needed for the app and widgets to show you. The current weather information in your area This location data is completely anonymous, processed and used by Surf Check in any other way.
release_text: v1.5 - U kunt onze nieuwe stroomatlas-app nu ook vanuit het Zeeweer-menu starten. v1.4 - Nu met speciale offline-modus: u heeft nu ook de beschikking over de weerkaarten als u ver op zee en/of buiten bereik van draadloze netwerken bent. Beschikbaar voor alle pro-gebruikers. v1.3 - Golfhoogtes offshoreplatforms worden nu - voor zover voorhanden - ook in de lijst weergegeven. v1.2 - Kleine bugfixes in NAP/LAT-getijweergave. v1.1 - De uitgebreide Pro Widget voor uw startscherm is nu beschikbaar.

description: All 91 sea maps from the HP33 tidal stream atlas for the North Sea and Dutch coast, under license of the Royal Dutch Navy. This app is fully available offline. This app is universally available on both your smartphone and Tablet. The sea maps are zoomable, thus also of good use on the smaller phone screen. Please do note: the interface language of this app is in Dutch. This app is built and maintained by Surfcheck, under License of the Dutch Royal Navy. © Copyright Netherlands Hydrographic Office, 2014. All rights reserved. Disclaimer: We do our utmost to deliver you the best software and data available in the market, but of course we cannot guarantee the proper functioning or accuracy of both. Data sources can change over time. You can not derive rights from this information. By downloading and using this Zeeweer tidal stream atlas you accept these terms.
release_text: v1.4 - U kunt nu de volgende en vorige kaart bekijken door over het beeld te "swipen" + Correctie voor HW/LW-weergave aanloop Den Helder + Kleine fix voor ontbrekende kaart bij terugkeer in de app. v1.3 - De kaartvolgorde voor Zeeland is nu logischer + de app onthoudt de laatst gekozen stroomkaart en start daar de volgende keer mee op. v1.2 - Nu met de actuele getijverwachtingen voor de referentiepunten van iedere individuele kaart. Klik op het golficoontje in de menubalk om deze op te vragen.

description: GET THE GREAT NIGHT OF SLEEP YOU DESERVE When you can’t sleep, everything can seem like an uphill battle. You can’t focus during the day. You don’t have the energy to do the things you want to do. Relaxation becomes impossible. The most stressful part is when it’s 2:57 AM. You know you need sleep, but no matter how hard you try, you can’t do it. It becomes another night of tossing and turning on your pillow.The later it gets, the more you’re aware that you need sleep. And the more anxious you get about not sleeping… which makes the problem even worse. But there is hope. SLEEP BETTER WITH HYPNOSIS The problem with sleeping badly, is you worry about sleeping badly. This worry prevents you from relaxing enough to fall asleep again. Powerful hypnosis techniques, featured in this app, will eliminate your bedtime worries and soothe your mind. The powerful music, sounds and relaxing hypnosis are carefully engineered to help you release all your anxiety and stress. And with a calm mental state you’ll finally be able to get the peaceful night’s sleep you deserve. This app will teach you how to reduce anxious thoughts about sleep. It will change your subconscious mindset and feelings about how you sleep. That means with just a 25 minute-session every night, you should expect to see results within 1-3 weeks (possibly even sooner). If you suffer from insomnia, sleep apnea, stress, or a general sleep disorder, this app will give you fast and easy relief. You’ll be able to fall asleep without the usual struggle. And you’ll feel amazing in the morning after a solid night’s rest. JOIN THOUSANDS OF OTHERS WHO ARE SLEEPING WELL AGAIN “I haven't been able to sleep for months till the early morning 4am-5am . I download this app thinking its a bunch of BS but I feel asleep within minute of listening to it and had one of the best sleeps I ever had. definitely worth downloading !!” “Haven't managed to listen to more than a few minutes before falling asleep :) Does exactly what it says; I sleep well & long and wake up rested. Genius work guys.” “My insomnia went away with 1 use. This was a cure after years of struggling!!! I tried other apps like one that had white noise, and another one with meditation, but this one was the best by far.” “I have been an insomniac all my life and to a point have learnt to live with it…on some occasions I get very frustrated with my mind for ‘jumping’ into alert state as soon as my head hits the pillow and it was on one of these occasions that I came across this app…I AM IN SHOCK! In all my 41yrs I have never come across anything that has actually worked – I can honestly say this app has CHANGED MY LIFE!” TRANSFORM YOUR NIGHTS - SLEEP WELL AGAIN Don’t struggle with fatigue and tiredness any longer. Download the app now, and experience what a good night’s sleep feels like. THE BEST HYPNOSIS APP TO SLEEP BETTER AVAILABLE Sleep Well Hypnosis is FREE and effective with the default settings. A one-time in-app purchase is required only if you wish to change the default settings or use the advanced features. INTERACT WITH US Surf City Apps creates a variety of health and wellness apps that provide the benefits of hypnosis. Tell us how you use our apps to improve your life: Facebook.com/surfcityapps Twitter.com/SurfCityApps http://surfcityapps.com LEGAL Privacy Policy: http://surfcityapps.com/privacy Terms & Conditions: http://surfcityapps.com/terms

In the land of Ajoria, every hundred years a child is born with the power to speak to dragons. You are the Dragonchild of prophecy. Since birth, the most powerful dragons have taught you to fight and to ride, soaring through the air on their mighty backs. But darkness has come to the kingdom. The wizard Malacron has broken free of his prison and begun to rain his destructive magic upon the land. The prophecy states that only the Dragonchild has the power to stand up to the evil wizard. If you can’t resist the wizard’s magic, all Ajoria will be lost. Grab a dragon, hold on tight, and get ready for the ride of your life! -Choose from over three riding dragons -Fly over the kingdom, incinerating the evil wizard’s magic -Ignite the skies to an addictive heroic rhythm -Enjoy innovative and addictive gameplay: touch the left side of the screen to steer your dragon and the right side to breathe fire

Enter a fantasy realm that’s out of this world. The planet Faron is being invaded by the imperial fleet! The evil empire has deployed thousands of explosive hover mines to eradicate the native life forms. But this is your planet, home to the brave Faron warrior elves, famed marksmen across the galaxy. And you’re not going down without a fight! Grab your trusty Sparkstaff and take to the sky! Fly across your alien homeworld on a search and destroy mission. Shoot first, ask questions later, as you dodge and blast enemy mines to save your people. You’ve been training for this your whole life. The war is coming. Are you prepared? Features: -Choose from 3 different Faron warriors -Fire your powerful Sparkstaff with cool graphics and sounds -Blast off to an exotic alien rhythm -Enjoy innovative and addictive gameplay: touch the left side of the screen to go up and the right side to shoot

Something strange is happening in the forest. Meet Nettle, Petal, and Ember, best friends and teenage forest fairies. Living in the Enchanted Glade, it’s their job to protect all the creatures, big and small, that dwell within. But a mysterious spell has covered the forest in bubbles. Fairies can’t fly with bubbles in their eyes! So what’s a girl to do? Save the day, of course! Fly through the air to help Nettle and her friends clear the way by popping bubbles with cute pixie magic. Nothing’s going to stop these sprites from saving the Enchanted Glade! Fairy Pop combines quick-paced dodging and shooting with adorable cartoon graphics. So grab your wand and get ready to enter a whole new magical world of enchantment. Fairy power! Features: - Frolic through a magical forest filled with many new friends! - Collect coins to unlock new characters - Fly and pop to fun pixie music - Enjoy simple and addictive gameplay: touch the left side of the screen to go up and the right side to pop bubbles

It’s a quiet Sunday afternoon. Granny Mildred puts on her slippers and cardigan and goes out… to tear up the streets! This little old lady isn’t content with her rocking chair, she’s a geriatric gearhead out to cause some trouble. Help Granny trick over leaky fire hydrants and crying babies, she won’t stop for anybody… not even the police! Why is Granny in such a hurry? Is it the early bird dinner special? Sale on support hose? No one knows. We can’t get her to slow down long enough to find out! All we know is the world had better stay out of her way because this fossil’s fast and furious and has nothing to lose! Go Granny, go! - Satisfy your need for speed with skateboards, wheelchairs, and 400HP power mobility scooters! - Get your blood flowing with an upbeat hip-hop rhythm - Enjoy simple and addictive gameplay: touch the left side of the screen to jump

Tonight’s the night you’ve been waiting for. The mad scientist, Dr. Maunstreau, has experimented for years, creating all manner of hideous creatures… creating YOU. But being trapped in a lab all your life is for chumps, so wrap your tentacles around a tachyon gun because tonight you and your fellow monsters are breaking out in style! But you’re not Dr. Maunstreau’s only creation. His secret underground lab is a dark maze filled with deadly booby-traps, flying sawcopters, and burning plasma jets! It’s going to take all three of your brains and all four arms to run, jump, and shoot your way out to freedom. Are you monster enough? Features: -Earn coins to unlock unique and creepy monsters -Let loose your experimental tachyon gun with cool firing graphics and sounds -Groove to an addictive hip-hop “mind-controlling” rhythm -Enjoy simple and addictive gameplay: touch the left side of the screen to jump and the right side to blast your way out

Blast off into uncharted space for the ride of your life! Deep in the center of the galaxy lies the unexplored Cryptos Nebula. As leader of Earth’s expedition force, you and your team will be the first to discover the secrets of this mysterious region. But no sooner do you emerge from hyperspace when your fleet gets separated by an unknown force! Now it’s a race against time to find the rest of your fleet and get out alive. Yet you soon discover that you’re not alone. Ancient creatures that live in interstellar space call this nebula their home, and they aren’t happy with your intrusion. Are they behind your missing vessels? Fend off these gigantic nebula viruses and sonic parasites as you dodge deadly ice shards. Lead your fleet out of the nebula and get your crew home alive. Can you survive the dangers of the great unknown? - Play as all 4 ships in your missing fleet - Fire biotic bolts with cool firing graphics and sounds - Brave the nebula to an eerie outer space theme - Enjoy innovative and contagious gameplay: touch the left side of the screen to move and the right side to shoot

Blasting across the desert in an experimental rocket-powered racing pod is just as dangerous as it sounds. The sport is unrelenting, thrilling and deadly. Not for the faint of heart. As the newest hot-shot pilot in the illegal underground racing circuit, life goes by at the speed of sound. To prove yourself against the reigning pros, you’ll need to think fast and drive faster. Race through the scorching desert heat, dodge pitfalls and obstacles, and collect coins to upgrade to the newest and quickest pods. Beat your opponents and make it to the finish line alive to race again another day. It’s fast-paced action and non-stop thrills in this sci-fi racer! Fire up your engines and hit the afterburner, because if you think twice… you’ve already lost. -Collect coins to unlock new racing pods -Blast across the desert with a pulse-pounding racing beat -Enjoy innovative and addictive gameplay: tilt the device to steer your pod away from obstacles and other pods

Rex is a mighty and fearsome tyrannosaurus… well, one day he will be. Right now, all he’s got is one tiny tooth, so even his plant-eating dino friends aren’t afraid of him. One day, Rex’s pals, Ptera, Dino, and Bronto discover a new volcano has erupted in the center of Palm Valley. And with it, beautiful sparkling gems have sprung up, scattered all across the land. Help Rex and friends collect these precious gems while avoiding deep crevices and volcanic spikes and enjoy all thehijinks on the way! Grab your friends and explore the world of a million years agoin this pre-hysterical adventure! - Choose your favorite dino baby and discover a rich, expansive world - Bounce and hop your way through the wild with an exotic jungle beat - Enjoy simple and addictive gameplay: touch the screen to jumpover obstacles

Calling all treasure hunters! After an epic sea battle, the entire pirate fleet has sunk in an unexplored region of the ocean. Now, a fortune in undersea treasure awaits anyone daring enough to go in after it. Arm yourself with nothing but your trusty harpoon gun, or go all out with your own personal sea jet-- it’s your choice. Although the undersea world is beautiful and exotic, this expedition is no pleasure cruise. You’ll have to fend off monstrous giant squid and electric jellyfish as they greedily guard the gold, silver, and bronze coins scattered beneath the briny blue. And stay on the lookout for biggest baddie of the marine world—the Killer Shark! Get out of his way fast… or turn him into shark fin soup! If you survive, you’ll gain riches beyond your wildest dreams! Will you brave the dangers of the deep? Features: -Earn coins to purchase advanced gear, from sea cruisers to submarines -Harpoon or torpedo enemies with cool firing graphics and sounds -Swim, fight, and explore to an addictive safari rhythm -Enjoy innovative and addictive gameplay: touch the left side of the screen to go up and the right side to shoot

Steampunk Chicken The world of Cuckoo 9 has entered a golden age of science and technology. Steam-powered airships now allow for travel across the widest seas for the very first time. But the mad sky-pirate, Captain Featherbeard, has shattered the peace, stealing a fleet of airships and arming them with deadly radiobombs! You are Commodore Quirke, and your wing of cyber-chickens are the rightful pilots of the airships. Don your flight goggles and flock right into danger as you fight through the bombed ruins of Cluckholm City, blasting any traps and gizmos in your way. Track down Featherbeard and throw a monkey wrench into his mad plans to bring them to a grinding halt. Who says chickens can’t fly? -Collect bronze and silver coins to unlock new characters -Fire nitroguns with cool firing graphics and sounds -Twerk out to an addictive techno beat -Enjoy innovative and addictive gameplay: touch the left side of the screen to jump and the right side to shoot

Turbo Cross Racing — Race Real 3D Motocross Pods on Alien Worlds TOO YOUNG TO DRIVE — BUT NOT TO FLY You've run away from everything you know for the chance of a lifetime to enter the illegal sport of Turbo Cross Racing. It's an unforgiving sport that pits daredevil pilots in a contest of survival, maximum speed, lightning-fast reflexes, and unflinching nerves. Race a fleet of experimental racing pods through 5 alien worlds filled with dangerous mega-obstacles and nothing-to-lose competitors in order to prove yourself the hottest young pilot in the galaxy. Collect coins and upgrade to faster ships, essential armor, and packs of turbo boost. You're going to need them all if you plan to win — or just survive! FAST-PACED GAMEPLAY - Tilt to steer away from obstacles and competitors - Tilt hard to turn your ship on a dime - Tap the screen to use turbo boost SCI-FI RACING FUN - Stunning 3D graphics - Heart-pumping alien soundtrack - 7 different ships to choose from - 5 increasingly challenging worlds (desert, alien, snow, crystal, and hell) - Watch instant replays of your race FREE TO PLAY Game includes one ship and one world plus 25 turbo boosts to start. Collect coins as you race to purchase additional ships and worlds, or buy coin packs through optional in-app purchase. TRAILER * http://youtu.be/NO6mO4cvNDE FOLLOW US * Facebook.com/SurfCityGames * Twitter.com/SurfCityGames * SurfCityGames.com

app_name: World War X - Free Tank Fight
description: Charge into the heat of battle in this futuristic tank shooter. In the year 2165, humanity is at war with machines of their own making, known as the Swarm. Every day, the Swarm builds themselves strong and quicker and smarter, and humankind is the only thing standing in the way of their world domination. But this planet is ours and we won’t go without a fight. The Human Coalition has banded together the best military engineers alive to construct mighty battle tanks to stop the Swarm. They’ll attack you from every angle, but only you can save the planet by blasting every last machine into metal dust. Now is the time for our last stand. The future will be decided here. -Choose from any of the tanks in the Human Coalition -Let fly powerful explosive volleys with cool firing graphics and sounds -Face off against the unstoppable Swarm with epic war-themed music -Enjoy simple and addictive gameplay: touch the left side of the screen to move and the right side to fire

app_name: แต่งรูปใส่ข้อความ แต่งรูป คำคม

description: Super-Bright LED Torch instantly turns your device into a bright torch. The ultimate lighting tool takes full advantage of the LED light. Strobe/Blinking Mode is also supported and it's FREE! Features: - Super Bright Torch - Guaranteed! - Convenient - Switch On/Off the light just like using a real torch - Strobe/Blinking Mode supported - Blinking frequency adjustable - Stunning graphics - This is the most beautiful torch you can get in hand! Enjoy!
release_text: - Super-Bright LED Flashlight is now Android 5.0 Lollipops ready! - Various app optimizations and performance improvements

This life saving App is now available to Sri Lankans to contact emergency services as fast and as easy as possible. No need to search for numbers of various services, as well it self dials not to waste time. Every second counts in an emergency, this app makes contacting any emergency service fast and easy.

Use this guide to prepare for your firefighter oral board! -11 keys to passing your interview. -38 of the most common interview questions, with answers and strategies. -An overview of the firefighting profession, from people who know, and how to build your experience. The oral board, or interview, is generally the toughest part of the hiring process. Most of the candidates have similar qualifications - what matters is how you present yourself! This guide demystifies the process and breaks it down into concrete steps that you can follow in order to advance. If you are fresh out of a fire academy or EMT school, if you are serious about becoming a professional firefighter, get this app! It will break down the process and save you a lot of time figuring it out on your own. If you are more seasoned, have taken a few tests or even done a few interviews, use this app to hone your skills. You will probably get an idea of how to improve, and even where you have been messing up. ★ About the Author ★ Cal Blake has been a volunteer and professional firefighter since 2005, and a paramedic since 2008. He received a BA from U.C. Berkeley. He lives in the San Francisco Bay Area. Field Apps makes reference guides for rescue workers. ★ About Sutro Media ★ This guide is published in partnership with Sutro Media. By enabling local writers to share their expertise on mobile phones, Sutro Media is making it easier and more fun to explore the world! If you have any problems, comments, or suggestions for improvement, we'd love to hear from you - letusknow@sutromedia.com
release_text: Lots of new content and software improvements!

description: "Worth every penny!" NYC's most current and highest rated guide is "invaluable" for first time visitors. Take juicy bites of the Big Apple with this super useful guide that narrows New York’s overwhelming options to 365 highlights and hidden gems from must-see museums to delicious delis. ★ Why this app? ★ Our listings are packed with essential details, fun facts and great photos not found elsewhere. A tour guide on double-decker buses created this guide from scratch. This sightseeing expert – born in Manhattan and living in Brooklyn – understands the city inside out. Travel with us and you will too! Other apps are long on listings but short on substance. We’re selectively comprehensive. 365 reviews with 2,400 photos steer you to the best of New York with practical tips on how to see the city efficiently and affordably. 12 terrific walking tours lead you through popular areas with a personal touch. Need individual advice? Ask the author through in-app comments and get feedback at your fingertips. No other NYC app is this visual or responsive! ★ What’s inside? ★ • Best of Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, Bronx • Landmarks, museums, neighborhoods, activities, shops, shows, sports, hidden gems, classic bars, historic restaurants and decadent desserts • 12 self-guided walking tours • 100+ essential eats • 100+ FREE things to do • Money-saving tips and insider info • Estimated taxi fare from your location to featured sites • Offline maps and content except web links This essential guide is for sightseeing only, not hotels or nightlife. Restaurants and bars are included if historic or unique. Don’t worry, you won’t starve with our eating guides to Chinatown, Little Italy and Times Square. This app will be your travel buddy, saving you time and money in an expensive city. We include important details other apps leave out. Best of all, we keep updating to make this the most current guide on the market! ★ About the Author ★ With you every step of the way is NYC expert Jeffrey Tanenhaus. When not planning itineraries for corporate clients, Jeffrey narrates commentary aboard tour buses. And now he’s your in-pocket concierge full of advice on how to make the most of the world’s most exciting metropolis. ★ About Sutro Media ★ This guide is published in partnership with Sutro Media. By enabling local writers to share their expertise on mobile phones, Sutro Media is making it easier and more fun to explore the world! If you have any problems, comments, or suggestions for improvement, we'd love to hear from you - letusknow@sutromedia.com
release_text: Bug fixes and big content refresh. We are always the most up-to-date New York City guide app!.

description: This plugin (for Locale or Tasker) allows you to block: ... Groups ... All numbers ... Specific numbers ... Toll free numbers ... Unknown numbers ... Hidden/restricted numbers ... And ANY combination in between Examples: ... Block all calls except my wife after 11 PM ... Allow all calls at work except my annoying friend ... Allow all calls except that one strange number that keeps calling Please Note: All Locale settings STAY SET until another situation UNSETS it. Please ensure you have an "Allow All Calls" settings in DEFAULT situation or the call filter will continue to run in the background. Having trouble? Send us a problem report! ... Open the plugin ... Press the menu button ... Press "Problem Report" ... Describe your problem and send Have a suggestion? ... Drop us a line at info@suttco.com This is a plug-in, it requires "Locale" or "Tasker". Keywords: "Locale plug-in", Locale, Tasker, plugin, plug-in, telephone, phone, call, block

description: «Je suis enceinte» est un consultant personnel de la gestion de la grossesse. Le programme racontera comment se développe le bébé, quand il commencera à entendre et même apprendre la voix de la mère! «Je suis enceinte» dictera quand et quelles analyses il faut faire, quelles indispositions peut éprouver une mère future pendant les différentes périodes de la grossesse. Dans le programme : L'Exportation du bloc-notes au faurmat PDF (new!) Bloc-notes bien pratique dans lequel on peut prendre des différantes notes et ajouter des photos (new!) peut être exporté au format PDF et enregistré sur l'ordinateur. Les Graphiques du poids et des analyses Vous pouvez suivre votre poids et le poids du bébé et encore vous pouvez savoir d'avance quand et quelles analyses vous devez faire. Beau widget Si l'installer à l'écran, il comptera automatiquement les jours restants jusqu'à la naissance du bébé "I'm pregnant" is a personal consultant to the management of pregnancy. The program will tell how the baby is developing, when he starts to hear and even learn the voice of the mother! "I'm pregnant" dictate when and what tests should be done, what ailments may experience a mother during different periods of pregnancy. In the program: Export notepad to faurmat PDF (new!) Notebook handy where you can take notes and add différant photos (new!) can be exported to PDF format and saved on your computer. Graphics weight and analysis You can track your weight and the weight of the baby and yet you know in advance when and what tests you need to do. Beautiful widget If the install screen, it automatically count the days remaining until the baby is born

This atlas is translated from the original atlas entitled "Handbuch der Anatomie des Menschen" which was published in 1841 in Leipzig, Germany. The author of this atlas was Professor Dr. Carl Ernest Bock, who lived from 1809-1874. This atlas of anatomy, and all other atlases and books depicting human anatomy, provide illustrations that are representations of the human body. It must be remembered that no two bodies are anatomically identical. Variations in anatomy, many medically significant, may be found in the muscles, blood supply, nerves, all other organs, and the skeleton. The number of variations is finite, they have appeared repeatedly for over four hundred years, and have been cataloged.

TRY THEM ALL !!! All 40+ SVOX voices and 25+ languages are FREE during the first 2 weeks! Don't miss them! NEW! Pronunciation correction feature: correct the default output according to your preferences! Browse http://svoxmobilevoices.wordpress.com for a list of compatible apps and voice demos. == INSTRUCTIONS == 1. Install and run the voice app once 2. Install free SVOX Classic Text-to-Speech Engine 3. Go to Android Settings -> Voice Input & Output -> Text-to-Speech settings. Activate SvoxClassic at the bottom of the screen. Select SvoxClassic as the Default Engine. 4. Run the voice app, click “Continue”, then follow the instructions. 5. Your SVOX Voice main screen will be now visible. Don’t forget to try the new pronunciations correction feature (‘pencil’ icon)! 6. Download other free / paid apps to combine our voice with. For example, you could try: Google Navigation (on Android 2.2 and later, only with Navigation < 5.9), Moon+ Reader PRO, Voice Actions Plus, TalkToMe Classic, Book Speech Audio Books, Transzilla, Good Morning, WakeVoice... Browse http://svoxmobilevoices.wordpress.com/faq/ for a list of frequently asked questions. And now … enjoy your FREE 2 weeks trial with your new SVOX voice! == PRONUNCIATION CORRECTION FEATURE - HOW TO == 1. Run the voice app 2. Click on the ‘pencil’ icon. The pronunciation correction screen will now be shown. 3. Tap on the Android menu key and select ‘Help’ == NOTES == 1. Google Navigation requires that the Text-to-Speech voice matches the phone language. You can change the phone language in Android Settings -> Language & keyboard -> Select language. Compatible with Google Navigation version < 5.9 2. On Android 2.1 and earlier, only some apps, like Google Translation, support changing voices.

description: How are you feeling today? Happy? Hot? Angry? Use the Mood Detector to help you find out! Mood & Love Detector is an entertaining app which tries to detect your mood via your mobile device's touch screen.It acts as a mood sensor similar to mood rings. Just place your thumb on the finger sensor and let the mood detector analyze your feelings. Use Mood Scanner to test your friend's, family member's or someone else's feelings. Compare their mood with your own and find out who is in a better or worse mood.this app is for entertainment purposes only. Are you in love? Your partner or soul mate it is ideal for you? Are you in search of true love? That a true and lasting love is based on trust, happiness and respect for others. Caution: This is just a fun app. Don't take the results too serious. It is just a funny app. Enjoy this app and have fun!

Money Log Free app helps you keep track of you Accounts, Income, Expenses, Bills, Budget and manage your money more effectively. Money Log Free gives all information to manage your expenses effectively like current balance in individual accounts and to all accounts balance, Shows Incomes and Expenses made month wise, Reminds you about pending bills, Shows Budget set,Expenses made and Remaining budget in month wise. The app also gives you a graphical overview of the expenses, incomes and budget. Sync Expenses and Incomes between Android and IOS Devices. Q) How to restore data from Money Log Free? A) After purchasing Full Version ,Open and Close the full version app then you can unlock the create backup option in free version. And then come back to full version and restore the data from free version. description: Use the Paycheck Maximizer to adjust your Form W-4 and put more money in your pocket every payday. Download the app, click Begin, then take the results to your payroll department and fill out a maximized W-4. You can give yourself an instant raise, starting with your next paycheck.

Turning the genre on its head, the super-addictive Mortalcross plays and feels like no other side-scrolling racing game. The realistic physics engine gives you a level of control that you have to play to believe. Launch off an enormous jumps, land on your rear wheel, hit the throttle keep going! You’ll need to master wheelies, stoppies, backflips, front flips, and much more to truly be the best. Features: * 3 different bikes to choose from * Compete on 30 tracks, from easy to very hard * Extra points for tricks * Awesome 3D landscape * Great music and sound effects keywords: motorbike,motorcycle,motorcross,skills,mad,extreme,madness,ultimate,skills,fast
Want to send sweet bouquet in Israel? Install our app and send gifts and sweet bouquet I Israel, same day delivery.

Sweet'N'Spicy Hindi Recipes is the largest collection of Hindi recipes powered by fullmeals.com. Sweet'N'Spicy Hindi app has more than 1000+ recipes spread across three major categories Vegetarian, Non-Vegetarian to Vegan. All the information has been organized and cataloged so that we can relate the recipes by Categories, Foods, and Ingredients. The App also feature the first Calorie calculation engine for Indian recipes. With Sweet'N'Spicy you can 1. You can browse through all the Categories, Sub Categories and find recipes in each of them. 2. Find the List of Ingredients, Instructions for each recipe along with previous user comments 3. You always have the flexibility to find Alternate recipes for every recipe in case if you don't like one. 4. Calories and Allergies for the needy. 5. Personalize the entire app to match your Diet constraints, eg Vegetarian, Healthy, No Oil or Diabetic recipes 6. Search Recipes by Food Name, Category, Cooking Time etc. You can even search just video recipes. 7. Discover interesting and relevant cooking tips along each recipe. 8. You can find beneficial health tips (natural remedies) from the recipe ingredients. 9. Organize your favorite recipes in My Favorites. 10. You can Ask us question either related to a recipe or general cooking stuff. 11. New to Indian Food? Basics will be handy. 12. Checkout Community section to figure out what others do in Sweet'N'Spicy. 13. Rate and review recipes with pictures. Share recipes with your friends. 14. Follow your favorite Cook (Recipe Authors) 15. My Kitchen feature which lets you to find out the matching recipes with the ingredients in hand or fridge. Permissions: android.permission.INTERNET - To Load Content android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION - For Advertisements android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION - For Advertisements android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - Warns you if no network available android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Cache Recipe Information and Images com.android.vending.BILLING - Upgrade Sweet'N'Spicy to remove Ads

31 is a fast paced addictive card game for 1 player and 3 computer players. 31 is easy to catch on to, easy to play with straight forward rules. Anybody who likes card games will love 31. 31 is fun and exciting for people of all ages. The computer players make it tough to win, but not impossible. In 31 the loser of each hand loses one coin. When a player loses all their coins, then they are out. The last one in the game wins all the coins from everyone. There are unlockable perks and the game board is completely customizable. Also known as Blitz Big Tonka Clinker Klinker Skat Scat Cadillac Whammy Skedaddle Snip Snap Snoop Schnautz Stop the Bus Ride the Bus Trent et un Thirty One Please email with questions.
